Office (Excel, PowerPoint) ได้เป็นอย่างดี สามารถสื่อสารภาษาอังกฤษได้ดี มีบุคคลิกภาพที่ดี และมีความเป็นผู้นำ มีความรู้ด้านอสังหาริมทรัพย์แนวสูง/แนวราบในประเทศและต่างประเทศ สามารถทำงาน 6 วันต่อสัปดาห์ ** The application form which has the photo will be considerer ** Interested candidates are invited to write in with full resume with expected salary, and enclosing a recent photograph via click "Apply Now" to Recruitment Center Major Development 141 Major Tower Thonglor 18th  Floor, Soi thonglor10, Sukhumvit 55, Wattana, Bangkok 10110 Contact Us : Recruitment Major - CRAFTING LIFESCAPE TO EXCELLENCE Telephone : 02-392-1111 ext. 3308 (Khun Nattanicha) Line@ : @ majorcareers Facebook : Major Development Careers

STEINWAY THAILAND offers unique opportunities within our team for those who possess the desire, passion, and experience to join our organization in supporting the sale and marketing efforts of the world’s finest piano. The right candidate should have a passion for luxury and a love of music and arts, be results driven and highly organized. As a Sales & Marketing Executive, you will play a pivotal role in promoting our prestigious range of Steinway instruments, establishing strong relationships with clients and partners, and contributing to the overall growth of the brand in the Thai market. Key Responsibilities • Provide exceptional customer service for an experience consistent with Steinway image • Establish and maintain client relationship with current and potential customers • Develop new partner and institutional accounts • Contribute to the development and execution of marketing events to enhance brand visibility • Utilize marketing channels to generate leads • Maintain accurate records and prepare regular reports on relevant metrics Preferred Qualifications and Skills: • Capable of working independently and highly self-motivated • Well-groomed and pleasant, with good sense of refinement • Experience and/or interest in Sales & Marketing • Ability to work on weekends • Piano-playing and/or appreciation for music & arts Work Environment and Culture: • Flat hierarchy with emphasis on open communication • Dynamic and supportive environment with focus on self-development • Full Brand-Training program provided for this position If you are passionate about luxury sales, possess exceptional marketing skills, and thrive in a dynamic environment, we invite you to apply for this Sales & Marketing Executive position. Elevate your career with Steinway & Sons Thailand and contribute to the world of timeless musical craftsmanship.
Able to work in English only Can travel to visit site and customers Sales Report / Rental Report Sales Quotation Assistance of Sales Director

Main duties 1. Support the Business Development plans of the organization in terms of store construction, upkeep and maintaining standards of visual merchandising 2. Coordinate store construction plans to stakeholders (regional team, China, contractor, mall leasing, mall engineering and department heads) 3. Deliver projects on time and within approved budget. 4. Source, train and maintain trusted contractors that can deliver projects in the prescribed quality, on schedule and within budget. 5. Coordinate the design, costing, approval, shipment and installation of branded furnitures for projects with the regional team, China and local team. 6. Ensure compliance with mall guidelines during construction phase. 7. Responsible for mall sign-off for approval of store opening. 8. Responsible for execution of in-store product merchandising guidelines by Marketing and deliver best in class retail experience with innovative approach and aligned with regional/global standards. 9. Monitor in-store guidelines implementation by sales and operations teams 10. Maintenance and upkeep of all stores (Wholesale and Retail) 11. Undertake other duties and responsibility as may assign by the Management from time to time or as when necessary for the effective realizations of the job purpose. 12. During the course of your duties there will be occasions when the nature of your work will be confidential and under no circumstances may this be discussed within, or outside the office with persons who are not entitled to such information. Breach of this requirement will constitute grounds for immediate disciplinary action or cessation of employment. 13. To be fully compliant with company’s policies and procedures. 14. Notwithstanding the above functions, additional duties and responsibilities may be assigned to you from time to time by the Management. 15. Perform other duties as assigned by direct supervisor Qualifications 1. Bachelor degree in Business Administration or related field 2. At least 8 to 10 years previous experience in the same capacity as manager 3. At least 5 years previous work experience in a retail setting 4. Good written and verbal communication skills in English or Mandarin 5. Coordinate and communicate clearly between local department heads and regional team. 6. Ability to solve problems logically, excellent planning skills, awareness of time and scheduling. Key Competencies Attention to detail, flexible, adaptive, time management, project management, collaboration skills

Jobtitle: Head of Sales/ผู้อำนวยการฝ่ายขาย
column8: Qualifications: กำกับ ดูแล การวางแผนกลยุทธ์การขายทุก ให้แก่ลูกค้ากลุ่ม B2B และ Corporate วางแผนการบริหารความสัมพันธ์กับลูกค้าและงานสนับสนุนการขายต่างๆ ให้ได้ตามแผนการหารายได้และเป้าหมายที่กำหนดไว้ กำกับ ดูแล และบริหารจัดการในเรื่องการประสานงานกับลูกค้า หาลูกค้าใหม่ เพื่อทำการขายให้กับลูกค้าแต่ละราย ติดตามงานและส่งมอบงานให้กับลูกค้าอย่างสม่ำเสมอ ถูกต้อง ตรงเวลา ตรวจสอบและอนุมัติเอกสารเสนอราคา (Sales Proposal & Quotation) ให้เหมาะสมกับความต้องการของลูกค้าและสอดคล้องกับกลยุทธ์การขายขององค์กร ตรวจสอบและอนุมัติการจัดทำรายงานสรุปยอดขายประจำเดือนเพื่อประกอบการจัดทำแผนกลยุทธ์ ควบคุม ดูแลการจัดกิจกรรมต่างๆ เพื่อสร้างและรักษาความสัมพันธ์กับลูกค้า มีส่วนร่วมในการกำหนดแผน กระบวนการ ขั้นตอนในการทำงานของฝ่ายขายร่วมกับฝ่ายอื่นๆ ขององค์กร มีส่วนร่วมในการกำหนดนโยบายและกลยุทธ์ขององค์กร และเป็นผู้กำหนดกลยุทธ์ แนวทาง และมอบหมายงานของฝ่ายให้เป็นไปตามวัตถุประสงค์ขององค์กร บริหารบุคคลภายใต้การบังคับบัญชา โดยวางแผน ติดตาม กำหนดเป้าหมายในการทำงาน ประเมินผลงานและผลปฏิบัติงาน ให้คำปรึกษาแนะนำเพื่อการปรับปรุงและพัฒนา และวางแผนพัฒนาผู้ใต้บังคับบัญชา คาดการณ์และปรับเปลี่ยนกระบวนการทำงานให้สอดคล้องกับปัจจัยและสภาพแวดล้อมทางธุรกิจที่เปลี่ยนไปเพื่อบรรลุวัตถุประสงค์ขององค์กร Responsibilities: มีประสบการณ์ในการขายสินค้าหรือบริการให้กับลูกค้าบริษัท (B2B , Corporate sales) ประสบการณ์ทำงานด้านการขายอย่างน้อย 10 ปีขึ้นไป และประสบการณ์ด้านการบริหารไม่น้อยกว่า 5 ปีขึ้นไป มีความสามารถในการวิเคราะห์ข้อมูลการขาย แนวโน้ม และข้อมูลเชิงลึกของตลาด มีความสามารถในการบริหารงานและบริหารคนให้เป็นไปตามวัตถุประสงค์ขององค์กร มีรถยนต์ส่วนตัวและสามารถเดินทางได้ Benefit & Welfare ปรับเงินเดือนประจำปี โบนัสประจำปี วันหยุดพักร้อน วันลากิจ วันหยุดประกาศพิเศษเพิ่มเติมตามเทศกาลต่างๆมากกว่า 16 วันต่อปี ประกันสังคม ประกันกลุ่ม (หลังผ่านทดลองงาน) Town Hall Meeting รับฟังทิศทางการเติบโตและข่าวสารจากผู้บริหารประจำเดือน Activity กิจกรรมสร้างสัมพันธ์ในรูปแบบต่างๆ ระบบ PMS (Performance Management System) ประเมินผลงานอย่างเป็นระบบ ทำงานด้วยระบบที่ทันสมัยด้วย Airtable ประสานงานแต่ละแผนกได้อย่างสะดวก กิจกรรมสร้างความสัมพันธ์ (Employee Engagement) ผ่านระบบ Happily Application Company outing (ท่องเที่ยวประจำปี) ปีละ 2 ครั้ง กิจกรรม Board Game Night, Snack & Chat เย็นวันศุกร์เป็นประจำ กิจกรรมออกกำลังกายประจำสัปดาห์ (ตีแบต/เต้น) วัฒนธรรมองค์กรแบบคนรุ่นใหม่ปรับผลตอบแทนและเลื่อนตำแหน่งจากผลงาน บรรยากาศการทำงานที่มี Passion  ยืดหยุ่น อบอุ่น และเป็นกันเอง Training/Update trends ใหม่ประจำเดือน เรียนคอร์ส Online & Offline ให้ทุกคนโดยเฉพาะ! การเรียนรู้ไม่มีที่สิ้นสุด แผนการพัฒนาศักยภาพรายบุคคล (Beyond Development Program)

Jobtitle: Senior Business Development/นักวิเคราะห์และวางแผนกลยุทธ์ด้านการตลาด
column8: Job Description : วางกลยุทธ์ด้านการขยายธุรกิจ New Business Model หรือช่องทางการตลาดใหม่ๆ วางกลยุทธ์ในการขยายช่องทางการตลาด ให้เป็นตามเป้าหมาย หากลุ่มสินค้าที่เหมาะสมกับตลาดของบริษัท วางกลยุทธ์ในการหาสินค้าแบบ SOURCING และ OEM วิเคราะห์จุดอ่อน-จุดแข็งของบริษัทคู่แข่ง / ความแตกต่าง Process การพัฒนาธุรกิจ และ ค้นหาเทรนด์ใหม่ๆเพื่อให้ทันตลาดปัจจุบัน มีประสบการณ์ด้านธุรกิจค้าปลีก จะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ   รู้ข้อมูลคู่แข่งเพื่อสร้างโอกาสในการขยายตลาดฐานลูกค้าของบริษัท Candidate Qualifications : วุฒิการศึกษาปริญญาตรี หรือสาขาที่เกี่ยวข้อง สามารถพูด ฟัง อ่าน เขียน ภาษาจีนได้เป็นอย่างดี (จะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ) มีประสบการณ์ในการทำงานที่เกี่ยวข้อง  2 ปีขึ้นไป มีทักษะทางด้านคอมพิวเตอร์ (Microsoft Word, Excel และ PowerPoint) มีมนุษย์สัมพันธ์ดี มีความละเอียดรอบคอบ มีความสามารถในการสื่อสารและการประสานงาน มีความสามารถในการแก้ปัญหาเฉพาะหน้าได้ดี

Jobtitle: Sales Manager (Super Cars)/ผู้จัดการฝ่ายขาย (รถซุปเปอร์คาร์)
column8: -วางแผนการทำงานให้ฝ่ายขายสามารถทำงานได้อยางมีประสิทธิภาพ และสามารถบรรลุเป้าหมายยอดขายที่ตั้งไว้ใด้ในแต่ละเดือน ,ไตรมาส ตลอดจนถึง ปีการขาย นั้นๆ - มีความคิดสร้างสรรค์ สามารถคิดและหาวิธีการขายใหม่ๆได้ - มีความเป็นผู้นำ สามารถสร้างความเชื่อมั่นและความเชื่อถือให้กับผู้อื่น - มีทักษะในการสื่อสาร บุคลิกภาพดี มนุษยสัมพันธ์ดี มีใจรักในงานขายและการบริการ - ดูแลให้คำปรึกษา ช่วยหาแนวทางในการกระตุ้นยอดขาย และช่วยแก้ไขปัญหาต่างๆให้กับพนักงานขายตลอดจน ประสานงาน ขายกับลูกค้า จน ทำให้เกิดยอดขาย - สรุปยอดขาย และภาพรวมของฝ่ายขาย และวิเคราะห์การขายพร้อมทั้งส่งรายงาน ให้ผู้บังคับบัญชาทราบ - รักษาสัมพันธ์ที่ดีกับลูกค้าเก่า และสร้างฐานลูกค้าใหม่

Transport Operation Manager Responsibilities: Lead and manage the logistics team, performance evaluations, and professional development. Identify and onboard reliable delivery partners, negotiating favorable terms to ensure on-time and cost-effective deliveries. Oversee end-to-end logistics processes, including order processing, routes planning, On-time delivery tracking, and issue resolution to ensure exceptional customer satisfaction. Monitor key performance indicators (KPIs) related to logistics, such as on-time deliveries, delivery accuracy, and transportation costs and take proactive actions to address any deviations from targets. Monitor and reconcile logistics costs, ensuring accuracy and alignment with budgetary constraints. Spearhead new logistics projects to enhance operational efficiency and contribute to the growth of company. To control overall transport incomes and expenses through the planning activities. Handle all transport orders planning and routes optimization. Business Development Manager Responsibilities: New Clients Acquisition: Proactively identify and acquire new business by targeting potential customers. Client Engagement: Conduct regular customer visits and deliver compelling presentations on our comprehensive business solutions. Customer Handover: Facilitate internal roll-out meetings to seamlessly hand over new acquired customers to the operations team. Customer Satisfaction: Ensure overall customer satisfaction for newly acquired clients. Client Relations: Maintain excellent relations with potential Key Account (K/A) customers to secure future bidding opportunities. Sales Reporting: Regularly update and provide detailed sales reports to track progress. Qualification Bachelor's degree in Supply Chain Management, Logistics, Business, or a related field. 5+ years of proven experience in logistics and supply chain management, preferably within the food, beverage or FMCG industry. Deep understanding of transportation management, route planning optimization, and delivery operations. Proficiency in logistics software and tools for route optimization and cost management. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills to collaborate effectively with internal teams, suppliers, and delivery partners. Strong problem-solving skills and ability to navigate unforeseen challenges and adapt to changing circumstances. Strong organizational skills and attention to detail to ensure accurate and efficient logistics operations. Analytical mindset with the ability to analyze data, identify trends, and make data-driven decisions.

WHO WE ARE Cartrack is a leading global provider of fleet management and operational solutions with a strong focus on technology development to increase productivity, profitability and safety for enterprise customers. Cartrack already has an extensive footprint in South Africa, Europe, Asia, and the Middle East. With close to 2 million vehicles on the Cartrack Cloud. Cartrack ranks among the top 10 largest companies globally in the IOT Mobility sector. Cartrack’s customers will always remain our top priority, thus we have made it our mission to provide the ultimate software platform and customer service. Cartrack is looking for high energy, operationally-minded, motivated and extremely adaptable individual to join us on our fast-growing mission. HOW YOU WILL MAKE AN IMPACT Establish best-in-class customer prospecting. Develop competitive sales plan & strategies. Build world class sales teams with strong recruitment, training and KPI management. Meet & exceed assigned revenue goals. Develop, execute, and deliver quality solution-focused executive overview presentations. Present and articulate advanced product features, benefits, and overall product solutions. Link the solution value to the pains & gains to customers’ C-level management. Develop and manage new clients through high quality, technical and professional client relationships. Responsible for driving client satisfaction throughout the entire lifecycle of the clients’ buying process, by taking ownership for the commercial agreement for each client. WHAT YOU NEED Diploma or Degree in Finance or Operations or Engineering or Information Technology or Business Management. A balanced Business and Technology experience with a good understanding of relevant technologies and applications. Solution based and Entrepreneurial mindset. Excellent oral and written communication skills. Strong value-based and consultative solution selling sales methodology. Proven experience negotiating with clients & stakeholders. Proven experience in fast-paced, high growth environment. Demonstrated network within some industries. WHAT IS IN IT FOR YOU An attractive base compensation and sales commission’s structure. Be part of owner-orientated company and build an incredible sales team. Career progression. The chance to work with fascinating customers and prospects. It is a huge market with lots of new opportunities to tap on.

Jobtitle: Real Estate Agent  (Rental / Sales) -  Bangkok, Pattaya, Chiang Mai, HuaHin...
column8: Why Join FazWaz? FazWaz is a leading Proptech company in the real estate industry, representing clients globally in various sectors including residential, off-plan, resort properties, luxury leasing, and vacation rentals. Our unique approach to the business combines technology and collaboration to provide the best experience for both agents and clients. With a network of global resources including a support team, listing team, sales leaders, and cutting-edge technology divisions, FazWaz has closed over $5 billion in real estate transactions since 2016 and recently joined the Lifull Connect family who own & operate the largest network of property portals globally (180 million monthly visitors!) The Role Real estate experience isn't a must. Start as a Trainee with support and mentorship from Sr. property consultants and managers. Our Rental Trainee Program is designed to nurture and develop talents, offering an 8-week immersive experience that includes hands-on training, mentorship from experts. A supportive and dynamic environment for growth and success. Access to unparalleled leads and listings that provide the opportunity to exercise knowledge gained from training and make money. It's learn to earn! Meet all your clients through FazWaz or by referral — no prospecting required Build relationships with buyers while sharing your expertise to help them navigate their home purchase Use our custom-built online and mobile tools to access the latest market data and manage your transactions, client information, and more. Successful Trainees have the opportunity to transition into a full-time rental / sales consultant role, leveraging a commission-based compensation structure. What we're looking for English and any other language is a bonus Ideally, 2 years in a target driven experience but not essential Natural salespeople don’t always have sales experience A knowledge of Thailand and specific regions is a bonus but NOT required Customer-advocate mindset and a commitment to delivering the best client experience possible Likeable personality - people buy from people they like and trust Enthusiasm for learning new innovative tech tools What We Offer Bespoke induction & ongoing training. Opportunity to learn from real estate experts and earn commission. Existing database and guaranteed lead generation. Competitive commission-based compensation. Transportation allowance to cover travel expenses. Career progression. Interviews happening now with flexible start dates. Apply here.

General Description of Duties and Responsibilities: General - Business compliance and internal control. - Identify, report, and proactively cope with risks (such as trade compliance and cyber security). - Maintain the order of partners in the domain, or participate in key tasks on internal controls, such as partner risk control practical training to ensure compliance of the managed domain. General - Partner capability building. - Based on the overall planning, develop improvement plans and assessment objectives for the partner. Partner development – Planning. - Participate in developing the partner planning solution for the managed domain (industry/NA, region, or type) based on overall planning; Partner development - Development (transaction management). - Develop partners of the managed domain. Formulate, maintain, improve, and execute the partner map. - Support the market operations, and achieving target. Partner operations - Partner policies and operations (including marketing). - Implement partner policies for the managed domain based on the business features. Or undertake joint partner marketing and partner operations. Partner operation – Partner management. - Develop partner management plans, manage partner inventory data, and regularly output inventory, market, and competition analysis. Candidate Requirements: Bachelor’s degree or above in related fields Have a good concept of the overall situation and the spirit of teamwork Proficient in using data analysis tools High motivation to achieve the target and build a relationship with the Partner Technical or engineer background is preferred Have Microsoft Excel skills and data analysis skills Good command of English and Chinese Huawei Technologies (Thailand) Co., Ltd. 38th Floor, No.9, G Tower Grand Rama 9, Rama 9 Road, Huaykwang Sub-district, Huaykwang District, Bangkok Metropolis, 10310 Thailand. Tel : 02-095-8199 Fax: 02-095-8000

Jobtitle: Sales and Marketing Director (OTC & Food Supplement) - B.Grimm Pharma
column8: Job Summary: The Sales and Marketing Director for Pharma, Over-the-Counter (OTC) and Consumer Health products in the pharmacy channel will lead sales and marketing initiatives, strategy development, and team management for these specific product categories. This role involves driving revenue growth, expanding market share, and ensuring effective sales operations. Key Responsibilities: Strategy and Planning: Develop and execute comprehensive marketing strategies to promote products and enhance brand visibility. Analyze market trends, competitor activities, and customer insights to inform strategic decision-making. Develop and implement strategic sales plans for Pharma, OTC and Consumer Health products. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to align sales strategies with overall business objectives. Brand Management: Oversee the development and maintenance of a strong and cohesive brand identity in the pharmaceutical market. Ensure consistent messaging and brand representation across all marketing channels. Team Leadership: Lead, mentor, and manage the sales team focused on Pharma, OTC and Consumer Health products. Provide guidance on product knowledge, sales techniques, and customer engagement. Market Analysis and Expansion: Analyze market trends, consumer behavioral, and competitor activities in the Pharma, OTC and Consumer Health segments. Identify opportunities for market expansion and growth. Digital Marketing: Drive digital marketing initiatives, including online advertising, social media campaigns, and content marketing, to reach target audiences effectively. Utilize data analytics to measure the effectiveness of digital marketing strategies. Client Relationship Management: Build and maintain strong relationships with key clients, distributors, and retail partners. Understand client needs and market demands to tailor sales approaches. Product Knowledge and Training: Stay informed about OTC and Food Supplement products, including features, benefits, and usage. Conduct training sessions for the sales team to enhance product knowledge. Sales Performance Monitoring: Monitor and analyze sales performance metrics for Pharma, OTC and Consumer Health products. Implement strategies to address challenges and capitalize on opportunities. Budget Management: Develop and manage the sales budget. Optimize resource allocation to achieve financial objectives. Regulatory Compliance: Ensure that sales activities comply with regulatory requirements for Pharma, OTC and Consumer Health products. Coordinate with regulatory affairs teams to secure necessary approvals. Budget Management: Develop and manage marketing budgets, ensuring cost-effective allocation of resources. Monitor and analyze the return on investment for marketing campaigns. Qualifications and Skills: Bachelor's degree in Pharmacy, Business, Marketing, or a related field (MBA preferred). Proven experience in sales management within the pharmaceutical industry, specifically in Pharmacy and OTC channel. Thorough understanding of Pharma, OTC and Consumer Health products, market dynamics, and consumer trends. Strong leadership, team management, and interpersonal skills. Excellent communication, negotiation, and presentation abilities. Analytical mindset with the ability to interpret sales data and market insights. Results-oriented with a focus on achieving sales targets. Familiarity with regulatory and compliance requirements. Work Location: Bangkok Working Days: Monday - Friday Company Website: https://bgrimmgroup.com/our-businesses/healthcare/b-grimm-pharma/ Interested applicants can apply directly by click "Apply Now" All applicant will be treated strictly confidential. We thank all applicants for their interest, however, only those selected for an interview will be contacted.

Jobtitle: Logistics Sales / Business Development (Associate / Senior Associate)
column8: Working hours: 5 days (Mon – Fri: 9 a.m. – 6 p.m.) Working location: Fortune Tower (MRT Rama 9) ***Interested applicants, please submit your updated English resume with contact phone number, current and expected salary. Salary will be dependent on experience and qualifications. Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted. *** *** Able to start working immediately will be considered an advantage.*** Key Responsibilities: To acquire all kinds of sales logistics business particular in new customers. To cold call; make multiple outbound calls to potential clients. To Close sales and working with the client through the closing process. To collaborate with the team on sales goals, planning, and forecasting; maintaining short- and long-term business development plans. Other tasks as assigned by the management. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in any field or equivalent. Fresh graduated are also welcome if eager to be sales. This position welcomes candidates with no previous sales experience but have eagerness and enthusiasm to become a salesperson. Minimum 1 year experience in Sales of Logistics, transportation or related fields is plus. Experience in the Logistics Trucking Business/ Delivery / 3PL will be an advantage. Fair - Good verbal and written English communication skills Computer literacy in Microsoft Office (Excel, PPT) and reports Have good presentation and communication negotiation skills Efficiency, time management, and organizational skills Must be self-motivated with a strong desire to succeed Being enthusiastic, ambitious, confident, and professional. Benefits: Group insurance: OPD/IPD and Dental Provident fund Birthday allowance Length of service benefits Diligence allowance benefits Snack and drink in the office

Jobtitle: Sales Executive (Real Estate) Condominium / Single detached house...
column8: หน้าที่และความรับผิดชอบ หน้าที่ต้อนรับลูกค้าที่เยี่ยมชมโครงการด้วยความมืออาชีพ นำเสนอข้อมูลของบริษัทฯ ข้อมูลโครงการที่รับผิดชอบขายและ/หรือโครงการอื่นในเครือของบริษัทฯ ศึกษาทำความเข้าใจความต้องการของลูกค้า เป็นที่ปรึกษาที่ดีพร้อมให้คำแนะนำประเด็นที่ลูกค้ากังวลใจ สร้างความสบายใจจนสามารถปิดการขายได้ ให้ข้อมูลรายละเอียดตอบคำถามโครงการขายผ่านทุกสื่อการขายของบริษัทฯ ทั้ง Offline และ online ดูแลเอกสารจอง, สัญญาจะซื้อจะขาย และประสานกับแผนกอื่นๆ ที่เกี่ยวข้อง รายงานสถานะลูกค้าให้แกผู้บังคับบัญชาทราบ ทำงานร่วมกันกับฝ่ายการตลาด สรุปข้อมูลที่เป็นประโยชน์จากการวิเคราะห์ลูกค้า เพื่อการจัดแคมเปญ โปรโมชั่น ปรับแนวทางการตลาดได้อย่างมีประสิทธิภาพ งานอื่นๆ ตามที่ได้รับมอบหมาย คุณสมบัติ ปริญญาตรีขึ้นไป ไม่จำกัดสาขา มีประสบการณ์ในงานขายอสังหาริมทรัพย์ (บ้าน / ทาวน์โฮม / คอนโดมิเนียม ฯลฯ) 2 ปีขึ้นไป บุคลิกภาพดี แต่งกายสุภาพเรียบร้อยเหมาะสมต่อความเป็นที่ปรึกษางานขายมืออาชีพ มีทักษะในการนำเสนอที่ดี สามารปิดการขายได้ด้วยตนเอง สื่อสารภาษาอังกฤษได้จะได้รับการพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ มี Passion ในงานขาย ผลักดันตัวเองให้ achieve เป้าขายตามที่ได้รับมอบหมาย มีมนุษย์สัมพันธ์ดี มีใจรักงานบริการ สามารถเดินทางไปปฏิบัติงานที่โครงการได้ (ทำงานสัปดาห์ละ 6 วัน) สถานที่ปฏิบัติงาน : เจริญนคร / วงแหวน-รามอินทรา / ลาดปลาเค้า We invite qualified candidates to submit your CV with current photo stating your present and expected salary by click "Apply Now" Navarang Asset Company Limited Human Resource Division 31 Portico Building, 3rd Floor, Room no.301 Soi Langsuan, Lumpini, Patumwan, Bangkok 10330 www.navarangasset.com

Jobtitle: Sales Executive, Sales IT Solutions, Account Manager/เจ้าหน้าที่ฝ่ายขาย
column8: Job Descriptions Maintain and develop relationship with existing and new potential customers. Serves customers by selling products,Solution Selling to meet customer needs. To prepare and plan working day to make the most efficient use of sales time. Gaining a clear understanding of customer business and requirement. To prepare presentation, demonstration, proposal and variety of status sales reports. Follow up on sales activity and meet sale target. Resolving customers complaints to complacent. Other duties as assigned Qualifications Bachelor’s degree in Marketing and Sales, IT , Computer Science, Computer Engineering or related field. At least 3--4  year’s experience in selling IT products, IT Solution , IT outsourcing If have experiences in Solution Sales especially in System Integration (SI) business with proven track record  is preferable Specialize in System / Network / Security Infrastructure is preferable Responsibility, diligent and hard working. Must have to own car and driver license. Reasonable command in English. Good relationship & service mind with Corporate account

Company: Major Cineplex Group Public Company Limited
column8: Key Responsibilities: Manage and improve all cinema Loyalty Program and other CRMs Open new account and maintain good relationship with existing customer Providing support for clients and solving any related problems Remain in frequent contact with the clients in your responsibility to understand their needs Analyze consumers' behavior Take care of remaining clients Create idea for the new campaign to gain new clients Responsible for full loop of Account Management including other adhoc Qualification: At least 8 years experienced in Sales, Account Management Bachelor's degree or higher in Marketing, Business Administration or any related field Experienced in Client Relation is a must Well understanding in Data Marketing Knowledge in NFT, Token, Cyrpto and other new currency is a must Interested candidates are invited to write in with full resume, stating present and expected salaries, and enclosing a recent photograph to the address below: Major Cineplex Group PLC. 1839 – 1839/1, 1839/6 Phahonyothin Rd, Khwaeng Lat Yao, Khet Chatuchak, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10900 Contact: Khun Thunchanok 092-258-2335 / 02-515-5300 Ext.223

Jobtitle: Sales Asst. Manager, Sales Supervisor / JLPT N2 / Salary 60-100K / BTS Saladaeng
column8: Job description Mainly expanding the new business priority in Malaysia and also in Thailand, Vietnam, and Indonesia due to establishing the new project with long-term relationships, especially targeting construction or manufacturing businesses. Monitor and analyze sales performance metrics to identify areas for improvement. Cooperation with the engineering and product development teams to improve and troubleshoot the products (solar cells) Plan the costs and budget for the sales department while the project is being operated. Manage a report and data gathering for the update to hit productivity and sales goals, control costs, and determine the budget per unit. Work closely with the sales manager to develop and implement effective sales strategies. Qualifications Bachelor’s degree or higher in business administration, marketing, or a related field. Have a strong knowledge of sales experience over 6–8 years and be familiar with solar cells or related systems if possible. Business level of Japanese (JLPT N2+) and moderate English communication skills. Effective negotiation skills. Excellent communication and management abilities. Benefits Annual bonus & salary increasement Telephone Medical & life insurance Business trip Other welfare by regulation Interested candidate, please send your resume in English along with your recent photo and expected salary to us by e-mail. JAC Personnel Recruitment Ltd 10F Emporium Tower 622 Sukhumvit Soi 24 Klongton, Klongtoey, Bangkok 10110 Contact: K.Yossapon Office Number: 02-261-1270 Time: 9.00 am - 6.00 pm Website: https://www.jac-recruitment.co.th [link removed]

Job Description: Responsible for overseeing all aspects of the company's e-commerce business operations, participating in corporate strategic planning, and leading the formulation and execution of platform operational strategies. Capable of accurately understanding mobile internet users, identifying the core business concepts and thematic directions, formulating content development and promotional strategies based on overall operational planning, and presenting long-term development plans. Lead the team in achieving operational targets, meeting online promotional objectives, and regularly provide operational analysis reports. Analyze company operational data, optimize and enhance operational processes and efficiency Responsible for planning and executing operational strategies for various activities. Responsible for setting and cascading team's annual objectives, establishing efficient work processes and procedures, and leading the team to achieve various goals (costs, timelines, sales, profits). Qualification: Bachelor’s Degree or Master degree in Marketing or business At least 5-8 years of experiences in Digital Marketing, E-commerce and CRM campaign. At least 3 years of Managing team Comprehensive understanding and practical experience in the operational management models of e-commerce platforms in Thailand. Proficient and knowledgeable in the operation of new media platforms (such as live streaming, TikTok, etc.). Prior experience in platform operation on platforms such as Shopee, Lazada, etc. Knowledge of marketing, digital marketing, social media platform, Marketplace and  deep knowledge of website. Great problem solving skills, and growth mindset.

Job Description : Rate DB administration Owner and custodian of the Rate Database application, the Rate DB Specialist owns its rules and principles. In charge of the Application set-up, the Rate DB Specialist is tasked with creating and maintaining its operating rules (set-up, filtering rules, workflow logic etc.) In charge of creating the Run release cycle, jointly with technical teams (infrastructure & development) and the Business. Also ensure that changes are duly communicated (whether originiating from technical teams, Products or else). Support Train the Level2 Support team so their skills allow an optimized support, functionally and technically. Remains the ultimate level of escalation, known to the Organization as the Level 3 support. Interactions with other teams In charge of the Application technical rules, ensuring consistency between Product lines. Ensure that the Rate DB features and logic, remain consistent between the different Products (Ocean, Road, Rail, Air, Brokerage, Courier or else), primarily interacting with his Business Process counterpart. Work align with the Business Process team to help translating the Business & product requirements into an optimal technical solution. Translate the requirements into technical design enabling proper development by the Development team. Ensure that the test plans produced by those product teams that require new features are complete, consistent and results duly signed off before pushing related developments to the delivery queue. In charge of defining the EDI inbound rules (filters, mandatory fields) which will allow importing rates into the RDB. Interact with and notify those teams that may be affected by changes (whether functionally or technically e.g. impacts on replicated databases). Ensure that proper communication is issued timely. Qualification : Minimum Bachelor’s Degree in Related fields. Required minimum 5-10 years experience in Freight forwarding's rate management (Air & Ocean). Fluent in English. Versed into technical design. Pro-active problem solving. Eager to learn new tools and to listen to new ideas. Why Join Us? Opportunity to work in a well known global logistic provider. Investors In People (IIP) accredited company since 2015 with Silver accreditation. Great career opportunities in both local and global scales according to your passion. Online training platform where you can sharpen your skills with 24/7 access. Competitive benefits, feel relief with our good health insurance program, provident fund and more. Young and Fun working environment. GEODIS Transport Thai Ltd. 207 Soi Saeng Uthai,Sukhumvit 50 Road, Prakanong, Klongtoey, Bangkok 10260 Telephone: 02-736-2700 # 2981 Cellphone: 065-502-3939 Line ID: 0655023939

Jobtitle: Sales Representative (ติดBTS พญาไท)/ตัวแทนฝ่ายการขาย
column8: Inception Maketing Group. ยินดีต้อนรับสู่บริษัทของคนรุ่นใหม่ ถ้าคุณกำลังมองหาประสบการณ์ที่แตกต่าง และรักความท้าทายในการขายแบบ F2F Marketing  มีโอกาสในการคิดและเสนอ และยังเป็นอาชีพที่มีความการก้าวหน้าอย่างชัดเจน ด้วยระบบการขายที่มืออาชีพที่มีมานานกว่า25ปี และมีการเทรนนิ่งที่ยอดเยี่ยม มาร่วม Play Learn Work และเติบโตไปพร้อมๆกัน ไม่รอช้ามาเป็นส่วนหนึ่งของ Inception marketing group *โปรดอ่านรายละเอียดก่อนสมัคร* Job description รับผิดชอบในการสร้างยอดขายให้กับบริษัท เรียนรู้ทักษะพื้นฐานด้านการขายและการเจรจาต่อรอง เป็นตัวแทนฝ่ายขายสินค้าและบริการให้กับทางผู้ว่าจ้างหลากหลายทั้งในประเทศและต่างประเทศได้ เข้าร่วมประชุมตอนเช้าในออฟฟิศก่อนออกปฏิบัติงานนอกพื้นที่ ให้ข้อมูล ประชาสัมพันธ์สินค้าให้กับลูกค้า มีการจัดการกับลูกค้าที่ปฏิเสธได้อย่างมืออาชีพ รับผิดชอบต่อKPIหรือยอดขายที่ได้รับมอบหมาย Applicant qualifications วุฒิป.ตรี หรือ เทียบเท่าทุกสาขาวิชา รักในการเรียนรู้และการพัฒนาตนเอง และมีทักษะการพูดที่ดี ทำงานเป็นระบบและสามารถทำงานเป็นทีมได้ ชอบบรรยากาศการทำงานที่สนุกสนาน มีทัศนคติที่ดีต่องานขาย มีความกะตือรืนร้น สดใส ร่าเริง มารยาทดี มีน้ำใจต่อเพื่อนร่วมงาน มีความมุ่งมั่น ลุยงาน อดทน ยินดีรับนักศึกษาจบใหม่ และผู้ที่ไม่มีประสบการณ์ทางด้านการขาย เริ่มงานได้ทันทีจะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ Benefits โบนัส 10- 30% ต่อสัปดาห์และคอมมิชชั่น โปรแกรมอบรมพัฒนาทักษะการขายและความสามารถด้วยระบบมาตรฐาน ประเมินการเลื่อนตำแหน่งจากผลงาน ไม่ใช่อายุงาน กิจกรรมประจำปี โอกาสเดินทางไปศึกษาดูงานที่ต่างประเทศ ทริปท่องเที่ยวทั้งในประเทศและต่างประเทศ How to apply 1) สมัครผ่าน Jobsdb (Click Apply Now) 2) E-mail บริษัท 3) โทรศัพท์สอบถามข้อมูล INCEPTION MARKETING GROUP CO.,LTD. 128/120 Phayathai Plaza Tower, 11th Floor, Unit 120, Phayathai Rd. Thung Phayathai, Ratchatewi, Bangkok, Thailand 10400 Contact person : HR Department (ROSE) Phone number : +66 61397263 instragram : inception.th Facebook : Inception Marketing Group Co., Ltd.

Jobtitle: Sales Executive / Sales Interior 4 Positions/เจ้าหน้าที่บริหารงานขาย 4 ตำแหน่ง
Company: THAI FREIGHT AND INTERTRADE COMPANY LIMITED
column8: WALLAH BRAND แนะนำผลิตภัณฑ์หรือนำเสนอขายให้กับลูกค้าได้ทั้งทางออฟไลน์ ทางโทรศัพท์และทางออนไลน์ รักษาฐานลูกค้าเก่า และหาลูกค้าใหม่ พร้อมกับการดูแลลูกค้าได้อย่างดี เพื่อยอดคอมมิชชั่นในระยะยาวของเจ้าหน้าที่เอง ประสานงานกับฝ่ายต่างๆที่เกี่ยวข้องได้เป็นมิตร วางเป้าหมายและสรุปผลงานแต่ละเดือนได้อย่างกระชับ คุณสมบัติ มีใจรักงานบริการ รักบ้าน รักคน และรักสัตว์ ทักษะการสื่อสารดี พูดจาชัดเจน ยอมรับฟังด้วยใจ คล่องตัว อึด ถึก ทน และสุภาพ บุคลิกภาพดี หน้ายิ้มสดใส ใจร่าเริง มีความมุ่งมั่นในเป้าหมาย กระตือรือร้นและรักงานที่ทำ จัดการบริหาร และแก้ไขเฉพาะหน้าได้ดี หากมีประสบการณ์ขาย รับพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ ทำงานเป็นทีมได้ดี ทักษะหรือประสบการณ์ที่มีจะรับพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ ด้านการออกแบบภายใน จะใช้โปรแกรมเป็นหรือไม่เป็นก็ได้ จัดการบริหาร และแก้ไขเฉพาะหน้าได้ดี มีรถยนต์ และใบขับขี่ เงินเดือน-สวัสดิการ ประกันสังคมแบบไม่หัก หยุดยาวแบบบริหารเองได้ เมื่อทำครบ 1 ปี ค่าคอมมิชชั่น 1- 10% ค่าที่พัก ไม่เกิน 700 บาทต่อคืน (กรณีไปต่างจังหวัด) เงินตอบแทนร่วมกันเมื่อถึงเป้าในแต่ละไตรมาส โบนัสพิเศษปลายปี เที่ยวประจำปี สถานที่ทำงาน : พระยามนธาตุแยก 18 บางบอน กรุงเทพฯ 10150 จุดสังเกตุใกล้เคียง : เซ็นทรัลพระราม2 ,  จุดท่องเที่ยวชายทะเลบางขุนเทียน, โรงพยาบาลนครธน Working Hour: Standard hours 09.00- 18.00 or 08.00-17.00 ( Flexible )

Key Responsibility: Initiate new idea and project for the improvement to warehouse operation site Create action plan for the responsible project based on expected result, budget, risk assessment and timeline Perform role as project coordinator between related parties to implement project and ensure progress running smoothly Report progression of project on result, expense, and further recommendation, perspective to related parties Develop strong relationships with key account customers to build long term business by continuously proposing services or solutions that meet their objectives and satisfaction Manage all aspects of the customers relationship, including monthly meeting, customer satisfaction survey, project improvement and issue respond Other related tasks as assigned by superior Qualifications: Bachelor's Degree or higher in Logistics Management, Industrial Engineering At least 3-5 years working experiences in Warehouse Operation, Warehouse Operation Improvement, Industrial Engineering or Key Account Management Good command of English and presentation skills Capable in Microsoft Office, particularly in Excel and PowerPoint Good Analytical skill, Problem Solving skill, Proactivity Optimism with a positive mindset Self-motivated and result oriented with good inter-personal skill and able to handle pressure and work under time constraints. Working Location: Rayong & Chonburi We offer an attractive remuneration package to the successful candidate with exciting and challenging roles in our progressive organization. Interested applicants, please submit your updated English resume (Only) with current & expected salary  via APPLY NOW Yusen Logistics (Thailand) Co., Ltd. (Head Office) 2525 One, Two FYI Center,, 6th, 7th Fl., Rama 4 Rd., Klongtoey, Klongtoey, Bangkok 10110 Tel. 02-034-8285, 02 -034-8393 and 02-034-8436 Only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

Jobtitle: E-Commerce Planning Senior Officer/เจ้าหน้าที่อาวุโสฝ่ายอีคอมเมิร์ซ
column8: Position: E-Commerce Planning Senior Officer Location:  ฺฺBangna, Bangkok (Near BTS) Business Type:  Japanese manufacturing and sales organization for products of standard components Salary: Up to 45,000 THB + Other Benefits Job Description: The E-Commerce Planning Senior Officer is in charge of planning, and implementing the overall e-commerce strategy across desktop and mobile devices to ensure that the application is optimized for user-friendliness and user experience while remaining visually appealing bases on data analysis. Moreover, the candidate will take lead in performing research, strategizing, analyzing, and implementing user feedback, as well as supporting teams that are responsible for developing the user interface which aims to drive the achievement of corporate growth targets via the success of e-commerce planning. (Responsibility) 1) Responsible for overall e-commerce strategy, planning, implementation and post-reviews for all projects. 2) Create end-to-end customer experience on expanding the vision of how people interact. 3) Participate in the design of useful, usable, and desirable user interfaces designs by considering data, market analysis, customer feedback, professional expertise, metrics, and usability findings in a team environment. 4) Conduct competitive research, discovery and usability research and facilitate research sessions to identify business, user, and technical requirement. 5) Weekly-Monthly performance analysis and monitoring of customer feedback with pre/post campaign evaluation and ROI management. 6) Analyze customer demographics and purchasing behavior to monitor trends and future sales growth. Requirements: - 1-3 years of experience in e-commerce planning or platform experience across desktop and mobile devices - Experience in data analysis and delivering design solutions in UI/UX - Intermediate Level of English Skill :- 1) Experience and competence in e-commerce planning with a good understanding and working knowledge of e-commerce or Platform experience 2) Research and data analytical skills, with proficiencies in office productivity tools (e.g. Excel, Word and PowerPoint) 3) Interaction, UI/UX design, and Figma experience are preferred 4) Able to solve the problem effectively with strategic thinking skill 5) Self-motivated yet customer-focused 6) Strong communication, writing, and presentation skills

Company: Central Retail Corporation Public Company Limited
column8: To be Assistant Mall General Manager for Lifestyle Mall in order to maximize property income, customer traffic, minimize cost expenditure and therefore maximize profits within company rules & regulations Key Targets Property income, Profit & cost lines as per P&L Team Development & Satisfaction, as per POV, Staff turnover & Internal development Excellent service for customers including mall ambiance Mall occupancy & footfall Debt control Audit Compliances Local market leader Lifestyle Plaza Supervise 4 key functions of mall operations including Leasing, Marketing, Admin (LP and M&E),and Finance Establish good working relationships with all tenants to quickly & efficiently identify & resolve issues Achieve 100% tenant occupancy & support H/O RI team in identifying new potential tenants Most effective External Events strategy for incremental sales High Customer Service Standards including Toilets, car parking, Customer Service Desk, and overall ambiance of mall Promote sales and standard of Food Court Ensure all Plaza Health & Safety guidelines are followed to provide a safe environment for customers & staff (“New Normal” standard) Identify opportunities to increase property income and customer traffic by seeking new offers of both merchandise and events to fulfill customers’ need Support Department Store and all tenants to get high sales and ease of operation under mall standard guideline and procedure Utilize mall space, filling un-renew or terminated permanent tenants with temporary tenants Coordinate and build good relationship or network with local authority, large businesses and VVIP customers of each store Strengthen communication with local customers by using effective channels and marketing media; i.e. facebook, instragram, lines, radios, billboard and other channels Ensure all Marketing campaigns are fully implemented & exploited as per company guidelines Focus on one card penetration and CRM activities Create a 'customer first' service culture through leading by example and exploiting all relevant training opportunities Review monthly P&L performance vs. targets & action plan to address any shortfalls Ensure all company training programs are fully support to provide managers & staff with development opportunities Identify talented individuals with potential for development and provide additional training & responsibility to enhance their abilities & prospects Ensure all Store procedures are completed within company audit guidelines Monitor local competitor activity and feedback key issues as required Improve and drive store traffic from core and reginal catchment and to understand the needs of customer Manage relationship with local authorities and other organizations in community in order to create activities and good corporation from any store issues Drive Local event from 6 elements (Big Event, Contest, Edutainment, Traditional Activity, BU Promotion, CSR) in order to become center of community Build new local businesses or search new opportunity for store and local SMEs

Jobtitle: Sales Executive (Automotive - Pluakdang, Rayong - Total up to 60K)
column8: Job description: Maintain & Develop Sales & Marketing systems: Maintain and develop all documents in Sales Dept. Create the Sales & Marketing process flow. Achieve in sales target. Marketing survey. Expand market share and increase customer base to achieve sales target. Systematic sales record, customer requirement, quotations and others sales document. Sales and support the customers: Be fully aware of all process being promote by company and keep current with the technical issue. Provided technical support to Manager and all concern. Understand in price setting, PLN, quotation to ensure to achieve as sale target. Provide pre-sales preparation, meet customer and make presentation to develop new clients and after sales service. Provide feedback from supplier, client and follow up all concern to responsiveness. Manage of all technical sales issues. Work with Sales managers and executives to sell product and service. Manage of part receiving and delivery on time to customers. Be coordinator between customer vs company for all issue and also when QC/Production engineer got some trouble, quite or not able to work as normal. Create Customer Satisfaction: Identify all technical issues of assigned account, follow up and service to assure complete customer satisfaction. On-site service to customer with new information to fulfill customer satisfaction. Collection and analyst issue list, negotiation with customers. Conduct customer needs analysis in order to gain understanding in customer problems. Work with, develop positive relationship with, communicate with, and coordinate activities with other section such as Production and others. Customer satisfaction survey at least one time a year to ensure all of customers satisfied about our services. Others as assigned: Performs other jobs that may be assigned by the Sales & Marketing Manager or upper level. Requirement: Minimum 3 year selling’ experience or technical support role preferably in automation, heat treatment industry. Able to travel throughout sales territory. Able to convey customer requirement to Sale & Marketing Manager. Working experience in Japanese firm will be an advantage. Must be drive a car with driving license. Excellent professional presentation skill, service mind. Good knowledge in ISO 9001 / ISO/TS 16949. Education Background in Metallurgy. Ability to speak Japanese language is a plus. Compensation * On target around 70,000-150,000 THB or above. Location : Chinese speaking in Mai Khao, Phuket Preferred Education and Experiences • At least 2 years experiences in Telemarketing, hospitality or guest services. • Ability to generate business form personal contacts and referral sources over an extended period of time. • Marketing Experiences • Ability to follow up and maintain a relationship with clients over a long period of time Job Summary Promote awareness of brand image internally and externally. Use sales techniques that maximize revenue while maintaining existing guest loyalty to Marriott. Recognize opportunities to up-sell the customer and sell enhancements to create a better Marriott experience or event. Build a relationship with an existing member to ask for referral names to extend the referral offer. Encourage referrals or guests to purchase or schedule preview package sales/tours. Explain details and requirements related to attending a sales presentation to potential owners. Verify that individuals meet eligibility requirements for preview package sales/tours prior to scheduling a tour for a Marriott vacation club property. Determine and give complimentaries to guests as gifts for their patronage (e.g., rewards points, show tickets). Answer guest questions about property facilities/services. Receive, record, and relay messages accurately, completely, and legibly. Required Qualification s - Fluent in English, Chinese - Good personality - Strong communication skills especially speaking - Positive interpersonal skills. - Able to work in a deadline and target. - Strong hospitality skills. Policies and Procedures - Maintain confidentiality of proprietary materials and information. - Protect the privacy and security of guests and coworkers. - Follow company and department policies and procedures. - Ensure personal appearance is clean, hygienic, professional and in compliance with company policies and procedures. Guest Relations - Contact, greet and welcome all arriving/returning owners, prospective owners and leads promptly and professionally with a smile, eye contact, and a friendly verbal greeting, using the guest's name when possible. - Actively listen and respond positively to guest questions, concerns, and requests using brand or property specific process to resolve issues, delight, and build trust. - Thank guests with genuine appreciation and provide a fond farewell. - Address guests' service needs in a professional, positive, and timely manner. Communication - Speak to guests and co-workers using clear, appropriate and professional language. - Talk with and listen to other employees to effectively exchange information. Working with Others - Support all co-workers and treat them with dignity and respect. - Develop and maintain positive and productive working relationships with other employees and departments. - Handle sensitive issues with employees and/or guests with tact, respect, diplomacy, and confidentiality. - Assist in creating a pleasant team work environment and  maintain a productive and positive team spirit. Quality Assurance/Quality Improvement - Comply with quality assurance expectations and standards. - Demonstrate total understanding of the Maikhao Beach Club culture as well as those standards of conduct and operation that exist with Marriott Vacation Club International (MVCI). Uphold MVCI’s highest standards of integrity and guest service. Sales - Promote awareness of brand image internally and externally. - Use sales techniques that maximize revenue while maintaining existing guest loyalty to Marriott. Other: - Perform all tasks in a timely manner ensuring all deadlines are met. - Perform other reasonable duty or function that may be assigned by management. - Be proactive and have a flexible approach to work, meeting the needs of the team and the business at all times. - Maintain an attitude and commitment to provide excellent service to all customers and associates. - Respond sensitively to the needs and feeling of others, regardless of status of position; accept interpersonal differences and maintain a constructive rapport with all associates and customers. - Maintain computer systems knowledge (Goldmine, Timeshareware, Outlook, Word and Excel). - Maintain current computer systems knowledge as used by the company. - Work with all colleagues as a team, supporting the needs within that team and those of the business at all times.

column8: Responsibilities: Demonstrate strong and clear leadership through consistent communication and direction, and assume direct responsibility for achieving sales goals nationwide. Maximize productivity and sales effectiveness by managing people internal & external for executing sales and marketing plans and promotional activities. Monitor and manage sales forecasts, budgets, volume, revenues and cost to identify improvement areas and adapt procedures or reallocate resources to improve overall sales performance. Monitor and increase the profitability by developing long-term and short-term sales goals, as well as channel strategies to achieve the company's target. Coach and counsel team member on improving team skills & capabilities. Sales and performance analysis, identify growth trends, opportunities and area of weaknesses in sales along with proposed corrective marketing actions. As one of department leaders, participate company decision making process. Also be responsible on delivering company operational profit as committed. Qualifications: Bachelor's Degree or Mater's Degree from any relevant fields Over 10 years experiences in insurance industry Strong knowledge in general insurance product Solid in business development, sales and marketing and customer experience management

Bachelor’s degree in Marketing or related fields. Winning attitude and commitment excellence. Presentation skills Good planning and management skill Good analytical and problem-solving skills Good communication skills Good teamwork skills

Jobtitle: Inside Sales Representative (chatter) - Text Sales Specialist for a Dating...
column8: Position Overview: We are currently seeking a talented and driven Inside Sales Representative with expertise in selling through text communication. This individual will be a key player in expanding our customer base, achieving sales targets, and contributing to the overall success of our dynamic team. Responsibilities: Engage with clients through text-based platforms,trying to sell our packages Articulate the value proposition of our products/services effectively in written communication. Develop and nurture relationships with clients to understand their needs and recommend suitable solutions. Meet and exceed monthly and quarterly sales targets through proactive selling. Collaborate with the broader sales and marketing team to optimize lead generation and customer acquisition strategies. Qualifications: Proven experience in inside sales with a focus on text-based communication. Exceptional written and verbal communication skills in English. Strong interpersonal skills and the ability to build rapport quickly. Goal-oriented with a track record of meeting or exceeding sales targets. Adaptability to various communication styles and customer preferences. Familiarity with dating industry is a plus. Requirements: Bachelor’s degree in Business, Marketing, or a related field (preferred). Previous experience in an office-based sales role. Proficiency in using CRM software and other sales tools. Enthusiasm for working in a collaborative office environment. Strong organizational and time-management skills. Compensation: Competitive base salary plus uncapped commission structure. Work schedule includes 7 working days a week. Benefits: Opportunities for career advancement within a growing company. Comprehensive health and wellness benefits. Ongoing training and professional development programs.

Jobtitle: Practice Development Manager (Sales) - Northeast and Central
column8: About this opportunity This individual will have previous sales experience and a proven sales record. Managing a sales area for Align Technology selling the Invisalign product. The individual will be responsible for selling the product, establishing account relationships and practice development in the assigned territory, as well as proactively communicating with customers and potential prospects. In this role, you will… Deliver Results Achievement of Monthly, Quarterly and Annual Sales Targets, MBO, Operational Plan and Profitability Plan for Thailand. Responsible for the working with assigned accounts and team within Align Tech (Thailand), including direction, motivation and development of sales plans, targets, and strategies and the removal of obstacles to success. Provide all appropriate reporting to the Regional Sales Manager including feedback from customers on a weekly and monthly report Responsible for the sales area as ‘their business’ and be willing to take responsibility for its planning and development in what is a high growth business. Work closely with co-colleagues to develop a high-performance team in Thailand and within SEA. Drive the Best Outcomes Acquire and maintain detailed knowledge of the company's products; Provide training in product knowledge, selling skills, and territory management, and Align Terms and Conditions of Business. Evaluation and coaching of co-colleagues through observation during co-travel, frequent feedback and the analysis of data. Evaluate levels of customer, product and systems knowledge via in-field assessment. Provide appropriate training and field coaching as required. Build strong ethical business relationships with customers to ensure usage of our products and gain greater market share by focusing high value activity and selling. Ensure professional dress code and attitude is maintained at all. Participate in proactive team efforts to achieve departmental, company goals and comply with all policies, practices and procedures. Work with the Regional Sales Manager to set Operational plan for future periods and perform other duties as assigned. Keep abreast of what competitors are doing; and update SEA Marketing Manager of market intelligence and pulses in the market. Be responsible for all quality updates records and customer product feedback for Thailand market. Comply with all policies, practices and procedures. Lock in Key Relationships Engage certified doctors and develop potential for new cases; engage non-certified doctors and establish their potential as an Invisalign provider and current submitters to develop Invisalign business. Balance the short term operational needs with the long term organizational needs of the business. Work closely with Marketing Manager to develop and implement sales and marketing strategies; such as management of Platinum Elite Accounts as well as opening new accounts and assist customers to achieve sales, distribution and display objectives. Requirements In this role, you’ll need … To perform this job successfully, the individual must have mastered the skill set of a Territory Manager. The requirements listed below are representative of the knowledge, skill, and/or ability required. Strong analytical and business planning skills High integrity Demonstrated leadership Track record of coaching/developing Sales Representatives Capacity to execute marketing plans Capacity to manage budgets and expenses Excellent written and verbal communication skills to diverse customer audiences. Strong capabilities to interface effectively with all customer types Ability to function effectively in a high performance team EDUCATION and/or EXPERIENCE BS or BA preferred and/or equivalent experience. A degree in sales, marketing or a related science discipline would be an advantage. medical, orthodontic, and/or dental sales and/or marketing experience preferred alternatively, background as dental therapist/hygienist and acquired valuable knowledge of the industry and its products Excellent oral and written communication skills Pride in excelling and self-directed individual. Computer knowledge is required. Provide support to audit processes and quality management system as required View more Welfare and Benefits - Provident Fund - Staff training and development - Social security - Health insurance - Performance/results-based bonus View more Align Technology (Thailand) Ltd. About Company Join a team that is transforming smiles, changing lives. At Align Technology, we believe a great smile can truly transform a person’s life, so we create technology that gives people the confidence to take on whatever’s next. We revolutionized the orthodontic industry with the introduction of the Invisalign system, and we have never lost sight of that spirit of innovation. Our teams are constantly pushing the boundaries of what’s possible. Ready to join us??

Jobtitle: Business Development Manager - Digital Marketing/ผู้จัดการฝ่ายพัฒนาธุรกิจ -...
column8: ADBRO is a global AdTech company. ADBRO specializes in high impact digital campaigns across major news publishers in South East Asia. We are the only regional marketing channel available programmatically in major DSPs (DV360, TTD, Amobee, etc.) to access exclusive high impact in-image inventory (e.g. rich media, e-com,  interactive, videos, contact forms, 3D).Our platform is built for the cookie-less world and allows advertisers to leverage our 1st party data from publishers (visual/semantic context, demographics, past users’ behavior) for their campaigns success. Do you feel the passion for digital marketing as strong as ours is? Join Thailand VC backed AdTech company to build your career in the dynamic digital marketing industry. You will have a chance to evolve in a rapidly changing environment and have firsthand experience with an international founding team of ADBRO. What you will do: Build relationships and manage delivering of digital ad campaigns for our clients; Promote ADBRO marketing solutions at Thailand market. What we expect from you: 2+ years in digital sector at account management, planning or sales roles; 2+ years of experience working in large media agencies; Establish connections with the Programmatic Team in each Media Agencies; Work closely under supervision of Business Development team; Excellent in Sale Presentation/process Be a contact point for any questions / campaign set up and deliver; Experience from top Advertising Agencies, digital publishers or programmatic networks; Understanding of programmatic ecosystem is a plus; Fluent English (level at least B1) What we offer: Fixed salary + unlimited commissions per quarter based on sales results; Time allowances for certifications at Google and Facebook platforms; Annual Paid Leave; Insurance Package; Opportunities to learn more about leadership, entrepreneurship and technical areas of digital marketing; Work from home.

Jobtitle: Sales and Marketing Manager ( Car Rental Business)
Company: Thai Group Holdings Public Company Limited
column8: We are seeking a marketing and Strategic manager to responsible for product, delivery and marketing throughout the product lifecycle. promote our company's brand and services. They will develop a vision and roadmap for the product based on input from internal stakeholders, customers, market research and their own industry insight. In this role, you will be optimizing our marketing strategies, managing the marketing department's budget and staff, as well as preparing forecasts. To ensure success, you will need extensive knowledge of marketing strategies and the ability to identify new business leads. An outstanding marketing manager will be someone whose expertise translates into increased brand awareness and profitability. Define the product strategy and roadmap Manage the product throughout its lifecycle from concept to end-of-life Collect, manage and maintain traceability of requirements from all stakeholders across product releases Propose a product marketing plan and budget and then deliver against it Write Product Requirements and Market Requirements documents Work with internal stakeholders and third parties to assess and establish partnerships Channel management and support Be the recognized expert in the business on the product, the market, relevant technology and the competition Develop core positioning and messaging for the product Evaluating and optimizing marketing budget and pricing strategies. Analyzing market trends and preparing forecasts. Generating new business leads. Increasing brand awareness and market share. Coordinating marketing strategies with the agency, sales, financial, public relations, and products. Developing and managing the marketing department's budget. Overseeing branding, advertising, and promotional campaigns. Managing the marketing department's staff. Preparing and presenting quarterly and annual reports to senior management. Promoting our brand at trade shows and major industry-related events. Keeping informed of marketing strategies and trends. Qualification Degree in marketing, finance, business administration, or similar. 10 years experience in the Automotive Industry Proficiency in digital marketing skill. Extensive knowledge of marketing strategies, channels, and branding. Expertise in the product or market including specific technical or industry knowledge Superior project management and interpersonal skills Ability to maintain a keen attention to detail, multitask and work well under pressure Natural tendency to be curious, positive and creative Team player who collaborates well with others Sincere empathy for the customer and a commitment to delving deep into the challenges they present or experience Superb leadership, communication, and collaboration abilities. Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills. Strong time management and organizational abilities.

Jobtitle: Sales Representative (ติดBTS พญาไท)/ตัวแทนฝ่ายการขาย
column8: Inception Maketing Group. ยินดีต้อนรับสู่บริษัทของคนรุ่นใหม่ ถ้าคุณกำลังมองหาประสบการณ์ที่แตกต่าง และรักความท้าทายในการขายแบบ F2F Marketing  มีโอกาสในการคิดและเสนอ และยังเป็นอาชีพที่มีความการก้าวหน้าอย่างชัดเจน ด้วยระบบการขายที่มืออาชีพที่มีมานานกว่า25ปี และมีการเทรนนิ่งที่ยอดเยี่ยม มาร่วม Play Learn Work และเติบโตไปพร้อมๆกัน ไม่รอช้ามาเป็นส่วนหนึ่งของ Inception marketing group *โปรดอ่านรายละเอียดก่อนสมัคร* Job decription รับผิดชอบในการสร้างยอดขายให้กับบริษัท เรียนรู้ทักษะพื้นฐานด้านการขายและการเจรจาต่อรอง เป็นตัวแทนฝ่ายขายสินค้าและบริการให้กับทางผู้ว่าจ้างหลากหลายทั้งในประเทศและต่างประเทศได้ เข้าร่วมประชุมตอนเช้าในออฟฟิศก่อนออกปฏิบัติงานนอกพื้นที่ ให้ข้อมูล ประชาสัมพันธ์สินค้าให้กับลูกค้า มีการจัดการกับลูกค้าที่ปฏิเสธได้อย่างมืออาชีพ รับผิดชอบต่อKPIหรือยอดขายที่ได้รับมอบหมาย Applicant qualifications เพศชาย-หญิง อายุ 22-30 ปี วุฒิป.ตรี หรือ เทียบเท่าทุกสาขาวิชา รักในการเรียนรู้และการพัฒนาตนเอง และมีทักษะการพูดที่ดี ทำงานเป็นระบบและสามารถทำงานเป็นทีมได้ ชอบบรรยากาศการทำงานที่สนุกสนาน มีทัศนคติที่ดีต่องานขาย มีความกะตือรืนร้น สดใส ร่าเริง มารยาทดี มีน้ำใจต่อเพื่อนร่วมงาน มีความมุ่งมั่น ลุยงาน อดทน ยินดีรับนักศึกษาจบใหม่ และผู้ที่ไม่มีประสบการณ์ทางด้านการขาย เริ่มงานได้ทันทีจะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ Benefits โบนัส 10- 30% ต่อสัปดาห์และคอมมิชชั่น โปรแกรมอบรมพัฒนาทักษะการขายและความสามารถด้วยระบบมาตรฐาน ประเมินการเลื่อนตำแหน่งจากผลงาน ไม่ใช่อายุงาน กิจกรรมประจำปี โอกาสเดินทางไปศึกษาดูงานที่ต่างประเทศ ทริปท่องเที่ยวทั้งในประเทศและต่างประเทศ How to apply 1) สมัครผ่าน Jobsdb (Click Apply Now) 2) E-mail บริษัท 3) โทรศัพท์สอบถามข้อมูล INCEPTION MARKETING GROUP CO.,LTD. 128/120 Phayathai Plaza Tower, 11th Floor, Unit 120, Phayathai Rd. Thung Phayathai, Ratchatewi, Bangkok, Thailand 10400 Contact person : HR Department (ROSE) Phone number : +66 2016 1315 instragram : inception.th Facebook : Inception Marketing Group Co., Ltd. สามารถดูรายละเอียดต่างๆ เพิ่มเติมที่เว็บไซต์ของบริษัทฯ : https://inceptionmarketingg.wixsite.com/mysit

We are seeking a seasoned Sales Manager to lay the foundation and lead the establishment of our sales team from inception. The ideal candidate will play a pivotal role in developing and implementing sales strategies, recruiting and managing a dynamic sales force, and driving business growth in the Aesthetics market. Key Responsibilities: Sales Strategy Development: Devise and implement comprehensive sales strategies aligned with company objectives, ensuring market penetration and revenue growth. Team Building & Management: Train, and manage a high-performing sales team, establishing sales targets, and fostering a culture of excellence and achievement. Market Expansion: Identify market opportunities, establish relationships with key stakeholders, and drive business expansion in the Aesthetics sector. Customer Relationship Management: Nurture and maintain relationships with clients, healthcare professionals, and industry partners to drive sales and foster long-term partnerships. Performance Monitoring: Implement systems to track sales metrics, analyze team performance, and optimize strategies to meet and exceed targets. Collaboration: Liaise cross-functionally with marketing, product development, and other teams to align strategies and achieve overall business objectives. Qualifications: 3-5 years of proven experience in sales team management, preferably in the medical devices or pharmaceuticals field within Aesthetics. Excellent written and verbal communication skills, adept at building rapport and negotiating effectively. Demonstrated creative leadership, integrity, and honesty in organizational dealings. Strong managerial skills with the ability to effectively lead and manage a team under pressure. Proven ability to work in fast-paced environments, meeting tight deadlines and driving results. Ready to dive into the exciting world of Aesthetics? We're on the lookout for go-getters! If you're enthusiastic and up for a challenge, this is your chance to shine! Let's team up and make things happen. Drop us your CV, expected salary, a recent pic, a copy of your ID, and your academic transcript via 'Apply Now' below. Let's kickstart something awesome together!" 😊 Clay International Holdings Ltd. 51 Major Tower Rama9 - Ramkhamhaeng, 20th Floor, Unit 2004 Rama9 - Ramkhamhaeng Road, Hua Mak , Bang Kapi District, Bangkok 10240 Tel: 02-116-0608 , 066 -112-0216 🚉 [link removed] Near us ; 600 m away from Airport link Ramkhanmhaeng station 100 m away from The Mall (Ramkhanmhaeng) and Klongtoey San Seab pier to Patunam Bus from Victory monument to the company 168,171, ปอ.พ4-2

Jobtitle: Sales Manager (B2G/ High Power Cable /Optic fiber / Renew energy products)
column8: Our client is an Asia company that is outstanding in several application areas in telecom, energy, renewable energy, maritime system, precision equipment, EPC, etc. Now, they are looking for a strong background candidate who has experience in selling Medium-High Voltage Power Cables/ Optic Fiber or renewable energy products such as lithium batteries and battery energy storage systems to the Government (EGAT, PEA, MEA ) or other general customers. Your Responsibilities: Proactively identify potential clients, build and maintain strong relationships with existing and new customers. Develop sales strategies and action plans to drive business growth and expand market presence. Analyze market trends, customer needs, and competitor activities to identify new opportunities and stay ahead of the competition. Provide regular reports on sales performance and present insights to the management team. Qualifications: 5-10 years of experience of sales management, business development, or related field in cable construction. If have an experience in B2G business is a big plus Excellent command of English, Chinese is an advantage Flexibility, good interpersonal and negotiation skills Apply now! For more details, please contact Areeya Wisetchoonhasilp Tel. 02-121-3528 / Email: areeya.w @ adecco.com

Manage own agents, do training, hold event, support agent close deals etc. Have good presentation skill, can traveling Do weekly report and monthly report to the management team. Who we are American International Group, Inc. (AIG) is a leading global insurance organization. Building on 100 years of experience, today AIG member companies provide a wide range of property casualty insurance, life insurance, retirement solutions, and other financial services to customers in more than 80 countries and jurisdictions. These diverse offerings include products and services that help businesses and individuals protect their assets, manage risks and provide for retirement security. About the role We are looking for a candidate with strong Marketing / Business Development skills. This role will be responsible for managing the relationship with intermediaries and business partners in the area of underwriting service delivery, market movements, and A&H system & administrative coordination. The ideal incumbent needs to evaluate the risk for new business & renewals in accordance with standards, to ensure profitable growth and keep abreast of market dynamics and demonstrate market cycle awareness to be able to operate effectively and appropriately. Responsible for the top line budget for group. Go out into the market and meet and manage brokers /agents relationship independently. Manage the sales and pipelines. Liaison and make joint calls with the CBE and Agency heads internally Discuss long term strategies , business numbers, risk appetite and provide training Provides A&H UW support to business partners by leveraging data, segmentation, and insights through researching, troubleshooting problems, reviewing applications, and working with customers to gather additional information where needed. Analyzes new business applications to determine risk factors and pricing insurance policies accordingly. Explains complex insurance policies to clients and answering questions they may have about their coverage. Providing recommendations regarding coverage amounts, policy features, and costs to meet the client’s needs. Communication Point of contact for business partners and other departments by understanding and identifying problems, researching answers, and guiding them through corrective steps. Have some underwriting authority, manage, train and develop the other production underwriter. Participating in underwriting meetings to discuss coverage options with other members of the underwriting team Market intelligence and competition. Maintaining current knowledge of industry regulations and standards. Researching claims history to determine whether claims were filed in the past or if there are any indications of fraudulent activity Improves business efficiency, maintains business operating excellence and admin performance by writing and maintaining business flows & documentation. Preparing reports detailing potential risks associated with proposed business ventures or existing operations. Ensuring that all documentation required by insurance regulators is complete and accurate. Accommodates on A&H solutions by recommending devices and techniques for A&H externalization systems and online solutions. Improves system performance by identifying problems and recommending changes. Education: a bachelor’s degree in business administration, Statistics or a related field.

Lead, inspire and motivate team member to always stay in a fast-paced, revenue-driven work environment. Always analyze and optimize on-the-go. column8: *ประกาศ !! Job Description Maintain sufficient potential customers’ pipeline as targeted. Develop new business in line with the sales strategy. Explore the logistics market and developments of potential customers in the market. Establish good relationship with the potential customers as well as our strategic partners. Help reduce cost and ensure maximization of profit for the company. Develop long-term customer relationships, and work with customers on supply chain solutions. Ensure the company achieves and maintains contracts, improves revenue and profit whilst balancing customer requirements and ensuring contracts are commercially positive. Improve the company’s professional image and raise the company awareness in the market. Review and produce the logistics proposal. Prepare sales material and marketing material to promote the company. Maintain proper filing of potential customer and existing client records. Collect necessary information to assess credit worthiness and help enforce agreed payment terms. Prepare sales and marketing plans according to his/her targets. Job Specifications Having customers on hands for starting up business by 2 months after joining Background in Logistics preferably or Business Management or Marketing. Excellent communication and presentation skills. 3-5 years experience in Logistics industry is a must. Strong negotiation and good presentation skills. Business and report writing. Ability to see the “Big Picture” and quickly reach an understanding of client’s business requirements. Strong research skills and service orientation and related skills. Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal. Willing to travel and meet customers. Strong computer literacy - MS Excel, Access, PowerPoint, Word, Project, Logistics modeling tools, routing and scheduling packages.

Jobtitle: Sales Executive (Work Near BTS Chongnonsri Station) - Urgently Required!!!
column8: Salary = 35K - 45K Depend on qualifications and experience Duties & Responsibilities: To be responsible for sales and assignment of exhibit space and VAS (Value Added Service) coupled with other sales related functions for assigned shows. To work co-operatively with industry groups, functional groups and associations in their role as contributor to the overall success of each show. To be proactive and keep abreast of competitive environment. To create an open line of communication with exhibitors, prospects, attendees, association, consultants, vendors. To maintain awareness of industry trends, climate, players, distribution and issues. Selling at competitive shows where applicable. To achieve sales target for assigned shows. To develop sales leads and maintain exhibitor prospect list. To obtain signed contracts and payments in full. To assist in consolidation of floor plan. To act as primary contact for all exhibitor inquiries/problems. To participate in floor plan audits. To coordinate special show features. To prepare and implement sales plan to meet budget. To prepare and present sales proposals to exhibitor prospects as and when required. Qualification: A tertiary degree from recognized university with at least 3-5 year’s relevant working experience. Bachelor's degree in any field Knowledge of Logistic Material Loading & Plastic Machine industry or Fastener. Knowledge of sales particularly telephones marketing. Effective oral and written communication. Good command of English in both writing and speaking Computer literacy is a pre-requisite.
