column8: Job Overview รายละเอียดงาน รูปแบบงาน : งานประจำ จำนวนที่รับ : ไม่ระบุ สถานที่ปฏิบัติงาน : กรุงเทพมหานคร(เขตพระโขนง,เขตประเวศ,เขตสวนหลวง,เขตบางนา) เงินเดือน(บาท) : 12,000 – 15,000 วันหยุด : ไม่ระบุ เวลาทำงาน : 10:00 – 19:30 เวลาทำงานอื่น : ไม่ระบุ หน้าที่ความรับผิดชอบ • เข้าเคสผ่าตัด ส่งเครื่องมือแพทย์ • ติดตามอาการคนไข้ • ดูแลคนไข้ก่อนและหลังศัลยกรรม คุณสมบัติผู้สมัคร เพศ : ไม่ระบุ อายุ(ปี) : 20 – 40 ระดับการศึกษา : ไม่ระบุ ประสบการณ์(ปี) : ไม่ระบุ อื่นๆ : ไม่ระบุ สวัสดิการ •ประกันสังคม •ค่าตอบแทนพิเศษ •เงินโบนัสตามผลงาน วิธีการสมัคร อีเมล : beproudclinic@gmail.com ติดต่อ กันตพัฒน์ บีพราวด์ เมดิคอล คลินิก 412 สุขุมวิท 101/1 แขวงบางจาก เขตพระโขนง จังหวัดกรุงเทพมหานคร 10260 ประเทศไทย) การเดินทาง BTS ปุณณวิถี, อุดมสุข About ผู้ช่วยแพทย์ ห้องผ่าตัดศัลยกรรม บีพราวด์ เมดิคอล คลินิก เกี่ยวกับเรา บีพราวด์ คลินิก ศัลยกรรมความงาม ปากกระจับ เสริมจมูก ตาสองชั้น เสริมคาง เทคนิคบวมน้อย เราใส่ใจในทุกผลงานและเต็มร้อยกับลูกค้าทุกคน ความสวยงาม และความปลอดภัยเป็นความสำคัญแรกของเรา รับประกันผลงานทุกผลงาน ยินดีและพร้อมรับคำติชมจากลูกค้า จริงใจ และเปิดเผยกับลูกค้า พร้อมให้คำแนะนำกับลูกค้าทุกท่าน Address บีพราวด์ เมดิคอล คลินิก 412 สุขุมวิท 101/1 แขวงบางจาก เขตพระโขนง จังหวัดกรุงเทพมหานคร 10260

Jobtitle: APAC Graduate Program-Leadership Experience and Accelerated Development (LEAD)
column8: Company Description Avery Dennison Corporation (NYSE: AVY) is a global materials science company specializing in the design and manufacture of a wide variety of labeling and functional materials. The company’s products and solutions, which are used in nearly every major industry, include pressure-sensitive materials for labels and graphic applications; tapes and other bonding solutions for industrial, medical, and retail applications; tags, labels and embellishments for apparel; and radio frequency identification (RFID) solutions serving retail apparel and other markets. The company employs approximately 36,000 employees in more than 50 countries. Reported sales in 2022 were $9billion. Learn more at www.averydennison.com. Job Description ABOUT LEAD The LEAD program is an accelerated growth career program that takes two years on average and emphasizes your experience in leadership and career development. The program has a comprehensive framework, depending on your chosen field, that covers on-the-job training through sub-functional and cross-functional rotations, stretch assignments and learning and training. APPLICATION AND SELECTION Please submit your CV through the designated job portal. We will screen the CV based on your education and experience. Those meeting the fundamental criteria will undergo a 30-minute video interview with our HR Team and another 30 mins video interview with the Hiring Manager (HM) The HR and HM teams will shortlist candidates who have demonstrated the requisite potential, as listed above, and invite them to participate in the two-day assessment center for final selection. ASSESSMENT CENTRE This year’s assessment center is a 2-day event where you will be assessed as a group together with other eligible candidates. The challenge theme for this year is Innovation and Sustainability. You must be able to attend this assessment event in-person for final selection, tentatively scheduled for 21st and 22nd Mar 2024. WHAT'S IN IT FOR YOU? Career Opportunity : Successful candidates will be enrolled in the APAC 'Leadership Experience and Accelerated Development' graduate program. Cash prizes : The winning team takes away USD800. Top 8 winners will get USD200 each Qualifications WHO CAN APPLY? We are seeking young talents who are in their final year of study or have graduated with less than 2 years of work experience in the following fields: Science, Technology, Engineering, Mathematics, Business, Logistics, Supply Chain, Communication, Psychology, Social Sciences You demonstrate the following potential: Embrace Challenges : You thrive on the impossible, turning hurdles into opportunities. Unleash Innovation : Innovation is your playground, where unconventional ideas come to life. Mind Sponge for Knowledge : You're a quick absorber, dissecting problems with original solutions. Fuelled by Determination : Challenges fuel your drive, overcoming odds with unwavering resolve. Team Dynamo : Collaboration ignites your energy, amplifying strength within teams. Influential Aura: Your credibility inspires and guides and your ability to get along with others builds connections. You must be able to enroll in the program in July 2024. Additional Information AVERY DENNISON IS AN EQUAL EMPLOYMENT OPPORTUNITY PROVIDER

column8: Job Overview รายละเอียดงาน สถานที่ปฏิบัติงาน : กรุงเทพมหานคร(ทุกเขต) สาขาอาชีพหลัก : การแพทย์ สาขาอาชีพรอง : นักกายภาพบำบัด รูปแบบงาน : งานประจำ ระดับตำแหน่งงาน : เจ้าหน้าที่ จำนวนที่รับ : 1 ตำแหน่ง เงินเดือน(บาท) : 25,000 – 40,000 วันทำงาน : ตามที่บริษัทกำหนด วันหยุด : ไม่ระบุ เวลาทำงาน : 12:00 – 21:00 เวลาทำงานอื่นๆ : หยุด 6 วัน/เดือน หน้าที่ความรับผิดชอบ •ทำหน้าที่ที่ได้รับมอบหมาย คุณสมบัติผู้สมัคร เพศ : ชาย อายุ(ปี) : 20 – 40 ระดับการศึกษา : ปริญญาตรี ประสบการณ์(ปี) : 1 – 2 คุณสมบัติผู้สมัครเพิ่มเติม •มีใจรักงานบริการ •วุฒิปริญญาตรีสาขากายภาพบำบัด •มีใบประกอบวิชาชีพโรคศิลป์ หรืออยู่ในช่วงดำเนินการ •พร้อมจะเรียนรู้เครื่องมือต่างๆ ทักษะการใช้เครื่องมือและการใช้ manual tech •ยินดีรับผู้ไม่มีประสบการณ์ สวัสดิการ •ค่าตอบแทนพิเศษ •ประกันสังคม •ตามข้อตกลงของบริษัท วิธีการสมัคร ชื่อผู้ติดต่อ : คุณไก่ เบอร์ผู้ติดต่อ : 0612895144 อีเมล : kainatjama@gmail.com ติดต่อ 275 ถนนสีลม BTS ศาลาแดงประตู 2 ติดกับร้านโจรสลัด แขวงสีลม เขตบางรัก จังหวัดกรุงเทพมหานคร 10500 ประเทศไทย การเดินทาง BTS ศาลาแดง MRT สีลม About นักกายภาพ ทริปเพิล ไรส์ ประเภทธุรกิจ : บริการ เกี่ยวกับเรา : smart guy clinic คลินิกความงามสำหรับผู้ชาย Address 275 ถนนสีลม BTS ศาลาแดงประตู 2 ติดกับร้านโจรสลัด แขวงสีลม เขตบางรัก จังหวัดกรุงเทพมหานคร 10500

Our mission at Mizunovo is to utilize experience in water treatment to solve problems with innovation, ingenuity, and imagination. At Mizunovo, we are committed to providing our customers with the best possible service and support. Our team of experienced professionals is always available to answer any questions and help our customers find the right solutions for their specific needs. The Role Key Responsibilities: Generate new leads and identify sales opportunities. Conduct market research to identify potential clients and sales strategies. Develop and maintain client relationships. Achieve and exceed sales targets. Provide feedback on market trends and customer needs. Collaborate with the team to enhance sales strategies and techniques. Qualifications: Proven experience in sales, lead generation, or a similar role. Excellent communication and negotiation skills. Self-motivated with a strong work ethic. Ability to work independently with minimal supervision. Strong organizational and time-management abilities. Knowledge of the water industry is a plus. Compensation: This is a commission-based position with no cap on earnings. Commission rates will be discussed during the interview process. Ideal Profile You have at least 1 year experience within a B2B Sales / Account Executive or Telesales role, ideally within the Electricity / Water and Infrastructure & Waste Management industry. You possess excellent interpersonal as well as written and verbal communication skills. You are a strong networker & relationship builder You are adaptable and thrive in changing environments You are a self-starter and demonstrate a high level of resilience What's on Offer? Attractive Salary & Benefits Leadership Role Flexible working options

Jobtitle: TH - AS Head of Marketing Expertise
column8: Company Description Believe is one of the world’s leading digital music companies. Believe’s mission is to develop local artists and labels in the digital ecosystem by providing them the solutions they need to grow their audience at each stage of their career and development. Its 1,650 employees in more than 50 countries aim to support local artists and labels with a unique digital expertise, respect, fairness and transparency. To support our fast-growing presence on all continents, we are constantly looking for new Believers to join us and make a stronger and more positive impact on the music industry! Believe is listed on compartment A of the regulated market of Euronext Paris (Ticker: BLV, ISIN: FR0014003FE9). www.believe.com Ready to #setthetone with Believe? Job Description Marketing Expertisement : Design, manage and evaluate marketing campaigns, analyze market trends and conduct competitor research. The ideal candidate to have a ROI-driven approach who understands the artist development, can build a long-term strategy in close partnership with the Sales team (Project Manager and A&R). This position would be responsible for building Top charting artists in the country. Data analysis : analyze audience, sales and performances history Strategy : Orchestrate Marketing team (Editorial & Marketing Partnership, Digital Marketing Manager and Video Manager)  to build creative & profitable marketing plan to develop project successfully and to drive market share/consumption on digital services. Work with Local, SEA & Central Artist Sucess team to develop marketing strategies to showcase Artist Services expertise and brand awareness. Develop strong partnerships with DSPs in the country to increase marketing opportunities, thus increasing market share Mentoring : Support and provide guidance and advice on the impact of marketing key results to Marketing team member (EMP, DM, VM) Qualifications Able to build and manage strong relationships within marketing team, cross-functional colleagues, and external partners. Ability to deliver effective & clear communication and aligns with company’s strategic goals. Highly developed level of emotional intelligence Very digital friendly : focus on online audience development and digital content strategy Ability to build creative and innovative artist development campaigns Data driven : ability to analyze and use data to optimize development Structured, organized ability to follow process and monitor budgets Motivated to work with a fast moving and rapidly developing roster Extensive knowledge of variey of music genres Fluent in Thai & English Additional Information Believe is committed to ensuring equal opportunities in employment, regardless of origin, sex, morals, sexual orientation, gender, age, family status pregnancy, political opinions, trade union activities, religious beliefs, physical appearance, family name, place of residence, state of health, or disability.

Strive for the success of customer adoption by delivering the value of the Bill One service, establishing the service as an indispensable business infrastructure, and securing eventual contract renewal and expansion opportunities. Responsibilities Efforts toward customer success and operational support are required for local and international customers of the Bill One service based in Thai and ASEAN regions in the future customers who have completed the onboarding phase and enhanced usage for adoption. Develop a "trusted adviser" relationship with customer stakeholders and be focused on ensuring that the customers leverage the Bill One service to achieve full business value on overall product adoption; identify growth opportunities and potential risks within the customer's portfolio. Conduct periodic meetings for confirmation of operation status and areas for improvement of functions and services for the Product Development Department based on customer feedback and Thai regulations. Support product promotion by delivering product value to customers as new functions are released, communicating case studies and customer references to support sales activities, and improving existing processes to better serve the customers. Based on those best practices and success cases, educate the customer and employee through direct interaction, webinars, and events. ・ Account management after onboarding support and seeking expansion opportunities such as upsells and obtaining referrals. Preferred Personality: Customer-oriented and high communication skills Product-oriented and interested in improving the service or product and integration with other services Strong will and passion to create and develop a new market that sympathizes with the company's Mission and Vision Value (Katachi) Teamwork makes the dream work. the organization is still small and proactive approaches in taking initiative and supporting other teams are our team's culture Skills General financial and/or accounting knowledge and/or skills in accounting and/or financial auditing (min. 3 years)Experience in the B2B consulting industry is a bonus

Job Title Ultrasound GI Product specialist Job Description Philips is a global leader in health technology, committed to improving billions of lives worldwide and striving to make the world healthier and more sustainable through innovation. Driven by the vision of a better tomorrow. But it’s not just what we do, it’s who we are. We are 80,000, wonderfully unique individuals, with two things in common. An unwavering sense of purpose and a relentless determination to deliver on our customers’ needs. It’s what inspires us to create meaningful solutions – the kind that make a real difference – when it matters most. The world and our customers’ needs are changing faster than ever before and while we are proud of what we do already, we know we can do more. That’s why we need you, to help us tackle increasingly complex challenges posed by ever evolving health and well-being needs. In this role, you have the opportunity to make life better Looking at the challenges the world is facing today Philips’ purpose has never been more relevant. So whatever your role, if you share our passion for helping others, you’ll be working towards creating a better and fairer future for all. You are responsible for Be the voice of Partner with Philips stakeholders, act as SME on projects related to the indirect business & service Enable commercial success with strong sales and service delivery performance Support the commercial & marketing teams with the creation and execution of business plan with Partners Define, implement, and train Partners and/or Market on relevant indirect sales and services Philips processes and tools Monitor and improve process performance with focus on regulatory and end customer satisfaction Participate in the selection, onboarding and evaluation of Sales and Service Partners and create action plan to develop their capabilities Perform tactical and operational indirect channel sales activities Analyses performance of the indirect channel partners, identifies problems, and formulates recommendations; Initiates & runs improvement projects together with the partners Maintains methodologies and best practices within the area of responsibility Combines available knowledge, build new insights To succeed in this role, you’ll need a customer-first attitude and the following Bachelor’s Degree Holder in related disciplines. Minimum 5 Years’ Experience in preferably in Healthcare, Medical Devices. Knowledge and experience in hospital workflow, client and stakeholder management is advantageous. Self-motivated individual with the ability to take ownership and multitask in a fast paced and challenging environment. Attention to detail is a must, coupled with a "roll-up-your-sleeves can-do” attitude. Ability to demonstrate experience in managing diverse groups of stakeholders. Excellent in interpersonal and communication skills with proven ability to influence all levels of stakeholders. How we work at Philips Our newly-adopted hybrid work concept fuses flexibility with collaboration to deliver great outcomes for our people and our customers. We are embracing an approach wherein we spend more time together than apart – which for full-time employees translates to an average of at least 3 days working from the office and up to 2 days from home – for our hybrid roles. Hybrid work flexibility means people can meet the changing demands of work and home in the most balanced, productive, and healthy way. Our hybrid working model is defined in 3 ways: We believe in the importance of impactful collaboration: There's a certain energy when everyone’s in the same room that can heighten idea generation and creative friction needed for problem-solving. We embrace flexibility: Choosing where, when and how to work can vary according to task and team schedules. Flexibility isn’t office or online, it means choosing the space that works best for you, your teams and our customers on a case-by-case basis. We want to be at our best: The way we work and our workspaces are designed to support our well-being, offer career advancement opportunities, and enable us to be at our best. Why should you join Philips? Working at Philips is more than a job. It’s a calling to create a healthier society through meaningful work, focused on innovative, customer-first health technology solutions. Help us improve the health and well-being of billions of people, every year. Ultimately creating a career that no one could have planned for. Even you.

Tasks & responsibilities • Analyze the KAM business for identifying business opportunities based on performance reports, environmental trends, risk assessment and account needs • Prospect growth opportunities and understand customer insights deeply • Develop the KAM strategy aligned with MKT, Technical, KAE, and relevant parties • Proper develop KAM plan and align with the OPU business and financial plan • Execute on the KAM Plan to meet / exceed its objectives, by focusing on KAM's coaching days, KAE days in the field, interaction frequency, target account reach and coaching the coach days (KAM coaching), Account Plans execution • Monitor and evaluate regularly the implementation of the KAM Plan (incl. budgets and expenses) and its target achievement, and take appropriate actions to achieve the objectives of the KAM Plan Requirements • Business related Degree; Degree in Veterinary Medicine and/or Animal Science, an advantage. • Key Account Management experience in an animal industry in a multinational company is preferred but not required. • Excellent verbal and written communication skills. • Self-motivated, responsible, and flexible. Our Company At Boehringer Ingelheim we develop breakthrough therapies that improve the lives of both humans and animals. Founded in 1885 and family-owned ever since, Boehringer Ingelheim takes a long-term perspective. Now, we are powered by 52,000 employees globally who nurture a diverse, collaborative and inclusive culture. We believe that if we have talented and ambitious people who are passionate about innovation, there is no limit to what we can achieve. Why Boehringer Ingelheim? With us, you can grow, collaborate, innovate and improve lives. We offer challenging work in a respectful and friendly global working environment surrounded by a world of innovation driven mindsets and practices. In addition, learning and development for all employees is key, because your growth is our growth. Boehringer Ingelheim is an equal opportunity global employer who takes pride in maintaining a diverse and inclusive culture. We embrace diversity of perspectives and strive for an inclusive environment, which benefits our employees, patients and communities. Want to learn more? visit https://www.boehringer-ingelheim.com

Tasks & responsibilities • Optimize calls to customers and execution of key account business plan. • Monitors local market conditions for changes that impact business. • Manages programs and budgets to stay within standards. • Identify opportunities that meet both territory and brand tactics. • Customizes approach for each call on each customer to assess customer needs and increase key account of BI products. • Has excellent understanding of customer priorities/needs and keeps abreast of changes in the local health economy. Requirements • Bachelors degree in Veterinary Medicine or related field, and/or Doctoral degree (eh. PhD, MD) and/or veterinary. • Total at least 3 years experience in a sales capacity of which a minimum of 2 years were in the Animal Health or related industry • Proven disciplined sales training • Must be self-motivated, responsible and flexible • Customer understanding • Commercial awareness Our Company At Boehringer Ingelheim we develop breakthrough therapies that improve the lives of both humans and animals. Founded in 1885 and family-owned ever since, Boehringer Ingelheim takes a long-term perspective. Now, we are powered by 52,000 employees globally who nurture a diverse, collaborative and inclusive culture. We believe that if we have talented and ambitious people who are passionate about innovation, there is no limit to what we can achieve. Why Boehringer Ingelheim? With us, you can grow, collaborate, innovate and improve lives. We offer challenging work in a respectful and friendly global working environment surrounded by a world of innovation driven mindsets and practices. In addition, learning and development for all employees is key, because your growth is our growth. Boehringer Ingelheim is an equal opportunity global employer who takes pride in maintaining a diverse and inclusive culture. We embrace diversity of perspectives and strive for an inclusive environment, which benefits our employees, patients and communities. Want to learn more? visit https://www.boehringer-ingelheim.com

Manatal is an HRTech software service (B2B SaaS) company headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Manatal is one of the fastest-growing start-ups in the region and is backed by Surge and Sequoia Capital. Manatal has a global presence and is trusted by thousands of businesses in over 130 countries. Our goal is to transform the entire hiring process by making it simple, efficient, and enjoyable for recruiters, hiring managers, and candidates alike. Our mission is to offer the best-in-class AI-powered technologies to empower small, medium, and large businesses in their staffing & recruitment transformation. Business Development Intern [Outbound] You will be a key member of the Manatal sales team assisting in the successful acquisition of new clients. This role is for someone who has an entrepreneurial spirit and is seeking a fast-paced environment. Responsibilities: Proactively identify and target potential new clients through multichannel outbound strategies, including cold calls, emails, and social media outreach. Conduct initial qualification of leads and set up meetings and product demonstrations for our customer success team management. Manage and maintain a pipeline of interested prospects. Identify best practices to refine the company's lead generation playbook Monitor competition, economic indicators, and industry trends Manage relationships with key principals through frequent communication and reporting, emphasizing on an update on product market situation, and product development in the market. Maintained detailed records of outreach activities, client interactions, and feedback in the CRM. Stay updated on Manatal's product offerings, competitor landscape, industry trends, and best practices. Meet or exceed monthly and quarterly outreach and lead generation targets. Other tasks as directed by the CEO or Management. Required Skills and Experience: 0-1 years of experience in an outbound sales or business development role. Fluent in English communication Preferred experience in B2B sales. Preferred experience of successfully sourcing and qualifying leads. Excellent communication skills (written and verbal). Strong organizational and time-management skills. Ability to work independently and as part of a collaborative team.

What is #LifeatAF? How can we crystalize its DNA into one eye-catching sentence for you? Our culture is defined by our people! Everyone is an approachable professional, tenacious and versatile, a challenging team member, and a respected and valued mentor. We are looking for a seasoned sales leader with demonstrated commercial achievements and acumen, to lead our SEA and ANZ account management team. You will be responsible for leading and coaching the Account Management Team to retain, and grow our book of business in SEA and ANZ. This role is based in Bangkok. As a leader in our sales team, you will be data-driven, familiar with complex/strategic sales processes, comfortable in a fast-paced hyper growth environment, develop strategic relationships with C-levels, and evangelize AppsFlyer as the Mobile Growth and Attribution Authority. What you'll do: Plan and execute quarterly and annual strategies to grow your book of business Work closely with supporting functions and product teams on new product GTMs, building pipeline and retaining revenue Be directly involved in forwarding key opportunities Consistently achieve bookings quota targets Consistently achieve GRR and NRR targets Adopt and advocate AppsFlyer’s Account Management Playbook Adopt and improve processes to enable success Nurture and manage C-Level relationships across our strategic account base Manage & forecast your pipeline accurately through SalesForce Coach and train your team to excel in their roles Advocate for your team’s resourcing, training and support needs Thrive in an environment of competition and change Who you are: 5+ years of SaaS sales experience with top companies in SEA 2+ years of sales team management experience 4+ years of account management experience Proven performance over-achieving quota targets Experience managing complex and competitive sales cycles Experience in negotiating multi year contracts Comfortable in a farmer role and highly organized Revenue focused and driven Data-driven; able to critically evaluate information and data to build opportunities and manage retention Collaborative with a focus on company, team, then self Strong understanding of digital and mobile marketing ecosystem Desire to understand our technology from end to end Strong business acumen and professionalism Comfortable with regular travel Fluent in English Bonus points: Martech or Mobile sales experience Being introduced by an AppsFlyer team member Experience in working with Mobile Measurement Partner (MMP) platforms Proficient in Vietnamese or Bahasa Indonesia

Responsibilities: Managing a team of Sales Representatives that serve as the initial sales engagement to potential net-new customers. Drive the development of sales skills, including inbound/outbound prospecting, lead/qualification, and objection handling. Teach, coach and mentor the next generation of successful sales professionals. Develop solution proposals encompassing all aspects of the business applications. Participate in the creation, presentation and sale of a complete value proposition via the telephone, internet, and in-person customer meetings. Comfortable with Contract negotiation Skilled with account planning, reporting, and coordinating what assistance you need from other areas of the business such as bid team, Technical/Solution Architects, etc. Qualification: Bachelor’s Degree Minimum 2-3 years’ experience in Sales/Business Development with knowledge of SaaS or Salesforce applications (a plus) Track record of successful business development in enterprise solutions, software, or tech sales environment. Proven sales skills delivering inbound & outbound experiences and building strong relationships at multiple levels within an organization. Experience managing all areas of the BDR process including account planning, pre-call preparation, opportunity qualification, and objection handling. Fluency in English Highly motivated and ambitious. At least 1-2 years of lead generation/selling experiences. Team player and ability to work in a high energy sales environment. Welfare & Benefits: Social Security Group Health Insurance Annual medical check-up Training program for the first 3 months with a Salesforce expert Award for passing the certification exam, up to 5,000 Thai Baht, and the company will absorb the certification exam fee Soft skill training, including communication and other essential workplace skills Performance Bonus New Year party Company Outing Birthday Leave Working days: Mon-Fri (09.00 – 18.00) Hybrid working Working Location: 1/7 Soi Ladprao 64 Yak 4, Wang Thonglang Subdistrict, Wang Thonglang District, Bangkok 10310 If you are interested, please send resume to suprawee.pr@b3tech.co.th https://www.b3-tech.co.th/ https://www.facebook.com/b3techthailand/

Job Description Selling company columns & consumables products to end-users in assigned territories, through multichannel inbound and outbound sales activities (phone, webchat, e-mail) Works towards driving proactive culture of calling customer based on database and generate new business Utilization of SAP CRM for updating the funnel and reporting Responsible for handling inbound enquiries for columns & consumables of chromatography and spectroscopy instruments Utilizing technical knowledge to deliver value to customers whilst driving the complete Agilent portfolio, willing to speak to customer to resolve customer issues Works closely with the sales management to drive sales and campaigns targeting various product lines and targets Maintain positive business relationships and improve customer satisfaction Ensures the portfolio is represented in all relevant customer-facing meeting and sales-oriented activities across the territory Meet targets assigned for new business drive and ramp to volume activities of new products released Use demand generation leads to create opportunities for sales order Works on inside sales assignments with broadly defined objectives (including driving customer to online store) Utilizing SalesLoft and other sales tools to drive Ecommerce business effectively Weekly report of sales pipeline and forecast Qualifications Bachelor's or Master's Degree or equivalent 2-3 years of experience in inside/field sales position within a chromatography or spectroscopy company would be required Excellent tele-sales skills preferably in a technical sales environment Ability to effectively communicate on phone, oral and written communications, good English is benefit Comfortable with communicating and presenting proposals via webex/MS Teams Enjoying working in customer-facing environment Competency of advance MS Excel functions is highly appreciated (vlookup, pivot table, etc) Meticulous, customer-centric, proactive, goal-oriented and good time management Can work under pressure. High customer satisfaction/loyalty Firm believer of constant change and is highly adaptable in rapid change environment Able to work independently with minimal supervision. Excellent time management and problem-solving skills Ability to work as a team, willing to share and exchange information among team Agilent Technologies Inc. is an equal opportunity employer. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, protected veteran status, disability or any other protected categories under all applicable laws. Option to Work Remote Yes Travel Required Occasional Schedule Schedule:Full time Shift Day Duration No End Date Job Function Sales

Company: บริษัท ริชโค่ กรุ๊ป (ประเทศไทย) จำกัด
column8: Come and be part of the original American Legend of Harley-Davidson®. Richco Harley-Davidson® is the only Authorized Harley-Davidson® Dealership in Northern Thailand. We offer world-class training at the Harley-Davidson® university. Apply now to be a part of our warm and welcoming work environment. จำนวนอัตรา 1 จังหวัด เชียงใหม่ ระดับการศึกษา ไม่ระบุ รายละเอียด Male/Female Aged 35-40 years old Responsible More than 5 years of work experience Good communication skills in English Proven retail management experience in a multi-store setting. Knowledge or experience with Harley-Davidson Apparel and Licensing preferred. Familiarity with Point-of-Sale and Parts & Service management software. สวัสดิการ - ประกันสังคม - ประกันอุบัติเหตุ - ประกันสุขภาพ - วันหยุดนักขัตฤกษ์ 13 วันต่อปี - วันลาพักร้อน 6 วัน หลังจากทำงานครบ 1 ปี - ชุดฟอร์มพนักงาน - เบี้ยขยัน - โบนัสประจำปี เวลาทำงาน ประจำ เงินเดือน 30,000-35,000 บาท สนใจติดต่อ คุณสุดธิดา ปาณัษเฐียร เบอร์โทร 052-080-761 เว็บไซต์ https://richcoharley.com/

Company: The Hongkong and Shanghai Banking Corporation Limited
column8: Job description If you’re looking for a career that will unlock new opportunities, join HSBC and experience the possibilities. Whether you want a career that could take you to the top, or simply take you in an exciting new direction, HSBC offers opportunities, support and rewards that will take you further. HSBC is recognized as one of the top tier providers of Global Payments and Cash Management services in the Asia-Pacific region. As more corporate and institutional clients continue to consolidate their banking activities with the introduction of payments and cash management services, the potential growth of this business is substantial. Our customers view our regional client service proposition as a key element in deciding with whom to mandate their business. Principal responsibilities Responsible for the marketing, selling of domestic and regional cash management solutions to the Bank's Corporate and Institutional client base Responsible for supporting the Sales Head with sales activities in Commercial Banking by engaging in initiatives and projects to bring in new revenue streams for the bank. Work collaboratively with regional and global Sales Managers in identifying business opportunities for both inward and outward referrals. Work cohesively with other Global Liquidity and Cash Management units (Product and Client Management) and other areas of HSBC (RM, GM, GTRF, SSV, etc); and support the ongoing development of Global Liquidity and Cash Management business in Thailand. Requirements Enthusiastic and eager to learn the arts and craft of Sales/Marketing and business development especially in banking. Ability to charm clients and stakeholders Strong communication, interpersonal and negotiation skills and ability to liaise effectively with personnel across functions. Ability to meet challenging budget and to work under high pressure environment. Possession of a positive attitude to customer-service handling. Fluency in English and Thai is mandatory.

We’re looking for extraordinary people with sales or sales development experience, who can demonstrate the added value that AppsFlyer can bring to our client’s bottom line. In this role, you will be researching, outreaching, prospecting, and qualifying new sales opportunities and leading a successful handover to the closing team. If you’re tenacious, curious, creative and ready for an impactful role in a fast-paced, SaaS company, AppsFlyer is looking for you to join our high-performing Sales Development team. The AppsFlyer SDR team is key to the success of our Korea Sales organization, as we own the top of the sales funnel - pipeline creation. The SDR is often our customer’s first experience with AppsFlyer, so you need to be able to build strong rapport, qualify our prospects and identify what the appropriate next steps should be What you’ll do Proactively pursue new business opportunities via inbound, outbound, partner &, marketing collaboration, events and other means Conduct deep discovery conversations in target accounts Generate high-value, well-qualified sales opportunities within target markets and industries. Followed with continuous collaboration with your sales partner to grow the pipeline. Work closely with all the companies GTM teams; Sales, Marketing and Partners. Map prospective accounts based on organizational structure, people, and technology. Engage all levels of personnel throughout the prospective companies via multiple channels (calls, emails, linkedin, events, social etc..) Leverage the technology stack available to reach the prospective market & cultivate relationships to build trust with potential customers through effective communication. Maintain in-depth knowledge of markets and companies. Continuously seek self-improvement and learning opportunities. What you have Proficient English & native level Korean language A minimum of 2 years of sales or related market/business experience in the tech industry. Strong interpersonal and communication skills. Ability to think critically and demonstrate a growth mindset. Excellent time management and prioritization skills. Strong technical orientation. Tenacity, resilience, and a results-driven attitude. Strong team player with a positive attitude and open to feedback. Bonus Points Experience in Mobile and/or SaaS-based companies Experience with Salesforce, Outreach, SalesLoft, LinkedIn Sales Navigator, LeadIQ / ZoomInfo or other sales development related tools Being recommended by an AppsFlyer employee Experience in digital marketing or analytics As a global company operating from 25 offices across 19 countries, we reflect the human mosaic of the diverse and multicultural world in which we live. We ensure equal opportunities for all of our employees and promote the recruitment of diverse talents to our global teams without consideration of race, gender, culture, or sexual orientation. We value and encourage curiosity, diversity, and innovation from all our employees, customers, and partners. “As a Customer Obsessed company, we must first be Employee Obsessed. We need to make sure that we provide the team with the tools and resources they need to go All-In.” Oren Kaniel, CEO

Jobtitle: เจ้าหน้าที่อาวุโส สำนักยุทธศาสตร์และชักชวนนักลงทุน (ด้านการต่างประเทศ)
column8: 1. งานที่รับผิดชอบที่สำคัญ ภารกิจด้านความร่วมมือต่างประเทศ • สนับสนุนดำเนินงานด้านความร่วมมือต่างประเทศกับหน่วยงานพันธมิตรในแต่ละประเทศของ สกพอ. (ครอบคลุมการดำเนินงานด้านส่งเสริมการลงทุน จนถึง ความสัมพันธ์ระหว่างประเทศ ทั้งภายใต้กรอบความร่วมมือ และการลงนามความร่วมมือระหว่างประเทศ) • อำนวยความสะดวกและดำเนินงานด้านการรับรองคณะฯ และหน่วยงานหรือองค์กรต่างๆ จากทั้งในและต่างประเทศ ในบริบทที่เกี่ยวข้องกับเขตพัฒนาพิเศษภาคตะวันออก • ดำเนินงานสนับสนุนความร่วมกับสถานทูตในต่างประเทศ องค์กร/หน่วยงานส่งเสริมการลงทุนต่างประเทศในไทย เพื่อกระชับความร่วมมือและสร้างช่องทางสื่อสารกับนักลงทุนต่างประเทศในไทย • จัดทำข้อมูล วิเคราะห์ประเด็นที่เกี่ยวข้องกับการชักชวนนักลงทุนในอุตสาหกรรมเป้าหมาย เพื่อสนับสนุนการประชุม สัมมนา รวมทั้งการสื่อสารประชาสัมพันธ์ ภารกิจด้านยุทธศาสตร์ต่างประเทศ • ปฏิบัติหน้าที่ตามแผนปฏิบัติการดำเนินงานภายใต้ยุทธศาสตร์ความร่วมมือประเทศเป้าหมาย และสนับสนุนการดำเนินงานตามแผนปฏิบัติการของ สกพอ. • สนับสนุนการดำเนินการสื่อสารความก้าวหน้าของการพัฒนาเขตพัฒนาพิเศษภาคตะวันออก เพื่อสร้างความเข้าใจให้กับหน่วยงานพันธมิตรและภาคเอกชนต่างประเทศ ผ่านการประชุมในระดับทวิภาคี และพหุภาคี การจัดกิจกรรมชักชวนการลงทุนทั้งในและต่างประเทศ การจัดกิจกรรมร่วมกับหน่วยงานพันธมิตรในโอกาสสำคัญที่เกี่ยวข้องกับการลงทุน 2. คุณสมบัติ การศึกษา: ระดับปริญญาตรี สาขาบริหารธุรกิจ การตลาด เศรษฐศาสตร์ ความสัมพันธ์ระหว่างประเทศ หรือสาขาที่เกี่ยวข้อง หรือสาขาอื่นใดที่เกี่ยวข้องกับอุตสาหกรรมเป้าหมาย ประสบการณ์การทำงาน: มีประสบการณ์การทำงานที่เกี่ยวข้องกับต่างประเทศ หรือ มีประสบการณ์ในการปฏิบัติหน้าที่ในหน่วยงานรัฐ อย่างน้อย 3 ปี ระดับความรู้ภาษาต่างประเทศ: สามารถสื่อสารภาษาอังกฤษหรือภาษาที่สาม (จีน เกาหลีใต้ ญี่ปุ่น) ในเชิงธุรกิจ และความสัมพันธ์ระหว่างประเทศได้ ทักษะอื่นๆ : สามารถใช้โปรแกรมคอมพิวเตอร์พื้นฐานในการทำงานได้ อัตรา 1 ตำแหน่ง / สำนักงานคณะกรรมการนโยบายเขตพัฒนาพิเศษภาคตะวันออก (สกพอ.)

column8:
จำนวนอัตรา 4 จังหวัด กรุงเทพ ระดับการศึกษา ไม่ระบุ รายละเอียด สมัครด่วน Line : kiss555666888 มีประสบการณ์เซลล์ความงาม , telesales , หรือเซล ใดๆ ก็ได้ จะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ มี ปสก เซลคลินิก ความงาม / ศัลยกรรม มี sales skill ที่ดี เคยผ่านการเทรน มาก่อน สามารถ ออกกล้อง ไลฟ์สด ในเพจ หรือ tiktok ได้ สามารถ ตอบแชทเพจ ได้ตลอด ที่ว่าง แม้นอกเวลาเข้างาน เพราะได้ค่าคอมด้วย ทำงานในแรงกดดันได้ดี ขายเก่ง พูดเก่ง กล้าแสดงออก กล้าขาย เพิ่มยอดขายให้คลินิก ทำงาน 12:00-20:30 น Mindset ดี รักความก้าวหน้า ความสำเร็จ กระตุ้นตัวเองและทีมได้ตลอดเวลา ทำงานเป็นทีมได้ดี เข้ากับหัวหน้า เพื่อนร่วมงานได้ดี เรียนรู้ไว พร้อมพัฒนา ฉลาด เพศ ญ เท่านั้นคะ สวัสดิการ - ทำงาน 6 วันต่อสัปดาห์ - วันหุยดนักขัตฤกษ์ตามธนาคาร - ค่าคอมมิชชั่น - ทำศัลยกรรม ราคาพนักงาน - ทำสกิน, ร้อยไหม, botox, filler ลด 50%-80% เวลาทำงาน ประจำ เงินเดือน เงินประจำ 15,000 รวมค่าคอม ประมาณ 60,000-80,000 ต่อเดือน บาท สนใจติดต่อ HR เบอร์โทร 095-949-6536 เว็บไซต์ http://www.facebook.com/shuclinics SHU Clinic SHU Clinic

Jobtitle: APAC Graduate Program-Leadership Experience and Accelerated Development (LEAD)
column8: Company Description Avery Dennison Corporation (NYSE: AVY) is a global materials science company specializing in the design and manufacture of a wide variety of labeling and functional materials. The company’s products and solutions, which are used in nearly every major industry, include pressure-sensitive materials for labels and graphic applications; tapes and other bonding solutions for industrial, medical, and retail applications; tags, labels and embellishments for apparel; and radio frequency identification (RFID) solutions serving retail apparel and other markets. The company employs approximately 36,000 employees in more than 50 countries. Reported sales in 2022 were $9billion. Learn more at www.averydennison.com. Job Description ABOUT LEAD The LEAD program is an accelerated growth career program that takes two years on average and emphasizes your experience in leadership and career development. The program has a comprehensive framework, depending on your chosen field, that covers on-the-job training through sub-functional and cross-functional rotations, stretch assignments and learning and training. APPLICATION AND SELECTION Please submit your CV through the designated job portal. We will screen the CV based on your education and experience. Those meeting the fundamental criteria will undergo a 30-minute video interview with our HR Team and another 30 mins video interview with the Hiring Manager (HM) The HR and HM teams will shortlist candidates who have demonstrated the requisite potential, as listed above, and invite them to participate in the two-day assessment center for final selection. ASSESSMENT CENTRE This year’s assessment center is a 2-day event where you will be assessed as a group together with other eligible candidates. The challenge theme for this year is Innovation and Sustainability. You must be able to attend this assessment event in-person for final selection, tentatively scheduled for 21st and 22nd Mar 2024. WHAT'S IN IT FOR YOU? Career Opportunity : Successful candidates will be enrolled in the APAC 'Leadership Experience and Accelerated Development' graduate program. Cash prizes : The outperforming team will be rewarded USD800. The Top 8 performers will be rewarded USD200 each Qualifications WHO CAN APPLY? We are seeking young talents who are in their final year of study or have graduated with less than 2 years of work experience in the following fields: Science, Technology, Engineering, Mathematics, Business, Logistics, Supply Chain, Communication, Psychology, Social Sciences You demonstrate the following potential: Embrace Challenges : You thrive on the impossible, turning hurdles into opportunities. Unleash Innovation : Innovation is your playground, where unconventional ideas come to life. Mind Sponge for Knowledge : You're a quick absorber, dissecting problems with original solutions. Fuelled by Determination : Challenges fuel your drive, overcoming odds with unwavering resolve. Team Dynamo : Collaboration ignites your energy, amplifying strength within teams. Influential Aura: Your credibility inspires and guides and your ability to get along with others builds connections. You must be able to enroll in the program in July 2024. Additional Information AVERY DENNISON IS AN EQUAL EMPLOYMENT OPPORTUNITY PROVIDER

About the company AWE Global Concepts LLP is a subsidiary of AWE Global Investments Pte Ltd. At AWE Global Concepts, we develop your ideas into concepts and make them into reality. From events to exhibitions, we focus on delivering your projects executed with the highest standards to ensure your satisfaction. Established in Singapore since 2012, we are now expanding our business into Thailand. Brief nature of business: • LED video wall rental and distributorship • Events • Exhibitions • Festive Décor About the candidate We are looking for a resilient, passionate and ambitious business development executive to contribute to the growth of AWE Global Concepts in Thailand. Business development executives are responsible for finding and retaining clients, encouraging existing clients to purchase added products or features, and remaining abreast of changes in consumption. To be successful as a business development executive, you should be adept in networking with the intention of attracting and retaining clientele. Ultimately, an outstanding business development executive will keep a close eye on clients' feedback to ensure that our products and services always exceed expectations. Business Development Executive Responsibilities: · Familiarizing yourself with all products and services offered by our company. · Procuring new clients through ways such as direct contact, word-of-mouth · Search for the new clients and project opportunities in the commercial display market (LED Display, LED Videowall, Digital Signage); · Attending networking activities to research and connect with prospective clients. · Maintaining meaningful relationships with existing clients to ensure that they are retained. · Suggesting upgrades or added products and services that may be of interest to clients. · Crafting business proposals and contracts to draw in more revenue from clients. · Negotiating with clients to secure the most attractive prices. · Reviewing clients' feedback and implementing necessary changes. · Remaining in tune with trends in consumption to ensure that our offerings remain relevant. Business Development Executive Requirements: · * Excellent written and verbal communication in both English and Thai. · * Please submit your resume in English , resumes not in English would be disregarded · Proficiency in marketing and business administration. · Extensive sales experience. · Resourceful with outstanding research skills. · Familiarity with the Thailand commercial display market, together with having solid relationships and resources associated with commercial display integrators, or advertiser customers preferred · Intuitive and insightful, particularly regarding clients' behaviour. · Ability to generate revenue by identifying clients' requirements and suggesting suitable products or services. · Professional yet friendly disposition. · Neat, well-groomed attire. · Great networking skills. · Emboldened by challenges. Work Perks : · An uncapped commission scheme so you’ll get exactly how much you accomplished. · Flexible work arrangements, work from home or anywhere at your comfort · Fast-paced, fun, and collaborative culture within the company · Opportunities for growth and career advancement

Jobtitle: บริการ ด่วน!! พัทยา
column8: สถานที่ทำงาน : ถนนสายสอง อยู่ตรงข้ามอัลคาซ่า โชว์, ชลบุรี - 20150 Thailand อัตราค่าจ้าง : 12,000.00 - 20,000.00 หรือ ตามตกลง 👉บริการ เงินเดือนเริ่มต้น 12,000-20,000 บาท  หรือตามประสบการณ์ ความสามารถและการตกลง คุณสมบัติ 📍 สะอาด สุภาพ รับผิดชอบต่อหน้าที่ 📍 ซื่อสัตย์ ตรงต่อเวลา อัธยาศัยดี 📍 สามารถทำงานเป็นกะได้ 📍 มีความรับผิดชอบต่อหน้าที่ที่ได้รับมอบหมาย 📍 ทำงาน 6 วัน / สัปดาห์ 📍 เวลาทำงาน  09.00 - 23.00 น. (ทำงานเป็นกะ) 🫰สวัสดิการ ที่จะได้รับ -  เบี้ยขยัน -  ประกันสังคม -  วันหยุดพิเศษ -  ค่าล่วงเวลา -  ปรับเงินเดือนขึ้น มีโอกาสเติบโต ผู้ที่สนใจสมัครงาน หรือสอบถามข้อมูล สามารถ ติดต่อได้ที่ LineID:@964ealkg Line OA: @durianismpattaya หรือโทร 094-6792939 สามารถติดต่อได้ในวันจันทร์-วันเสาร์เวลา 10.00 - 17.00 น. เอกสารที่ต้องใช้ในการสมัครงาน ผู้สมัครทุกท่านที่สนใจสมัครงานในตำแหน่งงานใดๆ กับบริษัท กรุณาแนบเอกสารการสมัครงาน มีรายการดังนี้ คำแนะนำ โปรดเซ็นต์ชื่อรับรองสำเนาถูกต้องในเอกสารทุกใบ และเขียนกำกับว่าใช้ในการสมัครงานเท่านั้น 1. สำเนาบัตรประชาชน ทะเบียนบ้าน วุฒิการศึกษา ใบผ่านการเกณฑ์ทหาร (จำเป็นต้องนำไป) 2. รูปถ่าย แนะนำ 1 นิ้ว 2 รูป (จำเป็นต้องนำไปครับ) 3. สำเนาเอกสารราชการต่างๆ เช่น ใบเปลี่ยนชื่อ- สกุล / ใบผ่านการเกณฑ์ทหาร ฯ (ถ้ามี) 4. สำเนาหนังสือรับรองต่างๆ / สำเนาใบขับขี่ (ถ้างานนั้นเกี่ยวกับการขับรถ) 5. Slip เงินเดือนจากบริษัทปัจจุบัน หรือบริษัทสุดท้ายที่ท่านทำงาน (ถ้ามี) ระดับการศึกษา Qualification : ไม่จำกัดวุฒิ ขึ้นไป ติดต่อ Contact : ฝ่ายบุคคล (ติดต่อ จ.-ส. 10.00-17.00 น.) โทรศัพท์ Telephone : 094-6792939 , LineID:@964ealkg เว็บไซต์ Website : https://www.facebook.com/DurianismCafePattaya Durianism Cafe’ ที่อยู่ที่ติดต่อ สาขาพัทยากลาง (ตรงข้ามอัลคาซ่า) ถนนพัทยาสายสอง ต.หนองปรือ บางละมุง, ชลบุรี - 20150 Thailand » (View)มีตำแหน่งว่าง 6 ตำแหน่งงาน ผู้รับสมัคร : ฝ่ายบุคคล (ติดต่อ จ.-ส. 10.00-17.00 น.) โทรศัพท์ : 094-6792939 , LineID:@964ealkg แฟกซ์ : Line OA: @durianismpattaya เว็บไซต์ : https://www.facebook.com/DurianismCafePattaya ประเภทธกิจการ : ภัตตาคาร ร้านอาหาร / บาร์เบียร์ / ร้านค้า Durianism Cafe ่ สาขาพัทยากลาง ก่อนถึงพัทยาซอย 5 ถนนสายสอง อยู่ตรงข้าม Alcazar Cabaret Show รับสมัครเพื่อนร่วมทีม หลายตำแหน่ง 🍨 แผนที่ร้าน / MAP : Durianism Cafe
