column8: Last Updated : 11.01.2024 | Viewers 6 Salary : เงินเดือน 15,001 - 20,000 (THB) Types of employees : ประเภทงาน Full-time เต็มเวลา Area : ปฎิบัติงานที่จังหวัด Education : การศึกษา High School Education มัธยมศึกษาตอนปลาย Experience : ประสบการณ์การทำงาน 0 Year (ปี) Gender : เพศ Male/Female ชาย/หญิง Age : อายุ Not over 50 years old อายุไม่เกิน 50 ปี Unit : จำนวนรับ 1 อัตรา New Graduated : นักศึกษาจบใหม่ No ไม่รับพิจารณา Foreigner : ชาวต่างชาติ No ไม่รับพิจารณา Disabled : ผู้พิการ No ไม่รับพิจารณา Night shift : ตำแหน่งงานกะดึก No ไม่ใช่ Job Qualifications ข้อกำหนด - อายุ 19 ปีขึ้นไป - วุฒิการศึกษาตั้งแต่ ม.6 ขึ้นไป - มีบุคลิกและมนุษยสัมพันธ์ดี - มีความสามารถในการเจรจาต่อรองและรักงานบริการ - มีใบอนุญาตขับขี่และยานพาหนะส่วนตัว Job Details รายละเอียดงาน - ดูแลร้านค้าโชห่วย ร้านขายของที่เป็นพาร์ทเนอร์กัน และแนะนำสินค้าให้กับร้านค้า Contact ข้อมูลติดต่อ คุณอนงค์นาฏ ภักดี (บิวตี้) (-) - เว็บไซต์ : https://corporate.bigc.co.th/careers?lang=th อีเมล์ : เบอร์โทรศัพท์ :

At Infobip, we dream big. We value creativity, persistence, and innovation, passionately believing that it is through teamwork that we can all reach greater heights. Since 2006, we have been innovating at the edge of technological possibilities and are now shaping global communications of the future. Through 70+ offices on six continents, Infobip’s platform is used by almost 70% of the population, making it the largest network of its kind and the only full-stack cloud communication platform globally. Join us on our mission to create life-changing interactions between humans and online services with new and unseen solutions. Responsibilities: Manage relationship with customers to maintain overall customer health and growth. Leverage relationship with the customer to qualify leads and help facilitate cross-sell and up-sell opportunities for the account executive team. Help drive faster return of investment on Infobip solution for customer. Analyze and forecast client's traffic, take immediate reactions to ensure ongoing business growth, minimize losses, and maximize GP/revenue. Influence the evolution of how Infobip provides end-to-end customer experience by continuously giving additional customer perspective to the internal stakeholders. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Business, Management, Communications, IT, Telecommunications, or other related degree; or equivalent combination of education and experience. At least 5 years of experience in B2B enterprise key account management, customer success, client relations, professional services, consultancy, or business development. SaaS industry experience is a plus. Exceptional professional English communication skills. Strong administration, analytical and organizational skills, with a systematic approach to problems. Why our employees choose us (and stay)? Never a dull moment – We serve and partner with the majority of the leading mobile operators, OTTs, brands, banks, social networks, aggregators and many more. Seriously, our clients are really cool. Work with the world’s leading companies and impact how they communicate with their users! Opportunity knocks. Often. – Being a part of a growing company in a growing industry – we challenge you not to grow! Whether it’s horizontal, vertical, or angular, we want to support the path that you want to carve. Learn as you grow – Starting from the Academy as an onboarding program, to internal education, education resources, e-learning to external education, we invest heavily in employee learning and development. Connect globally – Work with people from all over the world. We put the “global” in globalization. Compensation & Benefits – Competitive salary, travel allowance, expatriate compensation packages for your business trips, rewards and holiday bonuses, a team taking care of all the equipment you need, team buildings and other organized activities, organized sports, kitchen stocked with the usual suspects... Talk about a balanced lifestyle! #LI-KA1 #LI-Hybrid Infobip employees are people with diverse backgrounds, characteristics, and experiences that share the same passion and talent that helps us achieve our mission. That's why Infobip is committed to creating a diverse workplace and is proud to be an equal-opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, ancestry, religion, age, sex, sexual orientation, gender, gender identity, national origin, citizenship, disability, veteran status, or any other part of one's identity. #LI-KA1

Company: บริษัท โกไฟว์ จำกัด
column8: วุฒิการศึกษา - ปริญญาตรี สาขาวิชาชีพ - ทุกสาขา เงินเดือน/ค่าตอบแทน 25,000-30,000 ตำแหน่ง 3 ตำแหน่ง รายละเอียดของงาน - กำหนดทิศทาง Road map กลยุทธ์ และเป้าหมายให้กับผลิตภัณฑ์ขององค์กร - เก็บรวมรวบปัญหา (Pain point) ความต้องการ (Requirement) และนำมาพัฒนาผลิตภัณฑ์ขององค์กรเพื่อแก้ไขปัญหาให้กับผู้ใช้งาน - สร้าง User story จากปัญหาและความต้องการ และสร้างเป็น Backlogs ให้กับทีมพัฒนา - วางแผนการพัฒนาผลิตภัณฑ์ในลักษณะการทำงานแบบ Scrum และกำหนด Backlogs ในแต่ละ Sprint เพื่อให้ผลิตภัณฑ์ถูกพัฒนาได้ตามแผนที่กำหนดไว้ - บริหารจัดการและเข้าร่วมในโปรเซสต่างๆของทีม ได้แก่ Sprint Planning , Sprint Review , Daily Scrum และ Sprint Retrospective ร่วมกับทีมต่างๆในองค์กร - พัฒนา User Journey ของผลิตภัณฑ์อย่างสม่ำเสมอ เพื่อส่งมอบประสบการณ์การใช้งานที่ดีที่สุดให้กับผู้ใช้ของเรา - ทำงานร่วมกับฝ่ายต่างๆในบริษัท ไม่ว่าจะเป็น Developer, Designer, Tester, Marketing และฝ่ายอื่นๆ - หาแนวทางใหม่ๆ และพัฒนากระบวนการต่างๆขององค์กรอยู่เสมอ เพื่อให้กระบวนการขององค์กรมีประสิทธิภาพดี สมัครโดยตรงผ่าน : https://jobs.myempeo.com/Gofive/25056 คุณสมบัติผู้สมัคร - ประสบการณ์การทำงานที่ผ่านมาในด้าน Assistant Product Owner - มีความรู้ความความเข้าใจในการพัฒนาผลิตภัณฑ์ และกระบวนการต่างๆที่จำเป็นต่อการพัฒนาผลิตภัณฑ์ - เคยผ่านการทำงานมาในลักษณะของ Agile หรือกระบวนการอื่นๆที่เกี่ยวข้อง - ทักษะด้านการสื่อสาร การนำเสนอ ความคิดสร้างสรรค์ และความเป็นผู้นำ - ทักษะด้านการบริหารจัดการเวลาทั้งตนเอง และทีมได้อย่างยอดเยี่ยม - ทักษะการวิเคราะห์และการแก้ปัญหา ความใส่ใจในรายละเอียด และมีวิสัยทัศน์ที่กว้างไกล ตรงกับวัฒนธรรมขององค์กร - พร้อมที่จะเรียนรู้สิ่งใหม่ๆ อยู่เสมอ และสนุกกับการทำงานร่วมกันเป็นทีม สมัครโดยตรงผ่าน : https://jobs.myempeo.com/Gofive/25056 รายละเอียดบริษัท / สวัสดิการ ที่บริษัท Gofive เรามี Passion ร่วมกันที่จะขับเคลื่อน Digital Transformation ให้กับทุกธุรกิจ เราใส่ใจในทุกรายละเอียด และพร้อมมอบประสบการณ์การใช้งานซอฟต์แวร์อันยอดเยี่ยมให้กับลูกค้าผู้ใช้บริการ “We create World-Class software experience” นั่นคือ Mission ของเรา Gofive คือบริษัท Startup ใน T.K.S. Group เราสร้าง Tech Ecosystem ที่เข้มแข็งเพื่อผลักดันธุรกิจให้ Scale Up แบบก้าวกระโดดพร้อมกับ Career Path ที่มั่นคง ในการทำงานที่ Gofive เราให้ความสำคัญในการใส่ใจเพื่อนร่วมงาน รวมไปถึงการเปิดใจรับฟังและเรียนรู้สิ่งใหม่ๆอยู่เสมอ เพื่อให้ที่ทำงานของเรานั้นน่าอยู่สำหรับทุกคน เรามี Products อะไรบ้าง? Venio โปรแกรม CRM บริหารทีมขายอันดับ 1 การันตีด้วยรางวัลด้าน ICT Award  www.veniocrm.com empeo โปรแกรม HRM บริหารงานบุคคลอย่างครบวงจร ที่ได้รับความไว้วางใจจากลูกค้าชั้นนำwww.myempeo.com Salesbear โปรแกรมตอบแชท ที่เป็น Partner ของ LINE Official โดยตรง www.salesbear.com และอื่นๆ อีกมากมาย ที่รอคุณมาเป็นส่วนหนึ่งของเรา มารู้จักเรามากขึ้น? บรรยากาศการทำงานที่ Gofive: https://youtu.be/LLRtw5_n764 ติดตามเราที่: www.facebook.com/GofiveFamily ทำงานที่ Gofive Performance Bonus ประจำปี กองทุนสำรองเลี้ยงชีพ ประกันสุขภาพกลุ่ม ประกันอุบัติเหตุ ประกันชีวิต คอร์สเรียน Upskill ได้ตามต้องการ Notebook ส่วนตัว หรือถ้าอยากใช้ของตัวเองเราก็มี Reward ให้ Outing ท่องเที่ยวประจำปี กิจกรรมจัดเต็มตลอดทั้งปี สำนักงานที่ 1 : สาขาตึก FYI Center (พระรามที่ 4) เลขที่ 2525 อาคาร FYI Center (MRT ศูนย์การประชุมแห่งชาติสิริกิตต์) อาคาร 2 ชั้น 12 ถนนพระรามที่ 4 แขวงคลองเตย เขตคลองเตย กรุงเทพมหานคร 10110 สำนักงานที่ 2 : สาขาพระราม 2 เลขที่ 30/88 หมู่ที่1 ถนนเจษฎาวิถี ตำบลโคกขาม อำเภอเมืองสมุทรสาคร จังหวัดสมุทรสาคร 74000 โทรสอบถามรายละเอียดเพิ่มเติมได้ที่ 02-784-5855 ต่อ 8 วิธีการสมัคร ส่ง Resume พร้อมแนบผลงานที่ผ่านมา ระบุตำแหน่งที่ต้องการ ส่งมาได้ทาง https://jobs.myempeo.com/Gofive โทรสอบถามรายละเอียดเพิ่มเติมได้ที่ 02-784-5855 ต่อ 8 ที่อยู่ของบริษัท/สำนักงาน บริษัท โกไฟว์ จำกัด 2525 FYI Center, ตึก 2 ชั้น 12 แขวงคลองเตย เขตคลองเตย จังหวัดกรุงเทพมหานคร 10110 อีเมล์ : panida.s@gofive.co.th โทร : 027845855 เว็บไซต์ : https://www.gofive.co.th/career/ ใกล้กับสถานีรถไฟฟ้า BTS : สถานีอโศก ใกล้กับสถานีรถไฟฟ้า MRT : สถานีคลองเตย, ศูนย์การประชุมแห่งชาติสิริกิติ์, สถานีสุขุมวิท

Jobtitle: นักกายภาพบำบัด
Company: นักกายภาพบำบัด (Physiotherapist) ประจำสาขาเซ็นทรัลอีสวิลล์-นาคนิวาส
column8: Job Overview รายละเอียดงาน รูปแบบงาน : งานประจำ จำนวนที่รับ : 1 ตำแหน่ง สถานที่ปฏิบัติงาน : กรุงเทพมหานคร(ทุกเขต) เงินเดือน(บาท) : 15,000 – 35,000 วันหยุด : ไม่ระบุ เวลาทำงาน : 11:00 – 20:00 เวลาทำงานอื่น : ไม่ระบุ หน้าที่ความรับผิดชอบ •ดูแลให้บริการลูกค้า ตามกระบวนการขั้นตอนที่กำหนดไว้ได้อย่างถูกต้อง •จัดเตรียมความพร้อมของลูกค้าในการบริการหลังทำหัตถการ •จัดเตรียมอุปกรณ์เครื่องมือที่ใช้ในแต่ละหัตถการให้ถูกต้องครบถ้วน •นำเสนอ ให้คำปรึกษา และตอบคำถามเกี่ยวกับผลิตภัณฑ์ และบริการต่างๆขององค์กร •ดูแลสต๊อกสินค้า และอุปกรณ์เครืองมือที่ใช้ในการทำหัตถการ เพื่อให้เพียงพอต่อการใช้งาน •ติดต่อประสานงานกับฝ่ายตา่งๆ และงานอื่นๆที่ได้รับมอบหมาย คุณสมบัติผู้สมัคร เพศ : หญิง อายุ(ปี) : 23 – 40 ระดับการศึกษา : ปริญญาตรี ขึ้นไป ประสบการณ์(ปี) : 0 – 2 อื่นๆ : ยินดีรับนักศึกษาจบใหม่ คุณสมบัติผู้สมัครเพิ่มเติม • เพศหญิง อายุระหว่าง 23-40 ปี • วุฒิปริญญาตรีขึ้นไป สาขากายภาพ หรือสาขาที่เกี่ยวข้อง • มีประสบการณ์อย่างน้อย 0-2 ปี • ขยัน อดทน ตรงต่อเวลา มีไหวพริบและการสื่อสาร ได้เป็นอย่างดี สวัสดิการ • ค่าตอบแทนพิเศษ •ประกันสุขภาพ •ค่าทำงานล่วงเวลา •เงินโบนัสตามผลงาน •ประกันสังคม •ตามข้อตกลงของบริษัท •โบนัสตามผลประกอบการ •ปรับค่าจ้างประจำปี •เบี้ยขยัน •ประกันสังคม •เงินช่วยเหลืองานฌาปนกิจ •เงินช่วยเหลือคลอดบุตร •วันหยุดพักผ่อนประจำปี •สิทธิ์ในการทำ Treatment ฟรี •งานเลี้ยงประจำปี วิธีการสมัคร ชื่อผู้ติดต่อ : คุณกาย เบอร์ผู้ติดต่อ : 064-4939261 อีเมล : hr.thetouch@gmail.com ติดต่อ ฝ่ายบุคคล บริษัท กรุ๊ป เดอะทัช 99 จำกัด ตึก111(ตึกB) ประดิษฐมนูธรรม ชั้น 3 ห้อง 306-309 แขวงลาดพร้าว เขตลาดพร้าว จังหวัดกรุงเทพมหานคร 10230 ประเทศไทย การเดินทาง ขึ้นรถ 2 แถว บิ๊กซี-ถนอมมิตร (รถจอดข้างบิ๊กซีลาดพร้าว (ซอยลาดพร้าว81) About นักกายภาพบำบัด (Physiotherapist) ประจำสาขาเซ็นทรัลอีสวิลล์-นาคนิวาส เกี่ยวกับเรา เป็นสถาบันดูแลรูปร่างเสริมความงามครบวงจร เปิดกิจการตั้งแต่ปีพ.ศ.2555 ถึงปัจจุบัน มีสาขาอยู่ในห้างสรรพสินค้าชั่นนำมากกว่า 12 สาขาในกทม และกำลังขยายกิจการเพิ่มขึ้น มี 4 แบรนด์ความงามในเครือคือ Alyssa Clinic ,The Touch Clinic ,Lewis และ Makeup gen บริษัทเปิดรับคนรุ่นใหม่ไฟแรง ที่พร้อมเปิดพัฒนาศักยภาพตนเอง อยากทำงานท้าทาย กล้าเรียนรู้สิ่งใหม่ๆ ขอแค่คุณกล้าที่จะเรียนรู้เปิดใจ ก็อย่ารอช้าก้าวเข้ามาเป็นครอบครัวเดียวกับเรา หากคุณชื่นชอบด้านความงาม อยากพัฒนาความรู้ความสามารถ เปิดประสบการณ์ใหม่ๆ ก้าวเข้ามาร่วมงานกับเราสิคะ Address บริษัท กรุ๊ป เดอะทัช 99 จำกัด ตึก111(ตึกB) ประดิษฐมนูธรรม ชั้น 3 ห้อง 306-309 แขวงลาดพร้าว เขตลาดพร้าว จังหวัดกรุงเทพมหานคร 10230 ประเทศไทย

About Klook We are Asia’s leading platform for experiences and travel services, and we believe that we can help bring the world closer together through experiences. Founded in 2014 by 3 avid travelers, Ethan Lin, Eric Gnock Fah and Bernie Xiong, Klook inspires and enables more moments of joy for travelers with over half a million curated quality experiences ranging from the biggest attractions to paragliding adventures, iconic museums to rich cultural tours, and other convenient local travel services across 2,300 destinations around the world. Do you share our belief in the wonders of travel? Our international community of over 1,500 employees, based in 20+ locations, certainly do! Global citizens ourselves, Klookers are not only curating memorable experiences for others but also co-creating our world of joy within Klook. We work hard and play hard, upkeeping our high-performing culture as we are guided daily by our core beliefs - Push boundaries, Ask For and Give Feedback, Take Ownership, and Help Each Other. We never settle and together, we believe in achieving greater heights and realizing endless possibilities ahead of us in the dynamic new era of travel. Care to be a part of this revolution? What you'll do: Account Management: Cultivate relationships with partners to help maximize their sales potential on Klook. Communicate Klook’s business strengths and brand value to suppliers, and create merchant success plans for long-term sustainable partnerships. Provide training and daily operational support to suppliers on our processes and tools. Acquisition: Acquire a diverse range of low to mid-tier merchants across different industries/verticals. Support onboarding of products and coordinate with merchants, operations, content, finance, and quality control teams. Optimization: Commit to delivering world-class travel experience to our customers, in terms of competitive pricing, sufficient inventory, realistic content, exclusive privileges, maintaining a market-leading position at all times Coordination: Collaborate with various functions in the company globally - marketing to maximize sales, supplier operations to improve efficiency, customer services to drive satisfaction and repeats, and finance to ensure accurate payment and minimize risk. Market Intelligence: Provide market leaders with relevant information on identifying market trends and competitor updates. Operations: Onboarding of products and coordinating with merchants, collaborating with various functions in the company - such as marketing, supplier operations, tech, customer service, finance etc What you'll need: Currently pursuing a degree in a field related to this role, or have similar experience 2-4 years of experience in Business Development / Account Management. Understanding of e-commerce/travel/transportation industry is a plus Passion for sales, marketing, and travel partner commercial activities Capable of working independently with minimal supervision Ability to manage projects and multi-task with good communication skills Comfortable with Excel, Google Docs, Salesforce CRM, and other technology tools Comfortable with data analysis and reporting Strong internal and external communicator with strong interpersonal skills Comfortable with a fast-paced environment and changing requirements Klook is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. We hire talented and passionate people of all backgrounds. We believe that a joyful workplace is an inclusive workplace, one where employees from all walks of life have an equal opportunity to thrive. We’re dedicated to creating a welcoming and supportive culture where everyone belongs. Klook does not accept unsolicited resumes from any temporary staffing agency, placement service or professional recruiter (“Agency”). Klook will not be responsible for, and will not pay, any fees, commissions or other payments related to such unsolicited resumes. An Agency must obtain advance written approval from Klook’s Talent Acquisition Team to submit resumes, and then only in conjunction with a valid fully-executed agreement for service and in response to a specific job opening for which the Agency has been requested to submit resumes for. Klook will not be responsible for, and will not pay, any fees, commissions or other payments to any Agency that does not have such agreement in place or does not comply with the foregoing.

Jobtitle: ธุรการขาย(หญิง) ด่วน!! พัทยา
column8: สถานที่ทำงาน : บางละมุง, ชลบุรี - 20150 Thailand อัตราค่าจ้าง : 12,500.00 - + หรือ ตามตกลง คุณสมบัติ เพศ : หญิง อายุ :  25  ปีขึ้นไป ไม่เกิน 35 ปี  (เพศชายต้องผ่านการเกณฑ์ทหารแล้ว) วุฒิการศึกษา : มัธยมศึกษา ม.3 / ม.6 / ปวช. หรือเทียบเท่า / ปริญญาตรี สามารถใช้โปรแกรม Microsoft Office / Internet ได้ รักงานขายและบริการ บุคลิกดี  เข้ากับผู้อื่นได้ดี  และสามารถพูดภาษาอังกฤษได้พิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ มีความพร้อมในการเปิดใจและเรียนรู้สิ่งใหม่ๆ มีประสบการณ์ด้านงานขายรับพิจารณาพิเศษ เงินเดือน :     12,500 + อื่นๆ(ตามประสบการณ์และการตกลง) เวลาทำงาน : 08:00 – 17:00 น. วันจันทร์ – วันเสาร์ หยุดวันอาทิตย์ สวัสดิการ :  ประกันสังคม / ยูนิฟอร์ม /  โบนัสไม่หยุดงาน – ไม่ขาดงาน - มาทำงานไม่สาย  / โอที  / พักร้อน  /วันหยุดประจำปี / ซองวันเกิด สนใจสมัครงาน ติดต่อฝ่ายบุคคล 086-9777107 , 085-1271260 (ไม่ตอบคำถามทางไลน์) ติดต่อ จันทร์-เสาร์ (9.00-17.00น.) E-Mail: windy@marble-ds.com เอกสารที่ต้องใช้ในการสมัครงาน ผู้สมัครทุกท่านที่สนใจสมัครงานในตำแหน่งงานใดๆ กับบริษัท กรุณาแนบเอกสารการสมัครงาน มีรายการดังนี้ คำแนะนำ โปรดเซ็นต์ชื่อรับรองสำเนาถูกต้องในเอกสารทุกใบ และเขียนกำกับว่าใช้ในการสมัครงานเท่านั้น 1. สำเนาบัตรประชาชน ทะเบียนบ้าน วุฒิการศึกษา ใบผ่านการเกณฑ์ทหาร (จำเป็นต้องนำไป) 2. รูปถ่าย แนะนำ 1 นิ้ว 2 รูป (จำเป็นต้องนำไปครับ) 3. สำเนาเอกสารราชการต่างๆ เช่น ใบเปลี่ยนชื่อ- สกุล / ใบผ่านการเกณฑ์ทหาร ฯ (ถ้ามี) 4. สำเนาหนังสือรับรองต่างๆ / สำเนาใบขับขี่ (ถ้างานนั้นเกี่ยวกับการขับรถ) 5. Slip เงินเดือนจากบริษัทปัจจุบัน หรือบริษัทสุดท้ายที่ท่านทำงาน (ถ้ามี) ระดับการศึกษา Qualification : วุฒิ ม.3 ขึ้นไป ขึ้นไป ติดต่อ Contact : HR Office ติดต่อ จันทร์-เสาร์ (9.00-17.00น.) โทรศัพท์ Telephone : 086-9777107, 085 -1271260, 038-756593 เว็บไซต์ Website : http://www.marble-ds.com/ บริษัท ธรรมชาติ สโตน จำกัด ที่อยู่ที่ติดต่อ 215/17 หมู่ 11 ถ.สุขุมวิท ต.หนองปรือ บางละมุง, ชลบุรี - 20150 Thailand » (View)มีตำแหน่งว่าง 3 ตำแหน่งงาน ผู้รับสมัคร : HR Office ติดต่อ จันทร์-เสาร์ (9.00-17.00น.) โทรศัพท์ : 086-9777107, 085 -1271260, 038-756593 แฟกซ์ : 038-756594 เว็บไซต์ : http://www.marble-ds.com/ ประเภทธกิจการ : ก่อสร้าง /รับเหมาก่อสร้าง/ วัสดุก่อสร้าง เราคือทีมติดตั้งหินสำหรับการตกแต่งภายในระดับมืออาชีพที่ให้บริการด้วยความจริงใจ เราเป็นบริษัทในประเทศไทยที่มีประสบการณ์ในงานนี้มานานกว่า10 ปีและมีทีมกว่า 10 ทีมที่พร้อมให้บริการติดตั้งทุกประเภท เราสามารถสร้างสิ่งที่คุณเคยวาดฝันและกำลังฝันให้เป็นจริง ***เรามีบริการที่คุณวางใจได้ ‌***เรามีการจัดการออนไลน์ ‌***เรามีลูกค้าเกินกว่า 9,000 ราย เราเป็นนายจ้างที่เปิดโอกาสให้กับทุกคนเท่าเทียมกัน เรายินดีตอนรับทุกความคิดและเปิดรับทุกวัฒนธรรมที่หลากหลาย We are DS Stone Group, a friendly and professional stone and interior installation team in Thailand. With more then 10 years experience in this area and over 10 teams of all kinds installation work. We make what you have dreamed about. We create what you are dreaming. We have.... ***9000+ customer ***Heart-easing service ***E managment ***Dearm, Create, Inspire We are an equal opportunity employer and has a diverse culture. We welcome applications for all thai people. Walfare and Benefits สวัสติการ -โบนัสขาย -โบนัสไม่หยุดงาน -โบนัสประจำปี -เงินพิเศษตามเป้า -ประกันสังคม -วันหยุดประจำปี -วันลาพักร้อน -โบนัสวันเกิด

Jobtitle: iTero Training Specialist ( one year contract)
column8: Join a team that is changing millions of lives. Transforming smiles, changing lives. At Align Technology, we believe a great smile can transform a person’s life, so we create technology that gives people the confidence to take on whatever’s next. We revolutionized the orthodontic industry with the introduction of the Invisalign system, and we have never lost sight of that spirit of innovation. Our diverse and collaborative teams are constantly pushing the boundaries of what’s possible. Ready to join us? About this opportunity Training Specialist ensures high quality of education for both internal and external customers (dentist or dental labs) on our iTero products and workflows. He/she also ensures effective, efficient and prompt handling of doctors’ inquiries, requests and complaints regarding the Scanner and CAD/ CAM available services or products especially from Dental Laboratories, via phone calls and/or emails to achieve customer satisfaction. The role will involve focus on pursuing first call resolution (FCR) and if FCR cannot be achieved, they need to take all necessary actions to resolve the issue which include follow ups and/or notifications to all stakeholders based on the established standards. In this role, you will… Provide training to internal & external customers (Dentist or Dental laboratories) on iTero products & workflows. Assist with review and creation of educational presentations, digital images and scans. Accurately and thoroughly document information in the company’s database(s) about each contact they handle following defined parameters. Conduct occasional evaluations on the training(s) provided to our customers by distributor personnel & assess if there is any need of further follow ups or extra educational material. Respond to requests, questions and issues received from customers via phone and/or email; regarding issues like: submission process, scanning assistance, MAT person profile creation, relations set up, Order status (cases, fulfillment items, Scanners), re-mill, redirects, general inquiries on our products, Lab SW installations, clinical investigations, Lab training scheduling and others Be alert to trends in requests and issues reported by customers. Research information to answer inquiries from customers and share learning with departmental peers and management. Propose ideas for procedures and processes to promote improved service and customer satisfaction, and overall department improvements. Participate proactively to team efforts in achieving departmental and company goals. In this role, you’ll need … A bachelor’s or master degree in dentistry or dental related field, and/or relevant industry knowledge/experience as a Dental Technician/Assistant/dental product specialist is a plus. Exposure to dental CAD/CAM work is preferred. Strong interpersonal, problem solving, organizational and prioritization skills. Ability to pay attention to details and work with minimal supervision; Self-motivated and willingness to learn, results oriented, dependable, creative & positive. Good knowledge of basic computer operations and Microsoft Office tools. Provide support to audit processes and quality management system as required. Sound like a good fit? Great! Click the "Apply" link to let us know you are interested. Not the right fit? Don’t worry, Align is quickly growing so we are creating more opportunities to expand our Align family. Please consider joining our Talent Network to receive notifications about future jobs or sharing this opportunity with others in your network. About Align Align Technology is a publicly traded medical device company that is transforming smiles and changing lives. Our global team of talented employees develop innovative technology, tools and treatment options to help dental professionals worldwide achieve the clinical results they expect. Our digital ecosystem combines the power of technology to create beautiful smiles through the integration of AI and machine learning, digital imaging and visualization, biomechanics and material science to develop the Invisalign system, the most advanced clear aligner system in the world; iTero Intraoral Scanners and OrthoCAD digital services. Did you know? Align is the world’s largest manufacturer of custom 3D-printed materials. By joining Align, you will be part of a global, fast-growing company in one of the most dynamic industries. Great people, innovative technologies, and meaningful work – these are just some of the things employees say make Align Technology a great place to work. Global Diversity Statement: At Align, we believe in the power of a smile, and we know that every smile is as unique as our employees. As we grow, we will continue building a workforce of diverse cultural backgrounds and life experiences and fostering a culture of open-mindedness and compassion for all our employees. We live our company values by promoting healthy people and healthy communities. All with the intent of changing millions of lives, one unique smile at a time. Equal Opportunity Statement It is our policy to provide equal employment opportunity in all of our employment practices without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, ancestry, marital status, protected veteran status, age, individuals with disabilities, sexual orientation or gender identity or expression or any other legally protected category. Applicants for positions with Align must be legally authorized to work in the country which they are applying for and verification of employment eligibility will be required as a condition of hire. #LI-onsite #LI-HL2

Passionate about the world of tech? What if you had a chance to be a part of the world’s leading SaaS, Software, or Hardware solutions? Join our team as an Account Executive Consultant today and thrive in a multicultural and multilingual environment while enjoying your home office. Unlock your potential by mastering new skills and achieving challenging goals with our People First management approach. Excited? Let’s see what it takes 💛 What you will do: Take over the leads from inbound flow, and take them through the entire sales cycle Develop your own strategies for engaging prospects Create your own leads through targeted business development Demo the platform Bring deals to a close, including proposals and contracts Work closely with Customer Success teams as well as other departments What you need to succeed in this role: Fluent Mandarin communication skills (C2+) and English (C1) 1–3 years of sales/business development experience in the SaaS space is a must A basic understanding of the online marketing discipline The ability to adapt to changes in role and responsibilities The ability to work independently in a fast-paced environment and, establish positive and lasting relationships A strong interest, knowledge, and passion for technology and innovation Benefits and Perks: Fixed schedule, Monday to Friday 8am–4pm, Thailand time Opportunity to work fully remotely Inclusive international environment Compensation in USD Good bonuses for referring friends Paid intensive training and probation Work-life balance Responsive management interested in your growth and long-lasting cooperation Greenhouse conditions for self-development Who we are: SupportYourApp is a Support-as-a-Service company that provides secure technical, customer support, and CX services for tech companies around the globe. We work with clients from over 30 countries and speak over 55 languages. Since 2010, we’ve become an industry leader in premium outsourced customer support and turned global with 7 hubs around the world. We treat our team like our clients, surrounding them with unlimited care, an individual approach, and a wholesome positive experience. We welcome people with various backgrounds and experiences. Grab the chance to join us and send your CV in English , pointing out your outstanding skills! Visit our website: www.supportyourapp.com DISCLAIMER We are a multinational company with unbiased views. The assessment of candidates is not affected by such characteristics as race, sex, color, religion, age, national origin, marital status, disability, veteran status, genetic information, sexual orientation, gender identity, or any other reason prohibited by law in provision of employment opportunities and benefits. *Due to legal restrictions and client requirements, candidates from sanctioned countries are ineligible for this position.

Job Description: In a world with limited natural resources and a growing population, the demand for food is constantly rising. Meeting this demand poses many complicated challenges. As Global Program Manager Phytogenics, you can contribute to our purpose of Feeding the Future by leading the worldwide deployment of our new Phytogenic Feed Additives product line. If you are a passionate professional in the field of animal nutrition (specifically phytogenics) who thrives in techno-commercial roles and is energized by having a strategic impact, then this is the job for you! Our Feed Additive Business Unit plays a key role in fulfilling Trouw Nutrition’s mission of Feeding the Future. We drive the development and successful commercialization of innovative feed technologies. Our solutions are designed to sustainably optimize animal nutrition and animal health through all life stages. We use applications based on organic acids, toxin binders, trace minerals and phytogenics to deliver solutions for feed safety& quality, gut health improvement, nutritional efficiency, and performance. We are currently looking for a Global Program Manager for our Phytogenic platform. This position offers a unique opportunity to work on new launches globally, so please read on! Your Role and Responsibilities As Global Program Manager Phytogenics, you drive market activities, business planning, and launch activities of our Phytogenic portfolio, globally. This also involves training sales and technical colleagues in different regions on the technical and commercial launch of our products. In addition, you support them with sales materials and sales cycles, value adding activities (e.g., demos, trials) and key account management. The Global Program Manager also provides technical expertise and support to our global sales execution teams at their strategic accounts. On strategic customer accounts, you assist in the sales process and join customer visits together with your regional sales colleagues. Next to driving market activities, you actively analyze market developments and customer needs to steer innovative product and program development. You give input on the development and implementation of the marketing strategy, and on the development of new/improved concepts for programs and content for marketing materials. What we offer Working for Trouw Nutrition means that you play a role in feeding the future in a sustainable way. Our work is challenging, varied, and rewarding. Innovation is our core value that is deeply rooted in the business. We are determined to be the best at doing what matters most. That is why we develop the capabilities of individuals and our organization. Our collaborative approach enables us to combine skills and resources to drive innovation and growth. In the role of Global Program Manager Phytogenics, you will have the unique opportunity to lead the worldwide deployment of a new and highly promising product line. Our Phytogenics program boasts both a strong product pipeline and solid backing from senior management, setting you up for success from the very beginning. You will have the chance to contribute your technical and commercial expertise, act as a teacher and advisor, and work with innovative and futuristic products. Finally, following your successful deployment of our Phytogenics program, you will have plenty of room to grow your career at Trouw Nutrition and Nutreco, depending on your interests. We are a caring company that delivers on its commitments to stakeholders through a balanced approach to people, planet, and profit. We encourage an open culture with accessible managers, an international working environment and regular communication. We offer a competitive salary package with excellent benefits, and a healthy work-life balance. What else is in it for you? •    We will offer you a fulltime position, 40 hours per week •    Ideal location will be Bangkok, Thailand •    Your position will be classified in a Nutreco Hay scale •    Annual holidays and benefits in line with actual Nutreco practice in the country •    Attractive salary based on skills and experience -paid in 12 monthly payments •    A performance contract is part of the package •    The possibility to earn bonuses when you reach your targets •    The role includes about 40% of travel, possibly more in the beginning. What we ask We are looking for a passionate and confident team player who grows with every challenge. The successful candidate will have strong presentation skills and the ability to convince internal and external stakeholders on any level. Furthermore, we are looking for someone who thrives in a fast-paced environment and can easily adapt to new situations. What you bring •    8-10 years of global experience in feed additives industry in a technical and commercial role with focus on Phytogenics, where you have brought Phytogenic solutions to market. You have good industry contacts and relationships. •    Master’s degree in veterinary science, animal nutrition, animal production, animal health, agri business or the like. Demonstrable technical knowledge of animal health/animal nutrition/chemistry and a deep knowledge of Phytogenics. •    Excellent training skills and ability to create and deliver compelling presentations, able to write technical reports and trial protocols, interpret trial results, calculate the economic benefits and demonstrate value for the customer. •    Proven ability to work with multi-cultural sensitivity in cross-functional and cross-geographical teams. Global experience from a multinational company is considered an advantage. •    Fluent in English (writing and speaking) is mandatory, and knowledge of other languages is considered a plus. •    Competent computer skills: Word, Excel/spreadsheets, and creating presentations. •    A team-player that likes to collaborate with colleagues in the global HQ, in the regions and in the markets. An open and constructive mind-set, and a flexible “can do it” attitude. Self-driven, results-orientated and able to work independently with a keen sense of urgency and able to get things done. •    Strong listening skills to understand customer needs and influencing skills to achieve business objectives. •    Can travel internationally 40% of working time. Extra information / Apply direct Are you the enthusiastic candidate we are looking for? We would like to hear from you! You can express your interest in this role by clicking the button “apply now’’ and we will contact you as soon as possible. Research shows that female candidates only apply if they meet (almost) 100% of the requirements, while male candidates do so at 60%. So, do you recognize yourself in this challenge, but are you hesitant whether you meet all the requirements? Then we look forward to receiving your CV. For all agencies Please be aware that acquisition based on our vacancies is not appreciated. Our organisation: Nutreco is a global leader in animal nutrition and fish feed. Our advanced nutritional solutions are at the origin of food for millions of consumers worldwide. Quality, innovation and sustainability are guiding principles, embedded in the Nutreco culture from research and raw material procurement to products and services for agriculture and aquaculture. Experience across 100 years brings Nutreco a rich heritage of knowledge and experience for building its future. Equal Opportunity Employer: Nutreco is an equal opportunity employer; applicants are considered for all roles without regard to race, color, religious creed, sex, national origin, citizenship status, age, physical or mental disability, sexual orientation, marital, parental, military status or any other status protected by applicable local law. Please advise us at any point during the recruitment and selection process if you require accommodation. Nutreco is committed to compliance with all applicable legislation, including providing accommodation for applicants with disabilities.

About FWD Group FWD Group is a pan-Asian life insurance business with more than 11 million customers across 10 markets, including some of the fastest-growing insurance markets in the world. FWD reached its 10-year anniversary in 2023. The company is focused on making the insurance journey simpler, faster and smoother, with innovative propositions and easy-to-understand products, supported by digital technology. Through this customer-led approach, FWD is committed to changing the way people feel about insurance. Visit www.fwd.com Job Purpose Design quality content and deliver Training emphasis on High-Net-Worth (HNW) customer and Unit-Linked Product (including Sales training materials design, scripts, objections handling & facilitators guide, conduct train the trainer, dry-run/pilot training courses) with the aim of building capacity and drive performance of sales channels. Job Purpose: Design quality content and deliver Training emphasis on High-Net-Worth (HNW) customer and Unit-Linked Product (including Sales training materials design, scripts, objections handling & facilitators guide, conduct train the trainer, dry-run/pilot training courses) with the aim of building capacity and drive performance of sales channels. Key Responsibilities: Develop, review, and maintain training curriculum, content, materials documents, manuals, aids, tools, and media related to sales channels which emphasis on HNW and Unit-Linked Co-develop training course curriculum and materials together with sales channels and product team and ensure that the content and deliver methods are based on the training needs analysis Ensure quality and process for COM04 approval for all training content, materials and media relating to financial planning and wealth management concept which produced by Trainers Translate HNW Sales Content and Advance Insurance Planning from English to Thai and versa of Sales Script, Content, Material, Media, Storyboard, etc Ensure smooth delivery and facilitate of sales training events across various Business Units and geographic locations on time every time Update own job knowledge by participate in educational opportunities, read professional publications, maintain personal networks, participate in professional organizations Baselin e Qualifications: Bachelor or master's degree in Insurance, Business Management or related fields At least 2-3 years’ experience in the Insurance Industry Certified Financial Planner is preferred Good command in English both verbal and written. Proactive, Open, Caring, Commit, Innovative

• At least 2 years of work experience in Category Management / Space Management / Marketing / Trade Marketing / Sales • Bachelor Degree or higher in Marketing or related fields • Strong analytical and presentation skill • Strong interpersonal and communication skill • Proactive in problem solving • Strong leadership, planning, priority setting and time management • Proficient in space management and analysis software

About FWD Group FWD Group is a pan-Asian life insurance business with more than 11 million customers across 10 markets, including some of the fastest-growing insurance markets in the world. FWD reached its 10-year anniversary in 2023. The company is focused on making the insurance journey simpler, faster and smoother, with innovative propositions and easy-to-understand products, supported by digital technology. Through this customer-led approach, FWD is committed to changing the way people feel about insurance. Visit www.fwd.com Job Purpose: Serve SCB segment regional team under own responsibility in terms of providing product and process knowledge, and coordinating between Support Team and Sales Team regarding complicated issues that occurred. Key Responsibilities: Serve as front line and primary contact person in handling incoming calls for all enquiries and service requests from customers under responsible regions Coordinate and work with other functions in order to acquire all needs to deliver service for BA Sales and SCB branch staffs Analyze regional target under own responsibility and develop plan with banks to achieve goals Contribute and support on Month-end closing period Negotiate on sales event and activities Solve various pending problems after sales Follow up with BA Sales Representative on all pending cases Baseline Qualifications: Bachelor’s Degree in Business Administration or related fields. 3-5 years' experience in financial advisor, financial planner, business development executive, sale coach, teller or related fields. Experience as an insurance or background SME Loan. Experience in delivering client-focused solutions and in creating long-lasting relationships. LIB / IC license is required. Ability to use Microsoft Office, Internet. Good command in English both verbal and written. Workplace/Hub : Udonthani province Proactive, Open, Caring, Commit, Innovative.

A DAY IN A LIFE TYPICALLY INCLUDES: Confidently articulate, present and demonstrate the business value of Infor’s application solutions for warehouse management systems (WMS). Demonstrate Infor solutions in a way that clearly differentiates us from the competition. Work with sales team to determine potential solution fit. Create product solution presentations of Infor solutions that reinforce Infor’s value proposition that drive business transformation with the prospective customer. Participate in meetings and interviews with prospects to gather and understand their business’s requirements and technical environments. Resolve technical and product functionality questions. Work with Sales and Product Management / Marketing on competitor information, industry analysis, technology, and market trends. Respond to requests for proposals (RFPs). Work with Professional Services on deal progression, expectations, statement of works, and transition post-sale. Maintain industry, market, and product knowledge, as well as, stay abreast of competitor’s products, technology and offerings. Further, maintain knowledge of appropriate technology evolution. Provide product training as required. Maintain a working, demonstration environment suitable for performing solution demonstrations. Follow presales rules of engagement and activity reporting as required. Articulate the Infor technology vision & strategy in tandem with solution offerings Develop and manage client relationships Become proficient in providing presales support for other Infor products as required. WHAT YOU WILL NEED: Minimum of Eight (8) years’ experience in a reputed WMS/ERP Application is Preferred. Domain expertise in Supply Chain, Logistics, or Distribution Industries. Additional experience on WMS (Warehouse Management System) as a Consultant would be beneficial. Tertiary qualification in a business-related field is preferred. Experience, good understanding and knowledge of warehousing operations/process, material handling systems and labour/task management Experience selling Enterprise Software applications/solutions in multiple industries. As a Solution Consultant, good leadership and mentoring skills will be required to help contribute to account/opportunity strategies. Experience of the Infor technologies may be an advantage, although experience of similar ERP solutions will also be considered. Knowledge of positioning and selling Cloud-based solutions. Proven experience of solution consulting, although relevant product knowledge from an implementation or project related perspective will be considered. Expert knowledge on end-to-end processes analysis and solution alignment Outstanding presentation and communication skills Fluency in Thai/English verbal and written.

Jobtitle: SMB Publisher Account Manager - Japan Market
column8: Taboola is looking for a commercial, tech savvy Publisher Account Manager to join our fast growing team here in Tokyo, focused on our Japanese Publisher clients. Taboola is one of the fastest growing global start-ups in digital media and the leader in content recommendation. Our account managers are recognized as the best in the industry and are essential to the ongoing growth of our business. Japan is a large and crucial market for us as we grow and your clients would be among Japans leading publishers.  You would be responsible for the successful implementation and launch of the Taboola content discovery platform across Japan. You would be tracking performance and providing regular strategic direction for new opportunities to improve performance. The account management team is uniquely responsible for building and optimising existing relationships by identifying and presenting new initiatives to publishers to improve performance and revenues. Responsibilities and Skills: Manage and grow relationships with premium publisher clients and strategic partners in Japan Understand the organisation’s business needs and develop relationships at all levels Monitor and analyse metrics and proactively take steps to improve results Be an expert in Taboola’s platform and the benefits publishers gain by using it Fully comprehend the technology, revenue ecosystem and client needs/requirements in order to intelligently identify new opportunities and upsell the platform Work closely with the Publisher Sales teams as well as the remote R&D department in order to become a valuable resource and single point of contact to the client Communicate business intelligence from clients to the product management team in regards to new product development features Strategically support the Publisher Sales team in pre-sale proposal development Requirements: Experience as an Account Manager or customer facing position Fluent in Japanese and English Can speak Korean is an advantage Working with Publishers in Japan is an advantage Significant experience using Excel to generate reports and manipulate data Significant experience creating presentation decks with PowerPoint Outstanding relationship management and customer service skills Patience and a structured approach to your work, appreciating that the sales cycle can take much longer in the Publisher space compared to others. Very strong analytical skills to collect business intelligence by conversing with clients and monitoring/identifying trends in data and in generated reports Highly motivated, proactive, dedicated, resourceful and creative to ensure your clients receive world class service High attention to detail, organized and with strong communication skills Self-starter with the will and ability to work in a fast-paced, ever-evolving environment What is Taboola? Taboola is the world’s leading content discovery platform, serving 360B recommendations to over 1B unique visitors each month on the web’s most innovative publisher sites, including the BBC, Axel Springer, LeFigaro, Evening Standard, NBC, USA Today and more! Since our inception in 2007, Taboola’s team of ninja-like engineers and digital media experts has built the world’s largest and most advanced discovery platform – or “search engine just the other way around” – that provides more than a billion users each month with personalized recommendations on many of the most innovative and most visited websites on the internet. Thousands of leading publishers (e.g. India today, Zee, NDTV) and media agencies use Taboola’s innovative technology to increase user engagement, monetize their traffic and distribute content to committed users on the web. Today there are more than 1,400 taboolars around the world (and the number is growing) connecting users to content they might like but didn’t know existed. We have offices in New York, Los Angeles, London, Berlin, Paris, Tel Aviv, New Delhi, São Paulo, Shanghai, Tokyo and Bangkok If this sounds like an interesting opportunity, hit (easy) apply! Taboola is an equal opportunity employer and we value diversity in all forms. We are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees and believe such an environment is critical for success. Employment is decided on the basis of qualifications, merit, and business need.

Why Work at Lenovo We are Lenovo. We do what we say. We own what we do. We WOW our customers. Lenovo is a US$62 billion revenue global technology powerhouse, ranked #171 in the Fortune Global 500, employing 77,000 people around the world, and serving millions of customers every day in 180 markets. Focused on a bold vision to deliver smarter technology for all, Lenovo has built on its success as the world’s largest PC company by further expanding into growth areas that fuel the advancement of ‘New IT’ technologies (client, edge, cloud, network, and intelligence) including server, storage, mobile, software, solutions, and services. This transformation together with Lenovo’s world-changing innovation is building a more inclusive, trustworthy, and smarter future for everyone, everywhere. To find out more visit https://www.lenovo.com, and read about the latest news via our StoryHub. Description and Requirements Manage Product as 4P for RTM and Product Plan Business/ Planning • Co-work with country sales team & regional PM team to maximize margin and increase market share for all managed consumer product • Responsible for building, implementing, & executing country’s product demand generation programs, which align to quarterly & annual financial goals • Evaluate performance & Sell Out result at appropriate interval (Week/Month/Quarter) and instigate corrective actions to keep country on track to achieve target • Provide relevant input to the annual & quarterly planning cycles by review key financials (Units, Product-mix, AUR, Rev$, Margin$) • Identify opportunity to partner with alliances to grow business Product Related • Effectively manage Product Transitions with a view to maximizing revenue & profit • Ensure accurate forecasting for relevant products; co-owner (Country Sales & Regional PM) for country’s forecast • Effectively differentiates Lenovo offerings from competitive alternatives and creates distinct customer preference for Lenovo offerings. • Determine customer needs through participation in Sales & Customer meetings; recommend and position appropriate product to customers • Detail analyzing competitors’ “SPEC/Price/Promotion” to create appropriate product SPEC, position, pricing and SO program Position Requirements: Technical: • Strong understanding of product life cycle management and Launch plan • Strong understanding of promotional programs mechanics for consumer markets • Good understanding of corporate customer buying behavior • Good understanding of technology about PC and 3C products • Maintains mastery of competition's offerings, strategies, and plans Non-Technical: • Strong drive for results • Strong interpersonal skill & keen attention to details • Ability to manage through influence, negotiation • Good team work member to listen and focus on win-win solution • Strong verbal and written communication skills Work experience: 6-8 Years

column8: วุฒิการศึกษา - ปริญญาตรี สาขาวิชาชีพ - ทุกสาขา เงินเดือน/ค่าตอบแทน 35,000 UP ตำแหน่ง หลายอัตรา ตำแหน่ง รายละเอียดของงาน Gathered and analyze business requirements and ensuring solutions meet business needs and requirements. Assist and work directly with project manager to support overall project management. Collaborating with prospective users and clients to understand and anticipate their needs and translate them into product requirements. Manage and prioritize the IT backlog of products or any requirement. Coordinate project tasks and work closely with internal and external resources to execute against project tasks and maintain updated timelines and project documentation. Deal with external vendors in case of outsourcing service, evaluating and negotiating initially on solution, budget, plan, and requirements. Monitoring deliverables and ensuring timely completion on Market product time. Schedule and support project meetings, clearly communicating agenda and next steps to all participants. คุณสมบัติผู้สมัคร Bachelor’s or Master's degree in IT related field. At least 3 Years of experience in role business analysis. Experience in the business of  Financial, Banking or Leasing. Exceptional analytical, conceptual thinking and problem-solving skills. Experience creating detailed reports and giving presentations. Competency in documentation of requirement such as Diagram, BR, SRS, etc. Strong communication and presentation skills. Ability to multi-task and work under pressure. Excellent planning, organizational, and time management skills. Good command of both Thai and English. รายละเอียดบริษัท / สวัสดิการ บริษัทด้านเทคโนโลยีสารสนเทศ We work with a lot of industry experts and have more than 20 years of experience in Financial Software Development and Implementation. We deliver IT Solutions and Consistently great services to meet the diverse needs of customers. สวัสดิการพนักงาน Outsource (แบบ Contract สัญญาจ้าง) 1. เงินเดือน (ตามตกลง) 2. ประกันสังคม 3. วันหยุด 12 วันต่อปี 4. ค่า Laptop 2,000 บาทต่อเดือน (กรณีใช้อุปกรณ์ของตัวเอง) 5. เงินจูงใจอยู่ครบสัญญาเดือนละ 500 บาท 6. Company Outing Trip 7. ตรวจสุขภาพประจำปี 8. ปรับเงินเดือนประจำปี (กรณีทำงานครบ 1 ปี) วิธีการสมัคร - สมัครผ่านทาง Email: kittimaporn.p@finkub.co - สมัครผ่านทาง LINE Official: @499zbfxj ที่อยู่ของบริษัท/สำนักงาน บริษัท ฟินคับ จำกัด 338/23 ซอยลาดพร้าว 80 แขวงวังทองหลาง เขตวังทองหลาง จังหวัดกรุงเทพมหานคร 10310 อีเมล์ : kittimaporn.p@finkub.co โทร : 0956416179

Job Descriptions • Developping and leading the commercial appraoches and strategies to deliver the target. • Identifying new business opportunities and areas to grow more revenue. • Leading, developping and motivating the team to deliver the value and target. • Developing the customer centric and collaborative processes between clients and vendors to put the customer focus and insight to drive the growth. • Providing consultancy to the clients on customer insights and  key collaborative processes • Defining the strategiesand actions to enhance the customer project collaboration to ensure project success. • Facilitatingthe company’s new solutions deployment and organization engagement plans. • Achieving the assigned budget and 100% portfolio contract renewal. • Developing and maintaining the yielding relationships with key stakeholders. • Identifying the commercial opportunities to grow the contract value and to generate the revenue from the suppliers (or manufacturers) in Insight

column8: สถานที่ทำงาน : บางละมุง, ชลบุรี - 20150 Thailand อัตราค่าจ้าง : 18,500.00 - +อื่นๆ หรือ ตามตกลง คุณสมบัติ เพศ : หญิง อายุ :  25  ปีขึ้นไป ไม่เกิน 35 ปี  (เพศชายต้องผ่านการเกณฑ์ทหารแล้ว) วุฒิการศึกษา :  ม.6, ปวช.,ปวส.-ปริญญาตรี ไม่จำกัดสาขา สามารถใช้โปรแกรม Microsoft Office / Internet ได้ รักงานขายและบริการ บุคลิกดี  เข้ากับผู้อื่นได้ดี  และสามารถติดต่อสื่อสาร พูดภาษาอังกฤษได้พิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ มีความพร้อมในการเปิดใจและเรียนรู้สิ่งใหม่ๆ ***บริษัทมีสอนงานให้*** มีประสบการณ์ด้านงานขายรับพิจารณาพิเศษ เงินเดือน :    18,500++ บาท (หรือตามประสบการณ์และการตกลง) เวลาทำงาน : 08:00 – 17:00 น. วันจันทร์ – วันเสาร์ หยุดวันอาทิตย์ สวัสดิการ :  มีคอมมิชชั่น / ประกันสังคม / ยูนิฟอร์ม /  โบนัสไม่หยุดงาน – ไม่ขาดงาน - มาทำงานไม่สาย  / โอที  / พักร้อน  /วันหยุดประจำปี / ซองวันเกิด สนใจสมัครงาน ติดต่อฝ่ายบุคคล 086-9777107 , 085-1271260 (ไม่ตอบคำถามทางไลน์) ติดต่อ จันทร์-เสาร์ (9.00-17.00น.) column8: วุฒิการศึกษา - ปริญญาตรี สาขาวิชาชีพ - ทุกสาขา เงินเดือน/ค่าตอบแทน 18000 - 50000 ตำแหน่ง 4 ตำแหน่ง รายละเอียดของงาน ทำหน้าที่ในการเป็นตัวแทนให้ข้อมูลการขาย การนำเสนอสินค้าและบริการ และตอบคำถามเกี่ยวกับตัวสินค้าและบริการของบริษัท ประสานงานเรื่องการตลาดกับทีมภายในและลูกค้าให้ตรงตามแผนที่วางไว้ให้สำเร็จ ดูแล ให้บริการลูกค้าตลอดการขาย และติดตามผลหลังการขาย สร้างและดูแลรักษาความสัมพันธ์ที่ดีกับคู่ค้า คุณสมบัติผู้สมัคร ยินดีรับนักศึกษาจบใหม่ หรือผู้ไม่มีประสบการณ์ด้านการขาย จบการศึกษาระดับปริญญาตรีหรือเทียบเท่า ไม่จำกัดสาขา มีทักษะด้านการสื่อสารที่ดี ชอบพบปะผู้คน และมีทัศนคติดีมาก มีความเข้าใจเทคโนโลยี พร้อมที่จะเรียนรู้ และอยากพัฒนาตัวเอง มีความมุ่งมั่น มีเป้าหมาย และมองหาความก้าวหน้าในการทำงาน มีความกระตือรือร้น ชอบทำงานนอกสถานที่ สามารถเริ่มงานได้ทันที รายละเอียดบริษัท / สวัสดิการ เราคือผู้เชี่ยวชาญทางด้าน Digital Transformation, Paperless Solution, Document Management, e-Signature, e-Tax invoice and e-Receipt, Enterprise Content Management และ Robotic Process Automation เราส่งมอบประสบการณ์ การทำงานที่ดีมีประสิทธิภาพและเหมาะกับธุรกิจ เพื่อช่วยธุรกิจของคุณเติบโตได้อย่างแข็งแรง บริหารเวลาในการทำงานได้ ประกันสุขภาพกลุ่ม วันหยุดพักร้อนประจำ 12 วัน/ปี งบประมาณสำหรับเรียนคอร์สต่างๆ ทั้งออนไลน์และออฟไลน์ วิธีการสมัคร download ใบสมัครได้ที่ ใบสมัคร ส่งใบสมัครที่กรอกแล้วพร้อมเอกสาร Transcript, CV และ ผลงานที่เกี่ยวข้อง มาทาง e-mail ( hr@ginkgosoft.co.th ) ที่อยู่ของบริษัท/สำนักงาน บริษัท กิงโกะ ซอฟต์ จำกัด 140/30 ชั้นที่2 แขวงจตุจักร เขตจตุจักร จังหวัดกรุงเทพมหานคร 10900 อีเมล์ : wekij.l@ginkgosoft.co.th โทร : 020685566 เว็บไซต์ : http://www.ginkgosoft.co.th ใกล้กับสถานีรถไฟฟ้า MRT : สถานีลาดพร้าว, สถานีบางซื่อ

Jobtitle: [NEW] ช่างบริการ
Company: The Siam Kubota Industry Co., Ltd.
column8: ความรับผิดชอบและหน้าที่ Manages to achieve business growth and sales target of service parts and related products. Monitors sales performance, organize sales and marketing activities in order to ensure sales target achievement. Implements sales process management and assist dealers to develop operation standard in order to generate sales effectively and sustain customer satisfaction. Visits dealers in order to strengthen relationship, exchange necessary information and give proper suggestions relating to sales, marketing and operation aspects. Monitors competition by gathering current market situation on pricing, products, new products and related activities คุณสมบัติ Bachelor’s degree or higher in Economics, Marketing, Business Administration, Industrial Engineering or related field GPAX 2.70 for Bachelor’s degree, and 3.30 for Master’s degree Good in English (TOEIC at least 550 is required) Be able to drive a car with license, in order to coordinate retail sales, activity, and maintain relationship with dealers, and promote sales promotion in sales area Excellent command of English, Computer literacy especially MS Excel, PowerPoint Presentation, Able to travel up-country, have a driver’s license Be able to work at Navanakorn Industrial Estate. Be able to working on upcountry.

The Operation teams at Shopee covers the operational end-to-end process, from when the buyer searches for a product listed on the Shopee platform, to the moment the buyer receives the products. The team analyses and monitors operational KPIs across the region and conducts root cause analysis when operation performance fluctuates. The Operations team comprises Customer Service, Payment, Listings, Warehouse, Logistics, Seller Operations and Fraud. Understand large-scale express parcel logistics network operations to address business and operational pain points and identify opportunities that can be tackled from a Product standpoint. Lead functional features’ work streams concurrently in alignment with core business strategies while managing versatility through dynamic situations Collaborate closely with Regional Business Product Management teams and Local Business and Operations teams to strategize product feature requests and logic design based on alignment to business strategies and impact, resources, and pipeline management Conduct and manage UAT and live testing to make sure that a feature is developed as expected Develop feature rollout plan together with business team, make sure that risks of new feature release are identified and mitigated before rolling out Collaborate with local and regional production support teams to solve live issues related to responsible products within the expected lead time Prepare consolidated plans, system and feature performance, and project timelines for management. Manage business continuity risks and rapid growth, operational and project work streams

Role Purpose Interacting with external customers and other internal functions, providing and exchanging information on products, orders, shipments, as well as preparing regular reports for Bio/SVP/3P/SPS products. Coordination of Customer Service activities with cross functions: Commercial team, Warehouse, Accounting and Finance to ensure that the orders could be dispatch on time, in full and accuracy. Price and Trade campaign : to monitoring the effective validation and the correctness of price condition Effective performance as per agreed target and without compromising the standard operational guideline, code of conduct, company rule/regulation, quality manual and HSE standards achieved. Managing the order process, contributing to the achievement of sales targets, delivering outstanding customer experience and operational excellence. Responsible on raise request ID for Customer Master Maintenance in Master Path system. Arrange daily Billing report  by GRN Daily Upload in CPS program for distribute data to Customers who join CPS program Support in monitor, analysis and find room for improvement of Syngenta connect application. Customer data analysis to supporting and leading customer centric mindset. Business partner with commercial team to implement new business development and GTM. Qualifications Accountabilities Maintain relationship, communication with customers (distributors), other external partners, like warehouses, service providers, as well as internal stakeholders Execute process for Bio/SVP/3P/SPS products. ; receive, record and process customer orders using the existing Syngenta Connect platforms, check stock & credit limit availability, arrange delivery or customer pick up, issue required documents, invoice upon the order fulfillment, monitor order status In case of credit block, follow up with Finance on credit release Ensure efficient inventory management process regularly monitoring channel stock, Syngenta inventory optimization by locations, in order to support sales maximization, reduce lost opportunities and stock expiry. Check supply status for quality release Manage stock return process from the customers, documentation, billing and coordinate with all related parties. Manage Customer Complaint Processes for Bio/SVP/3P/SPS products and ensure timely reporting and processing of the customer complaints Manage the month end Report to Finance e.g. VL06O report, VFX3 report, SAP Report etc. Owner of Syngenta Connect system. Able to manage and guide related parties e.g. Sales, Marketing team and Growers to understand workflow processes. Look for improvement of the way of working, contribute to implementation of new technologies in the daily activities. Syngenta connect platform administration and P&S key person collaborating with IT, Finance, Commercial to continuous improving customer satisfaction. Proficiency software / IT solution / Digital tools enhancement internally and externally to supporting customer data analyst. Leading customer service initiatives to supporting P&S vision and mission for short-mid-long term strategy. Knowledge, experience & capabilities Bachelor Degree or BA prefer in related to Chemicals or Agriculture or Business and must have more than 3 years working experiences. Knowledge of Digital System and CS Knowledge of basic accounting is preferred Computer skill on Microsoft office Appetence to work with IT tools including SAP and MS Office Good Command in English both writing and speaking Experience in Customer Service, Order to Cash process, Logistics, Transportation Understanding of the Agrobusiness, market drivers, customer behaviors is a plus Strong verbal and written communication skills Strong teamwork capabilities Ability to work under pressure and deliver promises under tight timelines Proactive approach and Team winning attitude. Company Description As a world market leader in crop protection, we help farmers to counter these threats and ensure enough safe, nutritious, affordable food for all –while minimizing the use of land and other agricultural inputs. Syngenta Crop Protection keeps plants safe from planting to harvesting. From the moment a seed is planted through to harvest, crops need to be protected from weeds, insects and diseases as well as droughts and floods, heat and cold. Syngenta Crop Protection is headquartered in Switzerland.

About Us LINE E-Commerce team is the strategic business unit behind LINE SHOPPING Thailand, a thriving internal initiative to establish social-based e-commerce for the Thai market on LINE, one of the biggest messenger services across the globe. With the vision of democratizing entrepreneurship by empowering independent sellers to build a business and compete, accessing LINE's social graph and commerce technologies to create their own Direct-to-Consumer channels and fanbase for long-term repeatable and referable sales, we aim to be thought leaders and pioneers in the next era of independent sales channels and social-based and relationship-based commerce worldwide. Position Overview We are seeking a visionary and results-driven Director of E-Commerce to lead LINE SHOPPING through its next phase of growth and evolution. The ideal candidate will play a pivotal role in managing current operations, driving monetization strategies, and enabling product discovery and direction, steering the business unit towards its full potential as a market creator and leader by leading product, tech, and go-to-market teams towards the same goals. Responsibilities Strategic Planning: Develop and execute high-quality business strategies and plans aligned with short-term and long-term objectives, including both product and go-to-market initiatives Financial M anagement: Take charge of the service's P&L (Profit and Loss) to make the business sustainable by driving new business initiatives, maximizing potential revenue opportunities, managing the cost and resources, etc. Product Development: Guide the product development direction, ensuring alignment with market needs and anticipating future trends, and take an active role in identifying the next stage of growth for LINE SHOPPING Execution Management: Oversee all service operations, development, and business activities to ensure they produce the desired results and are consistent with the overall strategy and mission Effective Leadership: Foster a solution-focused, results-driven collaborative work environment that allows employees from different functions and departments to actively work towards company-wide goals; lead and motivate subordinates to advance employee engagement and develop a high-performing managerial and leadership team Team Leadership: Oversee a team of over 150-200 employees from various functions, including product, engineering, UX design, key account management, sales, marketing, and multiple-tier support Cross-functional Collaboration: Effectively collaborate with stakeholders within LINE not only in Thailand but also on a global scale, fostering collaborative relationships to support the service's growth and future possibilities Market Insight: Understand the market dynamics in e-commerce and stay tuned for industry trends, navigate changes, and embrace new services Qualifications Proven results in a senior leadership role within a high-growth e-commerce or social commerce company or a highly related role Experience in a growth-stage startup environment as well as a large corporation with multiple stakeholders preferred Strategic mindset with the ability to identify and capitalize on growth opportunities Understanding of market segments and dynamics in e-commerce, i., social commerce, e-marketplace players, website builders, alternative commerce, etc. Strong understanding of commerce P&L operations including monetization strategies and activities Track record of successfully leading teams and driving results in a dynamic and competitive market Familiarity with all business functions in a company including but not limited to marketing, sales, finance, and HR Domain knowledge in commerce-specific roles on both business operations and tech stack such as merchant acquisition and retention, performance marketing, buyer journey tracking, category management, affiliates, partnership management, vendor management, tech product development and management, Exceptional stakeholder management skills, both within the organization and externally Effective communication skills in aligning the direction of the service within internal teams Excellent command of both Thai and English Location LINE Thailand Head Office, Gaysorn Tower, Bangkok

Responsibilities  : Support sales activities of Sales Representatives (respond to client inquiries, issue quotations, troubleshoot, etc.). Respond to overseas agents. Collect and record freight cost information. Build and maintain good relationships with clients, shipping lines, and suppliers. Handle other sales and purchase-related tasks assigned by management. Requirements : Thai nationality / No age limit / Male or Female. Over 3 years of working experience as a Sales Representative, Customer Service, or Sales Coordinator in Ocean Freight Forwarding. Good computer skills and knowledge (Microsoft Office). Strong communication, suggestion, negotiation, troubleshooting, and time management skills. Knowledge of trade and logistics regulations (Customs, COGSA, FMC, FTA/EPA, etc.). High service mindset. Strong sense of responsibility, self-discipline, and teamwork. Good English skills (Proficiency in any other languages such as Japanese, Chinese, etc., is also welcomed). To Apply Please send your resume indicating experience and expected salary using button below or contact HR department directly. Contact K. Tanisa Transcontainer Logistics (Thailand) Co., LTD. 23/11-12 Sorachai Bldg., 11th Fl., Soi Sukumvit Rd., Klongton Nua, Vadhana, Bangkok 10110 Email : gabkk@tcl.co.th Tel : 02-714-3080 Ext 8700 Transcontainer Logistics (Thailand) Co., LTD.

Phra Khanong, Thailand Commercial – Field Sales / Permanent, Full-time / Hybrid Ninja Van is a tech-enabled logistics company on a mission to provide hassle-free delivery services for businesses of all sizes across Southeast Asia. Launched in 2014, we started operations in Singapore and have become the region's largest and fastest growing last-mile logistics company, partnering with over 35,000 merchants and delivering more than 1,000 parcels every minute across six countries. At our core, we are a technology company that is disrupting a massive industry with cutting-edge software and operational concepts. Powered by algorithm-based optimisation, dynamic routing, end-to-end tracking and a data-driven approach, we provide best-of-class delivery services that delight both the shippers and end customers. But we are just getting started! We have much room for improvement and many ideas that will further shape the industry. Why we need you As our Associate, Field Sales (B2B) you will be an essential part in driving sales and acquiring our potential shippers as a part of new business initiatives. The role will require a business-to-business sales skills with an understanding in logistics, market needs, and customer expectations. What you will do Identify the business opportunity and clients that would be interesting in B2B domestic Express services, as well as their business needs and requirement Prepare the sales materials to help with new client acquisition Work together with the respective departments to customize the services, routing, and pricing to meet the clients business Successfully converted and ensure smooth onboarding process for the clients including the related documents Maintain the accuracy and updates of the clients database in Salesforce Focuses on growing and developing existing clients for up-sell or cross-sell efforts Monitors competition by gathering current marketplace information on pricing, products, new products, delivery schedules, marketing techniques, etc. Responsible as a contact person for the clients to ensure good customer experience throughout the whole journey and help coordinate with relevant departments as necessary when issues arise At least 1 year of background experiences with proven records in B2B Sales, Business Development, Corporate Sales, or Category Sales Experiences and good understanding in logistics, express, or freight forwarding is highly preferred Bachelor degree in any related field Good communication skills in Thai and English Excellent sales, negotiation, and interpersonal skills Ability to work in the fast pace and dynamic working culture Submit a job application By applying to the job, you acknowledge that you have read, understood and agreed to our Privacy Policy Notice (the “Notice”) and consent to the collection, use and/or disclosure of your personal data by Ninja Logistics Pte Ltd (the “Company”) for the purposes set out in the Notice. In the event that your job application or personal data was received from any third party pursuant to the purposes set out in the Notice, you warrant that such third party has been duly authorised by you to disclose your personal data to us for the purposes set out in the the Notice.

Jobtitle: BK - Communications Manager – Campaigns and Events, EO
column8: Please note that your application must be submitted before 23:55 on the day mentioned in the above field “Application deadline”. Please be aware that the deadline for submitting applications is considered to be the time zone for the country where the vacancy has arisen. All applicants are required to mandatorily fill the online application form completely including the employment and educational details, experience, professional skills and behaviour-based questions. We will be thoroughly reviewing the applications and incomplete form in any respect may not be considered while shortlisting for the next stage. Only shortlisted candidates for interview will be contacted. Interviewees will be assessed on the core behaviours/qualifications listed above. Unsuccessful candidates will be notified via the system in due time. Appointable candidates who were unsuccessful may be placed on a ‘reserve list’. If during the reserve period of 6 months the same or a largely similar role becomes available, that role may be offered to the second or subsequent candidate. For inclusivity and diversity, please remove the following personal information when uploading your CV: name, address, email address, age, date of birth, gender, and nationality. The start date mentioned in the job advert is a tentative start date and the successful candidate will be required to undergo security vetting procedures. Any offer of employment will be subject to the candidate achieving suitable clearances. To those applicants not short-listed, we extend our appreciation for considering the British Government as a potential employer. The British Government is an inclusive and diversity-friendly employer.  We value difference, promote equality and challenge discrimination, enhancing our organisational capability. We welcome and encourage applications from people of all backgrounds. We do not discriminate on the basis of disability, race, colour, ethnicity, gender, religion, sexual orientation, age, veteran status or other category protected by law. We promote family-friendly flexible working opportunities, where operational and security needs allow. In terms of peak operation demand, work flexibly within the Section and within the Embassy All staff will be expected to make a corporate contribution to the smooth running of the British Embassy either through a committee membership or another voluntary role to support the vision and values of the Embassy as outlined below. The British Embassy Bangkok promotes the following values: Collaboration      We support each other and are inclusive. We work closely with others to deliver. Empowerment     We are innovative and adaptive. We achieve a healthy work-life balance, taking advantage of hybrid working. Expertise             We bring cultural, linguistic, geographic, historical and technical expertise to our work. We continuously invest in ourselves and share expertise for the benefit of the UK internationally. Respect               We have respect for each other and the different cultures we come from and work with. We are open, inclusive, fair and courteous and treat others with kindness and compassion. Resilience           We are ready to work in tough places or on difficult issues. We look after ourselves, support each other and display solidarity with individuals, teams and organisations. Please note that it is likely that any non-Thai national who is successful in securing a role within the Embassy will need to leave the country and re-enter with a specific type of visa if currently living in Thailand or will need to apply for a visa before travelling here if currently based outside of Thailand. Whilst the Embassy can support you with this process, the costs involved will need to be met by the candidate.

ตำแหน่ง : Digital Sales & Marketing (Web Ecommerce Platform) บริษัท : AR GROUP จำนวน : 1 หน้าที่ความรับผิดชอบ • ร่วมกำหนดทิศทางและนโยบายโดยรวมของผลิตภัณฑ์ Web Ecommerce Platform • ทำแผนการตลาดและประชาสัมพันธ์ • ขาย Product / Service ให้ได้ตามเป้าหมายแผนทางธุรกิจ • หาโอกาสในการที่ธุรกิจใหม่ (ขยาย) และติดตามคู่แข่ง  แนวโน้ม  ทิศทาง • ประชาสัมพันธ์ และสร้างภาพลักษณ์ของผลิตภัณฑ์ คุณสมบัติผู้สมัคร วุฒิปริญญาตรี - ปริญญาโท สาขาการบริหารการตลาด, การบริหารทั่วไป หรือสาขาที่เกี่ยวข้อง มีประสบการณ์ในการบริหารงาน การขายและการตลาด อย่างน้อย 1 ปี มีประสบการณ์ในอุตสาหกรรม IT  โดยเฉพาะเรื่องเว็บไซต์สำเร็จรูป, เว็บอีคอมเมิร์ซ ติดต่อ สนใจส่ง resume มาที่ hr@ar.co.th หรือ ติดต่อฝ่ายทรัพยากรบุคคล 0 2439 4600 ต่อ 1221 คุณพรเพ็ญ,1241 คุณนิสารัตน์ Apply Now
