WeLoveSuperMom, a fast-growing and dynamic marketplace and community platform, has a mission to enable parents and families to live better and smarter in Southeast Asia. Boasting one of the largest family communities in Singapore and growing fast in SEA, we are looking for self-driven, innovative, and collaborative media sales leader to help drive this growth story. We are looking for an experienced Media Sales Director to drive sales and brand partnerships. You will lead and manage both client and agency relationships to deliver profitable revenue growth through solution sales. As a successful Media Sales Director, you are a true “hunter” type with a tremendous amount of motivation and commitment to produce results. As a senior sales leader, you recognise the importance of driving revenue and profitability and have a unique capability to create sales solutions that do both. If this excites you, then we would love to hear from you! Specific qualifications for the role include: Leverage your existing customer network to pitch and close innovative customer solutions from Supermom’s array of products for insights, brand building, content marketing, and demand generation Thorough understanding of digital media and content marketing landscape including video, mobile, social, display, programmatic and experiential Proven sales track record in selling digital and custom content Results-oriented and self-driven Ability to conceptualize and deliver creative integrated solutions Have a "phone-first" mentality with a "wait for no-one" approach Wants to ASK for action of others and understands deadlines Able to lead a team of sales persons to achieve sales targets and 2x deal sizes Requirements At least 8+ years of sales experience Proven track record in identifying new and innovative opportunities and closing deals with a solution-based approach for clients, agencies and partners Strong understanding of digital advertising is a bonus Have exceptional communication skills and an ability to build excellent rapport with strategic decisions makers Good understanding of how to run and measure performance with relevant KPIs Experience working in a highly collaborative environment with internal and external stakeholders Experience with using CRM platform such as Hubspot is a bonus Benefits Robust compensation package: Base-plus-commissions Bonus plans based on individual, team and/or campaign deliveries Comprehensive ongoing training and professional development career path programs Director-led boardroom, classroom and personalized coaching and training Work hard, play hard office culture led by a diverse and inclusive workforce

At our auto repair shop, we offer a wide range of services to meet your automotive needs. Our certified technicians are experienced in all aspects of car repair, and they can diagnose and repair any issue on any make or model of vehicle. We specialize in engine repair, brake service, transmission repair, oil changes, tire rotation and balancing, and other common maintenance services. We also provide full electrical and suspension services, as well as preventive maintenance services to keep your vehicle running smoothly. Our goal is to provide you with the best repair services possible and to make sure you are completely satisfied with our work. The Role You will be responsible for : Driving sales objectives and achieving commercial budget and targets. Identifying new sales opportunities and building client relationships. Building a high performing team by providing strong mentorship, coaching and guidance. Ensuring timely recognition and reward for top achievers and implement performance management actions when needed. Ensuring proper use of the database and tools to track performance. Building strong and collaborative relationships with other internal stakeholders. Monitoring market trends and providing regular competitor analysis. Ensuring strong customer service levels are met in line with Company objectives. Supporting the customer service team in resolving escalated issues or complaints. Collaborating effectively with supply chain, sales and other teams to ensure prompt and accurate order processing and delivery. Developing plans to improve customer experience and satisfaction along with other internal stakeholders. Recruiting, training, coaching and performance managing the customer service team. Organising data and generating deep customer insights in order to enhance sales force productivity and effectiveness. Supporting the sales team key planning and operations tasks to support the overall objective of the business. Attainment Planning through effective goal setting, designing sales incentives to drive business objectives and territory analysis & definition for sales maximum effectiveness. Providing pricing and contract support by providing the sales team with high-quality and competitive proposals. Monitoring and analysing key sales and business performance indicators and trends to drive strategic and tactical business decisions and also coordinating and ensuring accuracy of sales forecasts. Ensuring Sales process adoption and compliance and also identifying opportunities for improvement in the sales process and systems to ensure greater sales effectiveness and efficiency. Managing a team of 6-10 people. Ideal Profile You have at least 1 year experience within a Customer Service, Sales Operations / Support or Sales (B2C) role, ideally within the Professional Services industry. You possess excellent interpersonal as well as written and verbal communication skills. You are a strong networker & relationship builder You pay strong attention to detail and deliver work that is of a high standard You are highly goal driven and work well in fast paced environments What's on Offer? Leadership Role Opportunity to make a positive impact Flexible working options

Jobtitle: SMB Publisher Account Management Team Lead
column8: Curious about what it’s like to work at the world’s number 1 discovery platform as an SMB Publisher Account Management Team Lead  ? We’re glad you asked! What is the key purpose of a Publisher Account Management Team Lead? The Team Lead will be responsible for leading a team of Account managers responsible for APAC to develop the growth strategy for an existing book of business. Acting in a consultative sales capacity, this person will partner with cross-functional teams to lead client relationships and identify up-sell/optimization opportunities at scale. What will I be doing on a day-to-day basis? Manage and develop the account management team based in Bangkok while fostering a collaborative environment that mirrors Taboola’s values and industry excellence Achieve quarterly revenue targets, with a significant focus on client retention as well as scaling up the existing advertising book of business Oversee the onboarding, training, performance management, career development, coaching and mentoring of the team Oversee internal education and training program for team members to ensure team is setup for success, have a thorough understanding of Taboola’s policies and procedures, and are subject-matter experts in their respective roles Understand business goals for book of business and anticipate needs to deliver optimal solutions Attend quarterly business reviews and strategic meetings with key clients throughout the year to establish senior level relationships Elicit client feedback to act as internal advocate for our clients Collaborate with Product, Marketing and Technical Support teams to create positive client experiences and drive ongoing development of client solutions to meet market demand Report into the Regional Director of Account Management in APAC based in Bangkok What skills and qualifications do I need? Must haves: 4+ years of professional client-facing experience in the digital advertising space is a must Outstanding relationship management and client service skills preferably with expertise of brands within premium agencies Exceptional communication skills Strong critical thinking skills and ability to translate big data in a commercial and simplified fashion Ability to effectively prioritize and manage tasks within a fast-paced environment Demonstrated ability to work and collaborate within a high-performing team. Self-motivated, entrepreneurial, and comfortable dealing with ambiguity. Nice to haves: Prior experience directly leading teams is an advantage, however we are open to consider candidates who have demonstrated leadership qualities from e.g. leading projects and initiatives Why choose Taboola? Working at Taboola gives you the chance to be part of building something unique. We are a company that embraces change, has enormous potential for growth and offers a challenging yet collaborative working environment where you will always feel valued and be given every opportunity to make a name for yourself. So, if you’re ready for a new challenge in a company with like-minded creative individuals, a fast pace and endless opportunities with exciting brands why not come and see what we’re all about, you won’t be disappointed.

Location: Thailand (Bangkok) Role Overview: In this key role, you will manage, direct and drive direct sales into Enterprise Accounts. Create and implement strategic plans focused on attaining enterprise-wide deployments of Fortinet products and services. Develop executive relationships with key buyers and influencers in Major Enterprise accounts and leverage these relationships. Coordinate with appropriate internal groups to generate and deliver winning Contract Bids, Proposals, RFI/RFP Responses, and Statements of Work. Negotiate terms of business with clients to achieve win/win results that provide the basis for strong ongoing relationships. Responsibilities: Primary relationship owner for an assigned group of Enterprise Accounts with responsibility for growing Fortinet solution install base and creating new opportunities. Primary relationship owner for an assigned group of Enterprise Accounts with responsibility for growing Fortinet solution install base and creating new opportunities. Manage multiple Enterprise accounts; develop positive working relationships with all customer touch points especially key Executives, Decision Makers and Stakeholders. Prepare annual Account plans and create engagement / coverage plan for the assigned accounts. Work closely with clients to identify needs, planned initiatives, business directions, and act as trusted adviser and advocate on best practices and solutions to address the clients’ IT and Cybersecurity goals and objectives. Prepare and deliver effective client presentations, including stakeholders at all levels of the organization up to C-Suite. Deliver weekly, monthly and quarterly status and results in assigned accounts and meet expected revenue target per month and quarter. Identify new opportunities from within existing accounts, partnering with the SE team, Partner Team and extended Product and Services Teams to aid in increasing revenue potential and solution footprint in each account. Drive client retention, renewals, upsells/ cross-sells and ensure high client satisfaction. Partner with internal cross-functional teams – such as Product, Technical, Professional Services and Partner Teams - to understand customer goals and key performance metrics. Manage customer activity, engagement and opportunities using SFDC tools for maximum efficiency and visibility, with carefully executed follow-up to closure on identified opportunities. Maintain superior customer service levels, customer satisfaction and operational excellence. Requirements: 10+ years experience in Account Management in Information Technology / Security solutions companies, preferably with experience in selling to Enterprise Accounts. Dynamic personality with ability to effectively engage and influence a variety of audiences at all levels of the client’s organization. Excellent oral and written communication and a demonstrated ability to work collaboratively with all levels of internal and external stakeholders. Focus on relationships, able to gain trust through communication, expectation setting and completion of planned and committed deliverables. Business acumen, sound decision making, analytical and organizational skills in a fast paced environment; a consultative approach to managing complex client relationships. Working knowledge and experience in selling key cybersecurity, networking and IT products and solutions, as well as knowledge of top competitive solutions in the market. Ability to prioritize and multi-task while balancing client expectations and deliverables on multiple projects. Bachelor's Degree in Engineering, IT or Management with equivalent work experience; Master’s Degree in Business and Management an advantage. Strong analytical skills with demonstrated ability to work independently and remain motivated. Fortinet is an equal opportunity employer. We will only notify shortlisted candidates. Fortinet will not entertain any unsolicited resumes, please refrain from sending them to any Fortinet employees or Fortinet email aliases. Should any agency submit any resumes to Fortinet, these resumes if considered, will be assumed to have been given by the agency free of any related fees/charges. #LI-PC1

If you are a beauty fanatic who is passionate about fragrance, makeup and skincare, we would like to speak with you! Possess overall pleasant appearance Knowledge of operations. Able to work in fast-paced environment. Technology savvy and digital trend awareness. Language skills in English and Chinese is preferred. At CHANEL, we believe the uniqueness of each individual increases the diversity and vibrancy of our teams, and we foster an inclusive culture so that everyone can perform at their best. We strongly encourage your application, and value the perspective and experience you can bring to CHANEL.

Welcome to Hy Digital! Are you ready to take on an exciting challenge in the fast-growing world of digital marketing? Join our dynamic and innovative company, where you'll have the opportunity to grow alongside us! Collaborate with clients from diverse industries such as events & entertainment, hotel & travel, real estate, B2B, and e-commerce. We are seeking highly motivated and engaged individuals who thrive in the fast-moving and ever-evolving realm of Digital Marketing & Development. As a rapidly expanding BOI-accredited agency, we offer a flexible and dynamic work environment that allows you to unleash your creativity and reach new heights. What's in it for you? Prepare for an exciting journey of learning and fun! Together with your clients and the team, you'll contribute to the development and implementation of marketing plans, manage projects, and fulfil client requests across various industries. * An attractive salary package (THB18 - 65K) with fantastic perks, including a smartphone with a subscription, a laptop, and a Spotify account. * A bonus structure that rewards your exceptional performance. * As we grow rapidly, there are abundant opportunities for fast-paced career progression. * You'll receive comprehensive on-the-job training in all aspects of Digital Marketing, account management, and sales. * A stimulating work environment that offers flexible hours and embraces a unique, open, and informal culture. Get ready to thrive in a fun, diverse, and international working environment! Your Responsibilities: * Cultivate meaningful and long-term relationships with clients. * Ensure seamless communication between clients and the internal team. * Book in new campaigns and deliverables based on client requirements. * Discuss deliverables, campaign progress, and results with clients. * Identify opportunities to grow business with existing clients. * Create engaging proposals for new prospects based on strategies. Who are we hiring? * Thai national with great English comprehension skills. * Ambitious, driven and easygoing. * Relevant educational background +1. * 1 year of relevant work experience. * Have a creative mindset focused on achieving results. * Social media and digital marketing knowledge are advantageous Are you up to the challenge? More about Hy-Digital: At Hy-Digital, we are a young, energetic, and data-driven digital marketing agency dedicated to delivering effective, rewarding, and measurable solutions for our clients. We empower companies to successfully transition and thrive in the digital realm, ensuring optimal utilization of their media budgets and achieving outstanding campaign results. Interested in Joining Our Team? If you're eager to dive into the world of Digital Marketing, send us your CV and a brief introduction about yourself. Please note that only applications with a CV will be considered. Due to the high volume of applications, it may take some time for us to get back to you. Join us today and become a part of the exciting world of digital marketing! Take the first step by submitting your CV and a brief introduction about yourself to express your interest in this incredible opportunity.

With the mission of "Unleashing the potential of the manufacturing industry," CADDi strives to create a world that can realize each manufacturer’s strength to create a flat, non-hierarchical relationship between customers and manufacturers. We are challenging to transform the entire manufacturing supply chain from both upstream and downstream and to create an infrastructure that encourages companies with global potential to grow. We welcome those who can share CADDi's mission, vision, and culture. We are looking for an experienced Field Sales Representative for our B2B SaaS Product, “Drawer”, to lead and build up our field sales team. The members in the position will monitor sales metrics and manage the entire sales administration process. They will collaborate with various professionals, so they must have excellent communication skills and feel comfortable working in a team environment. They should also be able to lead and motivate the sales team to achieve specific goals. Ultimately, the Field Sales Representative should be able to build a high-performance sales team to ensure customer success. The Role You will be responsible for : Identifying opportunities for new business development through following up on leads and conducting research on target clients. New business generation by meeting potential clients to understand needs and providing relevant solutions. Managing the sales process to close new business opportunities. Building strong relationships with the existing portfolio of clients. Setting weekly and monthly activity and revenue targets for the team and driving them to achieve these. Building a high performing team by providing strong mentorship, coaching and guidance. Managing a team of 1-5 people. Pre-Sales activity as a team: Work closely with Field Sales member and provide trial or demo experience to enhance sales activities Analyze customer pain point and consider and introduce potential use case to solve their problem Customer Onboarding: Lead the onboarding process for new customers, ensuring a smooth transition and understanding of our manufacturing solutions. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to provide training and resources to customers.. Account Management: Build and maintain strong, long-lasting relationships with key customer accounts. Understand customers' unique needs and challenges, and work to align our solutions with their goal. Customer Engagement: Proactively engage with customers to gather feedback, address concerns, and identify opportunities for improvement. Organize regular check-ins and reviews to assess customer satisfaction and product performance. Product Knowledge: Develop an in-depth understanding of our manufacturing products and services. Stay updated on industry trends and best practices to provide valuable insights to customers. Renewals and Upselling: Manage customer renewals and proactively identify opportunities for upselling or cross-selling our manufacturing and drawer solutions. Partnerships and Alliances: Identify strategic partnerships and alliances that can enhance our market presence and customer acquisition efforts. Reporting and Documentation: Maintain detailed records of customer interactions and feedback. Provide regular reports and updates to leadership on customer success efforts and outcomes. Other general project management Set and execute team goals and metrics (KGI/KPI) Coordinate department projects to meet deadlines Research and discover methods to increase customer engagement Build an open communication environment for your team Monitor progress and submit performance reports Ideal Profile You have at least 5 year experience within a B2B Sales / Account Executive or Sales Engineer role, ideally within the Electronics, Manufacturing and Software / SaaS industry. You possess excellent interpersonal as well as written and verbal communication skills. You possess strong analytical skills and are comfortable dealing with numerical data You are a strong team player who can manage multiple stakeholders You are highly goal driven and work well in fast paced environments Qualifications Proven work experience as field sales representative, especially in B2B Software sales Hands on experience with CRM software and MS Excel In-depth understanding of the sales administration process Excellent interpersonal and team management skills Strong analytical, leadership and organizational skills Numerical abilities and problem-solving attitude Analytical and creative thinking Exquisite communication and interpersonal skills Strong phone presence and experience dialing dozens of calls per day Excellent verbal and written communications skills Professional English skill Preferred Qualifications Experience in the manufacturing or relevant industry Proven sales experience in software industry Track record of over-achieving quota Ability to multi-task, prioritize, and manage time effectively Experience in business development, consulting, or digital transformation project Japanese Language is plus but not required in order to effectively liaise with the Stakeholders of the region. What's on Offer? A role that offers a breadth of learning opportunities Attractive Salary & Benefits Leadership Role

Jobtitle: Key Account Manager, Systems & Services - Retail and Hospitality
column8: Job Title Key Account Manager, Systems & Services - Retail and Hospitality Job Description We are currently pooling talents for a potential K ey Account Manager, Systems & Services - Retail & Hospitality for upcoming position to be part of our APAC Systems and Services Team, role will be based in our Bangkok office . Working for Signify means being creative and adaptive. Our culture of continuous learning and commitment to diversity and inclusion creates an environment that allows you to build your skills and career. Together, we’re transforming our industry. As the world leader in lighting, we’re constantly ahead of the curve. Through our leadership in connected lighting and the Internet of Things, we’re breaking new grounds in data analytics, AI, and smart homes, offices, cities and more! Signify is one of the few companies in the world to achieve carbon neutrality and our next sustainability goals are even bolder: doubling our positive impact on the environment and society by 2025. We’re on the lookout for forward-thinking innovators with a passion for sustainability. If you match this description, get in touch! What you’ll do Responsible for developing, expanding and growing our Retail and Hospitality business in Thailand Execute sales strategy and deliver sales targets in the context of local market trends and opportunities Develop, maintain and improve long-term partnership with customers with target to establish Signify as a preferred lighting solutions provider Hunt for brand new opportunities for our retail and hospitality segment (hotel and shopping mall developers) And everything else which comes with the role of a modern sales person; documenting the sales pipeline & visits in CRM software, ensure timely collection of payments and always be on top of the latest trends and developments in the market. Just to name a few... Your qualifications Strategic mindset with focus on execution and strong understanding of B2B End-user / Enterprise business 5+ years combined Sales and Sales Management experience gained from an IT / Building Materials / Automation industry Wide network in the Hospitality (Hotels) and Retail (Malls) sector such as real estate owners, hotel / mall operators, large retailers, architects and interior designers among others. 5+ years of proven track-record in key account management, solution selling, enterprise sales, and value based selling principles Lighting / solution selling experience or understanding of IoT selling eco-system is preferred Excellent English communication and presentation skills A team player mindset and excitement to bring the business to the next level Our candidate profile is just a guide. We know that many talented people only apply for jobs when there is an exact match. If you don't fit all the criteria but believe this role is for you, we would very much like to hear from you. What you’ll get in return… We’re offering multiple opportunities for career development, like mentoring, coaching and stretch assignments, with strong international exposure for dynamic profiles. Learning is fundamental to our culture. Through continuous learning, we are transforming the industry. You have the chance to learn every day, acquire new skills and perspectives through customized online programs, and on-the-job experiences. See #SignifyLife through the eyes of our employees!

Bridging British Education Virtual Academy (BBEVA) is affiliated with UK Double Wings International Ltd. The academy aims to provide high-quality international education to students whose first language is not English. BBEVA is a global international education provider and a leader in its field. Currently, BBEVA has channel users and students in mainland China, Hong Kong, Southeast Asia, the Middle East, Australia, and Europe. The Role We are looking for a high-performing Sales and marketing manager to help us meet our customer acquisition and revenue growth targets by keeping our company competitive and innovative. ﻿Your responsibilities will include: Achieving growth and hitting sales targets by successfully managing the sales team Designing and implementing a strategic sales plan that expands the company’s customer base and ensures a strong presence. Managing recruiting, objectives setting, coaching and performance monitoring of sales representatives Responsible for client and channel development, understanding market trends, devising strategic plans, expanding, and maintaining relationships with new and existing clients and channels, and establishing long-term, stable relations. Explore customer and channel needs and potential, develop marketing plans using diverse market approaches, and achieve business growth targets. Understand customer and channel requirements, provide product and service introductions, and recommend suitable product-service solutions. Establish positioning, identify target audiences, and develop marketing plans with specific objectives across different channels and segments. Analyze customer insights, consumer trends, market analysis, and marketing best practices to build successful strategies, increase customer conversions, and generate more qualified leads. Manage content and updates for customer and internal touch points, establish budget guidelines, participate in events, document business processes. Establish and improve databases of potential clients or channels, actively develop internal and external resources, and follow up with prospective clients. Participate in other marketing activities, proactively develop channels, identify potential clients, and develop referrals. Participate in various training programs organised by the company to maintain proficiency in business and operating systems. Collaborate with the team, complete additional tasks assigned by superiors, and contribute to the mutual improvement of personal and team values. Ideal Profile No educational restrictions, but candidates with a bachelor's degree or higher will be given preference. Have at least 1 year experience within a Business Development / Account Manager (B2B), Sales (B2C) or Sales Operations / Support role, ideally within the Education industry. Proficiency in both Thai and English communication. Chinese, Japanese, and Korean languages is a plus to be able to liaise effectively to different stakeholders across the region. Strong communication skills; A strong networker & relationship builder Excellent ability to expand client base, sales-oriented mindset, clear logical thinking, effective communication, and resource integration skills. Self-driven and goal-oriented, with enthusiasm for work and a pioneering spirit. Able to take on challenges and handle pressure, with excellent teamwork abilities. What's on Offer? Personal growth opportunities and development space. Salary+Commission Leadership Role

Overview This role is to lead the agenda on THF Promotion and Trade Spend Strategy, cooperate with GM, Finance, Mkt, TMK, Shopper Insights, KAM, and Channel Head to ensure we have promo optimization and drive trade spend efficiency, able to drive Savory share growth while continuing to deliver the best outcome on NRR, ROI, and uplift. Responsibilities Mainly focus on trade spending in small trade formats (CVS and mini format). Recommend and encourage the commercial team to drive the best mechanic to drive volume, uplift, and market share. Identify key priorities for investment from current tools (i.e. Price elasticity, gain & loss analysis, ROI model, etc) Lead and develop a trade spend strategy for investment by PPG and accounts. Recommend and encourage KAM for investment priorities within responsible accounts. Apply consumer and shopper insights to propose new mechanics to match the new opportunity. Setting up and influencing key stake holders on promotion guardrails for Commercial team Tracking key success of key competitors Qualifications Consumer occasion understanding Robust knowledge on channel margins and trade spend requirements Value chain / P&L understanding Master's / Bachelor's Degree in Business Administration or a related field > 5 years of working experience in Commercial, Trade MKT, and Finance-related role in FMCG industry Strategic thinking Analytical skills Shopper & Consumer Insights understanding Hands-on in the field Good presentation / communication skills Collaborative & growth mindset

Jobtitle: Regional Business Development Director (Thailand, Cambodia, Laos, Vietnam)
column8: What We Do At Coda, we break down barriers between publishers and their audiences by thinking outside of the app. Coda is trusted by 300+ top digital content publishers  – including industry giants Activision Blizzard, Bigo, Electronic Arts, Riot Games, and Zynga – to grow revenue, profit margins, and customer engagement in 60+ markets with ease. For publishers, this means less lift, more players and more payers. For players, Coda’s solutions allow them to pay for play their way. Our winning formula? A laser-focused, pragmatic attitude coupled with an unwavering commitment to excellence. We are customer-centric, creative, and solution-oriented, always delivering to our users the top-tier entertainment content they want at competitive prices. If you’re ambitious, bold and ready to take your career to the next level, get in touch! About Coda’s Global Partnerships Team Coda’s Global Partnerships team mission is to ensure the success of Coda by committing ourselves to the success of our digital content and service partners.  This global team of business development professionals engages with leading providers of digital content and services as well as local payment and content distribution partners to execute situationally dependent partnership strategies that connect partner supply (digital content and services) to global consumer demand and measurably drive partner revenue and margin growth. About This Role Thailand, Cambodia, Laos and Vietnam are among Coda’s largest markets. Given the importance of local partnerships, this role will be critical in ensuring Coda’s success in the region. The Regional Director will be responsible for all Business Development efforts, as well as Account Management, Local Operations and general support to the rest of the organization. Responsibilities: Business Development : develop and grow a network of local and regional partners, with a focus on Payment providers and Distribution partners Account Management : manage the relationship and maximize value from our local partners (marketing support, co-investments, renegotiations, optimization of conversion rates, etc.) Local leadership and operations : Local and Regional leadership: Serve as Coda’s spokesperson internally and externally for the market, provide local leadership to employees in the region General Support: Work closely with Legal, Finance, Tax, Product on multiple initiatives related to the market Regulatory: Understand and communicate the regulatory and market environment in the region, provide local admin support Market intel: Provide intel regarding changes in the market (competition, payment landscape, distribution trends, price benchmarks, regulatory changes, etc.), build and maintain a network of local industry leaders Requirements: 8+ years in a top-tier consulting/investment firm, and/or in a fast-paced, high-growth environment Track record of effectively renegotiating, optimizing, and managing B2B partnerships Experience in Payments, Fintech, or distribution of digital content is a strong plus. Knowledge of or interest in gaming is a strong plus Sound understanding of the tax, legal, and regulatory dimensions of a cross-border business Sound strategic thinking, data analysis skills, and creative problem-solving Excellent communication and leadership skills Excellent command of Thai and English High sense of ownership, autonomy, and self-motivation Working at Coda Joining the Coda team means diving into a fast-paced, challenging, and exciting world. With Codans spread across over 30 countries around the world, our highly collaborative environment breaks down time zones and cultural barriers, empowering you to chase innovative ideas, contribute to Coda’s growth, and make a lasting impact. If you have a passion for pushing boundaries, and thrive on continuous improvement through experimentation, we'd love to hear from you! Our Perks* WFH/ Hybrid Support: Get a monthly allowance to cover your working expenses and keep you connected. Wellness Boost : Stay healthy with resources for physical and mental well-being with our flexible benefits and Employee Assistance Program - because you matter! Customized Benefits : Tailor your benefits with our flexible plan. Growth Opportunities : Unlock your potential through clear progression paths. Skill Development : Access training resources to fuel your personal and professional growth. Volunteer Time Off : Enjoy paid time off to make a difference in the world through volunteering. Family Care : Take advantage of paid Family Care Leave to bond with your family, while our selected Flexible Benefits also cater to your family's needs. *Benefits are reviewed and updated on a yearly basis We are proud to be an equal opportunity employer, embracing the unique qualities of every individual, regardless of gender, race, age, religion, disability, or other local protected classes. Our goal is to foster an inclusive environment where everyone feels welcome and valued. Due to the large number of exceptional applications we receive, we can only reach out to shortlisted candidates. If you don't hear from us, rest assured there may be another opportunity at Coda that aligns better with your unique abilities. Remember to check our Careers Page for more exciting job openings!

CSME is a full-stack digital marketing agency that has been helping businesses to grow their online presence globally for over a decade. We believe in hard work and rewarding success from hard work. We are currently looking for new Thai sales staff that are commited to growing our Thai Sales Team and are willing to grow this businesses as if it was their own. The Role Junior Sales Executive 20,000-25,000THB Senior Sales Executive (Must have experience in Digital Marketing Sales) 25,000-40,000THB Job Description: We are looking for an enthusiastic Sales Representative to contribute in generating sales for our company. You will be responsible for making contact with companies based in Thailand over the phone, to discuss their digital problems and finding a solution, following up with emails and assisting or closing sales of our services either over the phone or face to face along with maintaining good customer relationships.An effective sales representative must be an excellent communicator and have superior people skills. They must be comfortable presenting products or services over the phone and face to face, as well as dealing with complaints and doubts.The goal is to help the company grow by bringing in customers and developing business. Sales Representative responsibilities include: Contacting potential or existing customers to inform them about a product or service using scripts Answering questions about products or the company Asking questions to understand customer requirements and close sales Direct prospects to the field sales team when needed Enter and update customer information in the database Take and process orders in an accurate manner Handle grievances to preserve the company’s reputation Go the “extra mile” to meet sales quota and facilitate future sales Keep records of calls and sales and note useful information Ideal Profile Experience as telesales representative or other sales/customer service role Successfully meeting sales quota preferably over the phone Good knowledge of relevant computer programs (e.g. CRM software) and telephone systems Ability to learn about products and services, describe/explain them to prospects Do research and provide reports to prospects Excellent communication and interpersonal skills Cool-tempered and able to handle rejection Outstanding negotiation skills with the ability to resolve issues and address complaints High school diploma; BSc/BA will be a plus Knowledge of English is preferred What's on Offer? A role that offers a breadth of learning opportunities Leadership Role Work alongside & learn from best in class talent

Role Purpose Build, maintain and deliver an Area Business Plan for the given geographic area. Insure optimum coverage and penetration of the given countries for both Syngenta and the customers Define and adapt the best go-to-market approach by selecting and managing an optimum portfolio of attractive business partners, generating profitable sales and growing Syngenta's market share in the given geographic area Manage Key Account business development projects. Accountabilities Meet agreed targets and objectives for Flowers business Create product demand through customer product presentations and training, technology transfer and product benefit communications with customers, growers, YPL growers, centres of influence and grower association meetings Organise where needed: workshops, seminars, company trial days, and commercial demonstrations to promote Syngenta genetics Steer and validate forecasting / input tactical plan / input annual budget Delivering required-relevant input for monthly reporting through the S&OP platform Feedback market intelligence and value chain information in a timely manner to relevant members of the Syngenta team Develop & deliver compelling customer driven offers to maximize the business Develop/implement sound value and transactional pricing based on customer perceived value Co-Develop, support and execute campaign plans Continually review distributors’ performance against KPI’s Review and Manage overview sales budgeting and forecasting per distributor Gain regular distributor’s feedback on Syngenta performance & propose necessary actions Maintain customer relationships and realize high customer satisfaction Ensure effective collaboration with Sales Support, Marketing, Technical Specialists, Product management and other Syngenta functions to maximise the value to and from each Account Management and coordination of the day-day sales activities in line with rules & compliancy within company ,and reporting forums to monitor commercial performance; initiate corrective actions to ensure targets are delivered Translate Syngenta Flowers Strategy to local needs All employees must take personal responsibility and co-operate in preventing harm to themselves, others and the environment.  This can be achieved by complying with Syngenta’s work instructions, policies and procedures and actively supporting and contributing to the ongoing development of HSE standards. Qualifications Knowledge, experience & capabilities Critical knowledge Bachelor’s degree (Ag, preferred), or Horticultural qualification. Minimum of 5 years relevant experience, i.e. Nursery industry (retail or grower), Allied Trader and or Horticulture supply chain experience, Key account management skills and distribution driven experience : 5 - 10 years Understanding of competitive environment Agribusiness experience: knowledge of cropping practices and (preferrably) crop protection products 5 - 10 years Critical experience Negotiation and influencing skills Deep customer and market understanding Ability to develop sustainable strategic partnerships with leading ornamental business value chain players Critical technical, professional and personal capabilities Applies effective grower, channel and influencer segmentation Ability to develop/deliver and implement innovative, customer driven offers Ability to develop/implement sound value and transactional pricing based on customer perceived value Delivers distinctive value propositions to customers in line with agreed strategies & building on campaign plans. Able to Co-Developing and executing campaign plans Understands market dynamics and competitive environment Anticipates changes in the market and propose strategy adjustments accordingly Influencing and negotiation Communication and presentation skills People/team player Critical success factors Customer oriented Result driven and business oriented Ability to prioritise and focus her/his job and KA team on must wins Business knowledge Creativity and entrepreneurial mindset Additional Information Willing to travel extensively, including local overnight and international trips to meet with customers and to host KA’s at Company trials sites Reporting directly to Head of APAC for Flowers Flexible working hours to support the business needs Company Description Syngenta Seeds is one of the world’s largest developers and producers of seed for farmers, commercial growers, retailers and small seed companies. Syngenta seeds improve the quality and yields of crops. High-quality seeds ensure better and more productive crops, which is why farmers invest in them. Advanced seeds help mitigate risks such as disease and drought and allow farmers to grow food using less land, less water and fewer inputs. Syngenta Seeds brings farmers more vigorous, stronger, resistant plants, including innovative hybrid varieties and biotech crops that can thrive even in challenging growing conditions. Syngenta Seeds is headquartered in the United States.

Jobtitle: Senior Commercial Business Intelligence Analyst, Indochina- Bangkok, Thailand
column8: We are pleased to announce an incredibly exciting opportunity to join our Commercial team in Bangkok, Thailand as Senior CBI Analyst. Responsible for supporting revenue performance within specific demand segment(s) focusing on structural and tactical initiatives encompassing fare products, incentive programs and tactics across assigned markets. Continuously monitors and analyses returns on individual revenue-steering actions to drive continuous improvement and recalibration of tactics, products and incentive/sales programs. Communicates frequently with Sales and Marketing teams to drive focus in areas of opportunity, providing insights on key performance indicators on market trends, products/incentive performance and tactical initiatives specific to the segment(s) of responsibility, across distribution channels. Acts as the performance owner of the assigned demand segment(s) and provides recommendation on improvement The Job Lead analysis of revenue data to identify improvement opportunities for campaigns, structural fare products and incentive programs. Lead communication with Sales and Marketing teams to drive focus in areas of opportunity, providing insights on key performance indicators on market trends, products/incentive performance and tactical initiatives specific to the segment(s) of responsibility, across all distribution channels. Lead communication with HQ on structural and tactical products and fares. Lead commercial projects to improve sales effectiveness by setting the project objectives and measuring performance improvement. Communicate with regional office and country leaders in executing CBI strategy. Research both large scale industry trends as well as new business opportunities to understand best practices and how revenue can be increased. Train junior staff in analytics, tools and modelling across any required analytical task. Form deep understanding of allocated market segment, customer behaviour and according market opportunities; define action plans to extract incremental value where possible. Structure and run any complex analysis required including network gauging and connectivity, post-mortems; build templates to allow for efficient repetition of any analysis performed. Initiate forming close relationships and direct communication channels with all relevant Field and Head Office stakeholders; educate Field and HO where required pertaining to analytical based decision making and risk evaluation. Develop and implement a comprehensive management plan for each project and hold regular stakeholder meetings to keep all interested parties updated in project progress. Be part of an extraordinary story Your skills. Your imagination. Your ambition. Here, there are no boundaries to your potential and the impact you can make. You’ll find infinite opportunities to grow and work on the biggest, most rewarding challenges that will build your skills and experience. You have the chance to be a part of our future, and build the life you want while being part of an international community. Our best is here and still to come. To us, impossible is only a challenge. Join us as we dare to achieve what’s never been done before. Together, everything is possible Qualifications Qualifications Bachelor’s Degree or Equivalent with Minimum 4 years of job-related experience PC literate with knowledge of Word / Powerpoint / Excel / Outlook Work Experience in managing (Processing and analysing) voluminous data Experience in deriving insights from data and submitting actionable recommendations to management You must have the legal rights to live and work in Thailand to be considered for this role. About Qatar Airways Group Our story started with four aircraft. Today, we deliver excellence across 12 different businesses coming together as one. We’ve grown fast, broken records and set trends that others follow. We don’t slow down by the fear of failure. Instead, we dare to achieve what’s never been done before. So whether you’re creating a unique experience for our customers or innovating behind the scenes, every person contributes to our proud story. A story of spectacular growth and determination. Now is the time to bring your best ideas and passion to a place where your ambition will know no boundaries, and be part of a truly global community.

Want to be a part of our team? Responsible for selling the company’s products or services to and maintaining relationships with existing accounts. Working at NTT A Client Manager is a quota-bearing sales persona and the primary purpose of the role is to take full ownership of named client accounts, retain these clients and find new business. The Client Manager is assigned a range of development and maintenance accounts and held accountable for the performance achievement of those accounts in terms of revenue retention, profitability management, and growth. The Client Manager will work directly with clients at a variety of levels as well as internal sales teams such as Sales Specialists and pre-sales architects and post the sale; the delivery teams. They ‘champion’ the delivery teams’ understanding of the client’s solution requirements, and initiate improvement programs ensuring that the client remains committed to our solutions which leads to more sales opportunities. Building and developing excellent stakeholder relationships with new and existing clients, fully understanding the client and the industry in which they operate will be a core focus of this role. A substantial amount of time will be spent on client engagement and engaged selling, but also liaising with internal teams to make sure the client’s needs are attended to. Responsibilities Client ownership and relationship builder Take primary responsibility for the client and act as internal client owner within assigned accounts Manage and grow relationships to drive expansion and renewals across all solutions and services Responsible for client solution penetration and education, account monitoring and portfolio reporting, and issue resolution ownership Lead the business conversations at C-level Become the reliable point of contact to further strengthen relationships Client and industry expert Gain insights into client’s most urgent business problems or business opportunities while linking how our solutions and services offerings can add client business value Maintain a high level of the relevant industry, product, and service knowledge to have meaningful conversations and generally stay ahead of trends Collect and analyze data to learn more about the client and the industry in which they operate Owning the sales process Collaboratively work with extended sales teams, especially Sales Specialists, pre-sales architects, and commercial architects to successfully position the solution and/or service and see the opportunity through to closure Partner with internal teams to ensure the scope of work and proposals are tracked, managed, and delivered on time Work closely with other in territory counterparts and matrix teams to achieve the shared goal of growth; yet are held accountable for own targets Use NTT Ltd.’s sales methodologies and tools such as target plans, opportunity plans and account plans to support the sales process and data-driven insights Develop and implement an opportunity plan, to provide regular check-ins with the primary point of contact and have an established process for getting buy-in from all stakeholders Maintain a pipeline of leads on Salesforce.com Deal structuring Create comprehensive client business plans and engage in complex deal negotiation to build a stable, growing pipeline of current and future business opportunities. Engage in complex deal structuring and negotiation efforts designed to protect existing business and win new deals. Lead business negotiations for contracts ensuring deals are risk-free and profitable Client retention and expansion Minimize churn and maximize retention in assigned accounts Land, adopt, expand, renew – Identify client business needs with a view to help shape solution development by the wider pursuit teams Actively search for expansion opportunities Knowledge, Skills, and Attributes Required Good knowledge of Managed Services across domains such as Networking, Collaboration, Data Centres, Security and so on Client-centricity coupled with problem-solving Strong business acumen and negotiation skills to craft solutions that are beneficial to NTT and the client Ability to pro-actively and independently identify and qualify opportunities; an entrepreneurial mindset is key Natural team player – ability to coordinate and liaise with delivery teams across multiple business areas Quick learner to understand any new solutions that are ready to take to market Customer value management and understanding profitability and ratios of clients A strategic future thinker who anticipates and considers external and internal factors with the ability to develop long-term plans Ability to ask the right questions and tell great stories and have empathy with the client’s challenges. Superior communication skills are a given. Required Experience You will need to demonstrate an impressive track record of selling solutions and managing enterprise accounts; especially Managed Services type accounts across multiple technology domains. These typically involve selling complex solutions and services to the C-suite in large enterprise accounts. Proof of structuring large, multi-year profitable contracts Demonstrate the ability to build strong relationships with clients across all levels Strong experience in networking with senior internal and external people in the specialist area of expertise Experience in managing the entire sales process, contracting process, and legal implications of a deal Required Qualifications and Certifications A post-graduate type degree such as an MBA or similar would be advantageous. What will make you a good fit for the role?

Identify new business opportunities through prospecting, networking, and sales strategies. Manage existing accounts and maintain strong relationships with clients Collaborate with sales and marketing teams to develop and execute strategies aligned with company goals Conduct sales presentations and product demonstrations to communicate product value Negotiate and close sales deals in accordance with company policies Maintain accurate records of sales activity and customer interactions in CRM system Prioritize sales-related activities and contribute to company success and growth Stay up-to-date on industry trends and provide insights to sales and marketing teams Set sales goals for the team and ensure they are met Attend exhibitions or conferences and represent the company Contact clients to inform them of new product developments Gather and share feedback from customers/prospects to develop products and services. Requirements Bachelor's Degree in appropriate field of study or equivalent work experience. At least 1 - year experience as sales representative or related eld Good attitude in workplace and maintaining relationship with others Open-minded and strategic thinking ability Feeling comfortable to use english in daily tasks particularly in both writing and reading. Proven track record of achieving KPI’s and revenue targets. Extremely organized with strong time-management skills. Good adaptation with CRM, Support Tool, and being Tech Savvy Good command of English B2B experience will have high consideration Excellent communication skills. Good knowledge in MS Office. Tech Savvy Strong communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a fast-paced, dynamic environment Willingness to travel as needed to meet with clients and attend industry events. Benefits Company mobile phone / phone number as per job requirement Group health insurances Internal Seminar 12 days for holiday with 14-day straight holiday leave allowance Menstrual leave up to 12 days (excluded from sick leave) Mental Health counseling sessions with psychiatrists and psychologists through Ooca platform Welfare according to Thai Labour Protection Law Hybrid workplace policy Social Security Insurance Provident Fund (condition applied) Annual Health check-up (condition applied) Mental balance leave (condition applied) MOU with The Government Housing Bank for Home loan special Interest rate BYOD policy, personal laptop with less than 3 years old will is eligible for 1000 THB/month subsidy (registration required)

Jobtitle: Sales Executive (มีรถยนต์ส่วนตัว)

column8:
จำนวนอัตรา 10 จังหวัด กรุงเทพ ระดับการศึกษา วุฒิปริญญาตรี ทุกสาขา รายละเอียด ไม่จำกัดเพศ อายุไม่เกิน 35 ปี วุฒิปริญญาตรี ทุกสาขา มีใจรักงานขาย และกล้าแสดงออก รักความก้าวหน้า และความท้าทาย เวลาการทำงานยืดหยุ่น มีใบอนุญาตขับรถยนต์และมีรถยนต์ส่วนตัว ** อัตราค่าจ้าง 30-35K บาท ไม่รวมค่าคอมมิชชั่น *** ทำงานจันทร์ - เสาร์ *** (หยุดสลับเสาร์เว้นเสาร์) สวัสดิการ 1. กองทุนสำรองเลี้ยงชีพ 2. ปรับเงินเดือนประจำปี 3. โบนัส 4. ค่าตอบแทนในการมาทำงานสม่ำเสมอ 5. เบี้ยเลี้ยงการปฏิบัติงานนอกสถานที่กรณีค้างคืน 6. ค่าที่พัก ค่าพาหนะ กรณีปฏิบัติงานนอกสถานที่ 7. ชุดยูนิฟอร์ม 8. ประกันอุบัติเหตุ 9. ประกันสังคม กองทุนเงินทดแทน 10. ตรวจสุขภาพประจำปี 11. งานเลี้ยงสังสรรค์ประจำปี 12. การฝึกอบรมสัมมนา 13. เงินช่วยเหลือพนักงาน (งานแต่ง,งานบวช,คลอดบุตร หรือเงินช่วยเหลืองานศพ(บิดา,มารดา,ภรรยา,บุตร และตัวลูกจ้าง) เวลาทำงาน ประจำ เงินเดือน ตามโครงสร้างบริษัท +ค่าคอมมิชชั่น บาท สนใจติดต่อ คุณน้ำ เบอร์โทร 02-012-7888 Ext. 213 , 088-022-3955 (สำนักงานใหญ่), 092-257-0795 (ศูนย์สระบุรี) เว็บไซต์ http://www.betterworldgreen.com,http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6uzwl93jr-Q Better World Green Public Co., Ltd. เราให้บริการ 4 ด้านที่สำคัญต่อระบบธุรกิจในโลกปัจจุบัน ได้แก่ SMS Marketing (SMS,MMS,LNS,2 WAY SMS,IVR,USSD และ Mobile The Companyupon), Digital Marketing (Google Ads - SEM และ GDN, Facebook/Instagram Ads,SEO และ EDM), Line(เปิดบัญชี Line Official AcThe Companyunt, พัฒนา Line Business The Companynnect(BC) และลงโฆษณาผ่าน Line Ads Platform(LAP), Line Today และอื่นๆ) และ Innovation Development ทีมนักพัฒนาพร้อมออกเดินทางไปหาคุณเพื่อรับ Requirement และเนรมิตรระบบ เว็บไซต์ และอีกมากมายตามที่คุณต้องการ โบนัส ประกันสังคม ฝึกอบรมเพิ่มทักษะในวิชาชีพ, จัดเลี้ยงประจำปี, หยุดเสาร์-อาทิตย์ และวันหยุดนักขัตฤกษ์ต่างๆ และ วันหยุดพักผ่อนประจำปี ปรับอัตราเงินเดือนประจำปี (อาจจะปรับขึ้นก่อนขึ้นอยู่กับ Performance) เราเป็นทีมงานผู้หลงใหลในโลกดิจิตอลและเทคโนโลยี พร้อมจะให้คำปรึกษาและก้าวเดินไปพร้อมกับธุรกิจของคุณ วัฒนธรรมองค์กรที่เปิดกว้างเป็นกันเอง ให้เกียรติซึ่งกันและกัน ทางานเป็นทีม มีความอิสระทางความคิดเปรียบเสมือนกิจการของพนักงานเอง Develop and execute sales strategies: Create and implement sales plans and strategies to achieve The Companympany revenue goals. Identify target markets, customers, and opportunities for growth. Analyze market trends and The Companympetitor activities to stay ahead in the market. Lead and manage the sales team: Recruit, train, and mentor a high-performing sales team. Set sales targets, track performance, and provide ongoing feedback and The Companyaching. Motivate the team to achieve individual and The Companyllective sales objectives. The Companynduct regular performance reviews and address any performance issues. Build and maintain customer relationships: Cultivate strong relationships with key customers and acThe Companyunts. The Companyllaborate with the team to identify customer needs and provide tailored solutions. Act as a point of The Companyntact for escalated customer inquiries or The Companyncerns. Drive sales growth: Monitor sales metrics and analyze sales data to identify areas for improvement. Develop and implement sales strategies to maximize revenue and market share. Establish and maintain sales forecasts and budgets. Identify new business opportunities and develop strategies to expand the customer base. The Companyllaborate with cross-functional teams: The Companyordinate with marketing, product development, and operations teams to ensure alignment and support for sales initiatives. Provide input on product positioning, pricing, and promotional activities. The Companyllaborate with other department heads to improve overall business performance. Bachelor's degree in business administration, marketing, or a related field (Master's degree preferred). Proven experience as a Sales Manager or in a similar leadership role. Demonstrated success in achieving sales targets and driving revenue growth. Excellent interpersonal, leadership, and team management skills. Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities. Exceptional The Companymmunication and negotiation skills. Proficiency in using CRM software and other sales-related tools. Knowledge of the industry trends, market dynamics, and The Companympetitors. Ability to travel as required.

Position Summary: Our position offers you the opportunity to work with the world leading clients and in the fast-moving industry. Also, you will gain and build you analytical, technical skill, which require new learn in digital and e-commerce area. Key Responsibilities: Responsible for growing Reprise Commerce Unit: to establish present of Reprise commerce in Thailand and be representative for Reprise commerce when deploy product in Thailand market. Responsible for developing Partnership with Platforms: to drive the business growth and process with their platforms and ensure that Reprise commerce is a client partner. Build bottom-up activity and resource plan to client KPI and objectives and ensure the team managed are well educate with E-Commerce best practices from global. Drive the internal planning to ensure that we have a good strategy on each platform and to ensure that clients KPI in commerce are meet. Manage and lead the E-Commerce business team to meet support and uplift company revenue target. Work with keys client partners to establish good relationship to ensure that company meet client needs. Desired Skills & Experience: Experience in digital/tech industry: preferably in big eCommerce businesses, CRM programs, digital-led start-up companies. Have proven success from work experience, or well known in the commerce industry. Have strong analytical thinking and leadership skills. An individual that can make complex decisions using all the available data but comfortable enough to use their predictive skill and instinct when these are missing. Proficient in English and Thai is a plus. As the global performance marketing agency of MEDIABRANDS, Reprise is obsessed with Customer Flow – the continuous movement of people along the path to purchase. Our purpose is to help brands build and accelerate Customer Flow, and we offer deep expertise in digital crafts required to move customers along that journey. We do this by unifying our digital craft experts which include search, social media, SEO, eCommerce, content and strategy under a single operating system. Our expert team of specialists deliver integrated initiatives that help the world’s leading brands connect to the people who drive their business forward – efficiently and effectively. Reprise is headquartered in New York with over 3,000 experts in 68 offices in 45 markets. Visit reprisedigital.com to discover more about us. Mediabrands is an equal opportunity employer and is committed to building a diverse and inclusive workplace. We encourage applications from all nationalities, People with Disabilities, and all other historically excluded or under-represented people.

Jobtitle: เจ้าหน้าที่ฝ่ายบุคคล (สรรหาว่าจ้างและกิจกรรมสัมพันธ์)
Company: บริษัท เดอะ เมอร์รี่ คอมพานี่ จำกัด
column8:
จำนวนอัตรา 1 จังหวัด กรุงเทพ ระดับการศึกษา วุฒิการศึกษา ปวส.และสาขาอื่นๆ ที่ใกล้เคียง รายละเอียด เปิดรับทุกเพศ อายุ 23 ปีขึ้นไป วุฒิการศึกษา ปวส.และสาขาอื่นๆ ที่ใกล้เคียง ประสบการณ์ 1 ปี ขึ้นไป มีประสบการณ์การสร้างเครือข่าย ( Network ) กับหน่วยงานทั้งภาครัฐและเอกชนในการประชาสัมพันธ์ตำแหน่งที่เปิดรับ การเข้าถึงกระบวนการรับสมัครและคัดเลือกที่รวดเร็วและมีประสิทธิภาพ และสร้างสรรค์วิธีที่เพิ่มสำหรับพนักงานเริ่มต้นเข้าทำงานใหม่ สามารถให้คำปรึกษาเสมือนเพื่อนร่วมงาน (Buddy) เพื่อช่วยเหลือพนักงานใหม่ และให้คำแนะนำเพื่อสร้างขวัญและกำลังใจ เสริมมิตรไมตรี เพื่อให้พนักงานผูกพันกับองค์กร และบุคลากรองค์กร มีทักษะ ความรู้ด้าน คอมพิวเตอร์ Microsoft Office , Pivot Table ,Vlookup , Photoshop , Illustration และเรียนรู้เข้าถึงเครืองข่ายสังคมออนไลน์ , Social Media ได้หลายประเภทเพื่อเข้าถึงกลุ่มเป้าหมาย เช่น Facebook , Twitter, Tik Tok ,Instragram,Web Page ต่างๆ ปรับตัวเก่ง และเรียนรู้ในการเข้าถึงกลุ่มพนักงานต่างๆในลักษณะร่วมปรึกษา และสามารถเชื่อมโยง กิจกรรมร่วมกัน ชอบงานท้าทาย และชอบให้ความช่วยเหลือผู้อื่นก่อน และชอบทำกิจกรรมนอกสถานที่ ที่เป็นประโยชน์ส่วนรวม ( CSR ) สวัสดิการ 1.ประกันสังคม 2.ค่าล่วงเวลา (บางตำแหน่งงาน) 3.วันหยุดพักผ่อนประจำปี (สำหรับพนักงานทำงานครบ 1 ปี) 4.วันหยุดนักขัตฤกษ์ 5.เบี้ยเลี้ยงการทำงานนอกสถานที่ 6.เบี้ยขยัน 7.ค่ากะ (บางตำแหน่งงาน) 8.ยูนิฟอร์ม 9.งานเลี้ยงสังสรรค์ประจำปี 10.ปรับเงินเดือนประจำปี 11.โบนัสประจำปี (ขึ้นอยู่กับผลประกอบการบริษัท) เวลาทำงาน ประจำ เงินเดือน ไม่ระบุ บาท สนใจติดต่อ HR Team เบอร์โทร 090-788-9241,088 -656-3329 เว็บไซต์ https://www.facebook.com/Merrynutritions บริษัท เดอะ เมอร์รี่ คอมพานี่ จำกัด บริษัท เดอะ เมอร์รี่ คอมพานี่ จำกัด

แขวงพระโขนงเหนือ เขตวัฒนา กรุงเทพมหานคร 10400 Tel. 02-027-7888 งานหัวหิน ประกาศเมื่อ 21 ธันวาคม 2566 แสนสิริ บริษัทอสังหาริมทรัพย์ระดับแนวหน้าของไทย เรา…คือ ผู้กำหนดทิศทางอุตสาหกรรมอสังหาริมทรัพย์ในไทยให้พัฒนาเติบโตไปได้อย่างยั่งยืน (Market Shaper) และมุ่งมั่นที่จะเพิ่มประสบการณ์ที่ดีในการใช้ชีวิต เพื่อตอบสนองความต้องการแก่ผู้อยู่อาศัยทุกกลุ่มให้มีความสุขสูงสุด อีกทั้งเรายังให้ความสำคัญกับนวัตกรรม และความต้องการของลูกค้าเป็นที่ตั้ง ควบคู่ไปกับการทำงานอย่างซื่อตรง ถูกต้อง และแม่นยำ ด้วยการมองการณ์ไกล คือหัวใจหลักในการทำงานของเรา โดยวิสัยทัศน์ของเราคือ การเป็นผู้สร้างความสุขให้กับผู้คนมากมาย เพื่อยกระดับคุณภาพชีวิตของผู้อยู่อาศัย และยังให้ความสำคัญกับการใช้ชีวิตผ่านความเชื่อของเราที่ว่า “เราไม่ได้สร้างแค่ที่อยู่อาศัย แต่เราสร้างชีวิต” ซึ่งเป้าหมายของเราคือ การสร้างชีวิตที่ดีให้กับทุกคน และการสร้างชีวิตที่ดีจะเกิดขึ้นได้นั้น ก็ต่อเมื่อเราสามารถเติมเต็มการอยู่อาศัยได้อย่างสมบูรณ์แบบ ผ่านการออกแบบที่สวยงามเพื่อตอบรับการใช้งานได้จริง รวมไปถึงการบูรณาการ การบริการที่ครบวงจร ผ่านวิสัยทัศน์ของคนรุ่นใหม่ เพื่อสร้างประสบการณ์ใหม่ๆ ให้กับสังคมไทย บนพื้นฐานของการริเริ่มสร้างสรรค์ผลิตภัณฑ์ การบริการ และนวัตกรรม เพื่อช่วยเพิ่มประสบการณ์การที่ดีแก่ผู้อยู่อาศัยอย่างต่อเนื่อง ที่แสนสิริ เราเชื่อว่า “การพัฒนาคน” เป็นหัวใจสำคัญของการพัฒนา และขับเคลื่อนธุรกิจไปสู่วันข้างหน้าอย่างยั่งยืน ที่นี่เราพร้อมให้ทุกคนได้เรียนรู้สิ่งใหม่ๆ ร่วมกัน และพร้อมที่จะส่งมอบประสบการณ์ที่ดีเยี่ยมที่สุดในสายอาชีพของคุณ ในแบบที่คุณต้องการ รับสมัครตำแหน่ง ผู้จัดการอาคาร-คอนโดประจำโซนหัวหิน จำนวนอัตรา 1 จังหวัด หัวหิน ระดับการศึกษา วุฒิ ปริญญาตรี ทุกสาขา รายละเอียด ไม่จำกัดเพศ, สัญชาติไทย วุฒิ ปริญญาตรี ทุกสาขา มีประสบการณ์ด้านการบริหารอาคารสำนักงาน หรืออาคารชุด บุคลิกดี มีความเป็นผู้นำ มีทักษะในการแก้ไขปัญหาเฉพาะหน้า รักงานบริการ สามารถใช้คอมพิวเตอร์และโปรแกรม Microsoft Office ได้ดี มีความละเอียดรอบคอบ มีทักษะการประสานงาน และมีมนุษย์สัมพันธ์ดี ทำงาน 6 วัน/สัปดาห์ สวัสดิการ 1. กองทุนเงินทดแทนและกองทุนประกันสังคม 2. ค่าเบี้ยเลี้ยงและค่าใช้จ่ายในการเดินทาง 3. บ้านพักสวัสดิการ (หัวหิน) 4. สถานที่ออกกำลังกาย ( Fitness Center) 5. ค่ารักษาพยาบาล 6. ค่าทันตกรรม 7. การตรวจสุขภาพประจำปี 8. กองทุนสำรองเลี้ยงชีพ 9. เงินช่วยเหลืองานศพ 10. การประกันชีวิตและอุบัติเหตุกลุ่ม 11. ทุนการศึกษา เวลาทำงาน ประจำ เงินเดือน ตามโครงสร้างบริษัท บาท สนใจติดต่อ ฝ่ายทรัพยากรมนุษย์ เบอร์โทร 02-027-7888 เว็บไซต์ http://www.sansiri.com , https://career.sansiri.com/Home.aspx , https://www.facebook.com/sansiricareers/
